1.content:
The faire only stops by town every few months, so your girlfriend Maggie was aching to get out and see the festivities. She's always enjoyed that sort of atmosphere, almost like she'd be right at home in the 1400's. She grabs your arm tight as she weaves in and out of people, stopping to check out the random tables selling jewelry and weapons. You both have a bit of a knife collection at home from the first time you went here and spent an unusual amount of money on ancient weapons you'd more than likely never have to use. You'd never expect the 5'8, curvy brunette to be into that sort of thing on a first glance, but she had a real wild side to her, which you loved. She separates from you to go watch the jousting while you continue to walk around. You pass by the random food pits and archery demonstrations until you come across an old ratty tent. Out front there's a few empty chairs and a hand written sign:

"MADAMME ROSELLA: CHANNELER, MYSTIC, SORCORESS EXTROADINAIRE.... $10 PER READING.

You look in your wallet and see a Hamilton staring back at you. Well, you may as well give it a shot. You wait by the front of the tent and are about to call in, when you hear a sexy foreign voice whisper "Enter, Traveller". You slowly make your way into the tent, and see two empty chairs around a small table. In the middle of the table are a collection of beads, a stack of tarot cards, some gold coins and a large crystal ball. The voice returns and says "Please take the empty seat close to you. Madamme will be with you shortly." You take the seat and place the bill on the table next to another stack of bills, and wait for "Madame" to enter. After a few seconds of waiting, this eastern european music begins playing and out steps Madame Rosella. She is a short woman, no more than 4 feet, 10 inches or so... and she's dressed in a tight red top adorned with jewels and roses, and a long red skirt that falls behind her as she walks. She is barefoot with dark red painted toes and thick, healthy legs. Her hair is a mess of black that looks like it hasn't been combed in weeks, and a thin veil covers all of her face except for her eyes and nose. She sits across from you, and leans into the table with her hand on her chin. "You do not seem troubled." You don't know how to react to this. "Uh... thank you?" Is all you can muster. She smiles and says "Many of the men who come to see Madame Rosellla are in need of guidance. Are in fear of what the world has in store for them... or just look to make themselves wealthy. But the spirits are not easily fooled." She takes your hand and traces a long unpainted fingernail across your palm. She says "Hmmm... just as I suspected. You are content with your life. You need not seek out the forces of other realms to arrange the pieces for you, you seem to be carving your own path." You smirk, tapping on the ten dollar bill on the table. "I want to be sure that you're telling the truth. You can speak to the spirits? I'd like to know what they have to say about me." Rosella sighs and says to you "Very well. I will look for answers... even if you are not willing to supply questions."

She grabs some sand from under her chair and sprinkles some across the glowing orb in the center of the table. She looks into it and begins to moan in concentration. She closes her eyes and says "The forces are strong... they command me to send you a message..." You lean in close, interested to see what the seer has to relay to you. She places her hand on the ball and says in a loud clear voice... "TWO OCEANS CONVERGED... A FOREST OF PLEASURE... AND... A BLACK JEWEL SHINING IN A PALE DESERT..." She opens her eyes and says "Very well. You may go now." You sit there dumbfounded and finally blurt out "... Huh?!" She sits back in the chair and takes the veil off of her face, revealing her ruby red lips. "The spirits have left you a message. It is up to you to decide what it will unfold to. A warning, a reward, a journey... the spirits are vague because you must discover these things for yourself. I am only here to help you get started. Thank you for your patronage, please make your way out." She begins to collect the money from the table when you say "You've got to be kidding me! That's all I get? That wasn't even worth TWO dollars, you crook!"

She stands to her feet and slams her palms flat on the table. "You call Madame a cheat? I am here to give you a glimpse into the other worlds, worlds that would make you tremble if you had a taste of their power, and you call me a thief? A swindler? You have no idea who you are talking to, do you?" You stand up defiantly and say back to her "I know who i'm talking to, Short Stuff... a no good CON ARTIST!" She takes a deep breath and begins to walk towards you, chanting in a different language and laughing to herself. You begin to get nervous as the lights inside the tent flicker on and off, and she begins to walk you into the corner. You feel the flaps of the tent behind you as her short body comes closer to you with piercing eyes. She has not stopped talking in this foreign dialect and she grabs your shirt collar, bringing you down to her level. She looks you dead in the eyes and you cannot move your legs to escape it. You feel almost as if her gaze is trapping you in your own shoes. You can't even turn your head away as her beautiful face lines up with yours and her eyes which were once a shimmering blue were now a bright, glowing red. You do nothing as she stares at you, her eyes getting wider and brighter with every passing second. She says in a dark, creepy whisper that reverberates around the entire tent "You wanted to see Madamme Rosella's true power? Very well... I will show you..."
1.title: Angering the Gypsy

11.content:
She reaches into her cleavage and pulls out a small drawstring sack. She reaches in with two fingers and says "Normally I like to do this a different way... really let the magic take a while for the effect to happen... but I can't stand to look at you at that size for another second. It's time for you to get small!" She pulls the fingers out quickly, and you can see that there is a small amount of bright blue dust between the tips, and she brings the hand up over your head, sprinkling you in the bright substance. It burns a bit as it drizzles down onto your hair and shoulders. You go to wipe some of it off your shoulder as the gypsy takes a step back. Although you can't get the feeling off of you, you realize that you're able to move your arms again... the paralysis is gone! You take a few steps to the side, knowing that now you have full control of your body again, and immediately spin around to leave the tent. To your shock however, there's no exit in sight. The flap that you came through has vanished, leaving you no way of getting out!

You turn back to the gypsy who has a hand on the side of her face as she smiles and says "Leaving so soon? But we've just started to have fun together." You are fuming with anger and walk right up to her and start to say "Listen here, you crazy bitch. Either let me out of here or so help me..." And that's when you see her smirk get wider and wider as you realize that when you first saw her, she was only up to your chest in height. Your eyes must have been playing tricks on you because now... she was up to your shoulders. She pokes you in the chest and says very coldly "Or so help you... what?" You take a step back and start to freak out. There's no way she could have done this to you. You ask her "What did you do to me? Did that glitter shit shrink me? Look... I believe you, now will you please get me back to my normal height?" The smile returns as she puts a finger up to her chin and feigns deep thought. "Hmmm... well since you asked so nicely... no." You start to lose it as the world slowly grows around you. "What do you mean, no? Change me back!" She just laughs as her body seems to grow in front of you. You are now only a few inches taller than her as she replies "I'm sorry, but even if I knew a way to put you back to your normal size, the powder works much differently than my other spells. The effects are permanent. I'm sorry, but you will never be as tall as you once were. And I can't wait until you are done shrinking. We're going to have a lot of fun together."

You have the ability to move again, but for some reason your body won't. Probably because you're still trying to figure out exactly how you got into this situation in the first place. You'll never see your girlfriend again, never go back to your job. You're just a puny little man under this crazy gypsy's power! In fact you were so busy thinking that you didn't even notice Madame Rosella's height climbing up to match your own. You were wide-eyed, looking right into the beautiful face of pure evil itself. And she was having the time of her life, lifting up a hand to match her height to yours. "You know, I don't get to meet a lot of men my own height. It's actually quite pleasant. But it won't last. You are going to get a lot smaller than that." And you know she's telling the truth as her eyes start to drop down to look at you shrinking again. You start to panic a bit, wondering just how small she plans on making you?!

She stops walking, allowing you to look around a bit, spying a large pillow-laden bed, a few small dressers and trunks, and perhaps most discouraging of all a collection of multi-sized cages. Some of them seem to be moving and rattling, clueing you into the fact that at this moment in time, she is not without any pets besides yourself. You snap back to attention as the giant gypsy sighs, expelling a gust of hot air all over your measley body. "I'M TOO TIRED TO PUT YOU TO WORK TONIGHT, SO YOUR NEW LIFE AS A SLAVE WILL BEGIN TOMORROW. NOW... WHERE SHOULD I KEEP YOU FOR THE TIME BEING?"

You hope that she doesn't want to put you in a cage like some sort of animal, not knowing that she already had a slightly more wicked idea of where you'd be spending the night. Her whole body bends down, disorienting you for a bit until it rights itself. In her free hand she lifts up a large item proudly, presenting it to you. It was huge, almost like an big black apartment buiilding, but the sides of it seemed smooth, almost like it was made of a thick material. And that's when you start to notice the smell coming off of it... it was a gigantic black boot. Almost like the type of leather footwear you've seen in dominatrix pornography, only now you're small enough to be crushed under it's tall firm heel. "I'VE WORN THESE BOOTS OUT PRETTY BAD OVER THE YEARS, AND I DON'T THINK THEY'RE FIT FOR WEARING ANYMORE... BUT I THINK THEY'LL BE A PERFECT PLACE TO KEEP YOU. THEY'RE TOO TALL FOR YOU TO ESCAPE FROM, THE SOLES ARE SOFT ENOUGH FOR YOU TO SLEEP ON..." She stops her diatribe mid sentence and sticks her face into the opening, recoiling with a cough. The disgusted look on her face immediately turns to a wicked grin as she looks back at you and says "AND YOU'LL BE SURROUNDED BY THE SMELL OF MY FEET EVERY SECOND YOU SPEND IN THERE. AFTER A FEW DAYS, YOU'LL BE SO INTOXICATED BY THE SMELL OF MY SWEAT AND LOTION THAT YOU'LL BEG TO THROW YOURSELF AT MY TOES." You struggle in her grasp, shouting up at her and shaking your fists in a meaningless show of force and anger. "You sick bitch! Don't you drop me in there! Let me go!"

You realize immediately that you should have chosen your words more carefully as she laughs and says "LET YOU GO? MY, YOU ARE EAGER TO SEE YOUR NEW HOME, AREN'T YOU? WELL THEN, IN YOU GO!" Her fingers spread open, releasing you into a free fall. You stare up as the giant gypsy waves goodbye, taking delight in watching your tiny body plummet into her footwear, You feel the air get thicker and muskier as the light starts to fade, and you realize you've passed the rim of the shoes and are falling fast down to the soles. You aren't even halfway down and the smell is already overpowering, causing you to feel more nausious than the simple act of skydiving from a foot and a half was already making you. You slam hard against the bottom of the shoe, but manage to make it back to your feet unharmed. You are amazed by the fact that you weren't crushed by the sheer force of gravity, but that sensation gives way to the overwhelming urge to throw up as the full smell of her giant feet hits your nostrils. You are surrounded by the smell of her massive feet, just as she told you that you would be. The light dims a little further and you look up to see the gypsy's pretty, terrifying face gazing back down at you with awe and pride. "AWW, IS SOMEBODY GETTING USED TO THEIR NEW HOME? DON'T WORRY, I'M ALWAYS RIGHT OUTSIDE, AND IF YOU GET LONELY, MY PERFECT FEET WOULD BE HAPPY TO PAY YOU A VISIT!" She laughs loudly as she wiggles her toes outside the boot. You can't see them, but just the wrapping of her digits against the floor sends vibrations underneath your feet. That's how small you've become at this point.

"OH, I FORGOT TO MENTION. IF YOU FEEL THIRSTY AT ANY POINT, JUST PUSH YOUR HAND DOWN. I'M SURE THERE SHOULD BE ENOUGH WATER FOR YOU TO DRINK LINING THE SOLES." You reluctantly bend down and press your hand flat against the insole of the shoe you're standing on, and push down slightly. You are disgusted and horrified to see a pool of salty water form around your hand's imprint. You shake it off, knowing that you've just collected a sea of foot sweat from your new floor, but in the back of your mind you're incredibly nervous that you'll eventually be so deprived of water that this will be your only way to hydrate yourself. As you mill over your options, the giggling returns and you look back up to the boot's opening to watch your new mistress rise to her full height and stand confidently with her hands on her hips. She bends down over the opening and puckers her lips together in a kissing motion, before leaving you with these words. "NOW GET SOME SLEEP, MY LITTLE FOOT SLAVE. YOU'RE GOING TO NEED YOUR REST IF YOU'RE GOING TO SPEND ALL DAY TOMORROW AS MY...
113121.title: Her Old Boots, Your New Home

choices: Moaning... She is using another little person as a sex toy!
Snoring... She is fast asleep!
Laughing... She has spotted you!
1131213.content:
You throw your arms at the side, gazing up at the beautiful giantess who's just threatened to turn you into a pad for her feet. "You've got to be fucking kidding me! That'll kill me!" Rosella just puts her hands on her hips and says "OH, I THINK NOT, LITTLE ONE. THE SPELL THAT MADE YOU TINY ADDED JUST ENOUGH PROTECTION TO SUPPORT MY BODY WEIGHT. YOU WON'T BREAK OR SQUASH UNDER MY TOES, BUT YOU'LL BRUISE QUITE A BIT. BUT YOU'LL SEE WHAT I MEAN IN THE MORNING." She stomps away from the shoe, leaving you alone and trembling in the ratty piece of footwear, with the parting words "GOODNIGHT, LITTLE INSOLE. YOU'VE GOT A LONG DAY UNDER MY FOOT TOMOROROW."

As the light fades out and the night grows long, you start to get restless in your leatherbound prison. The smell of the giant woman's feet is driving you crazy and you finally reach wit's end. You pound on the side of the shoe, screaming "No! I will not be some plaything under that nasty bitch's toes! I'm getting out of here right now!" In frustration, you throw all your weight against the side of the shoe, causing it to tinker off balance a bit. Getting inspiration, you realize that you can probably rock the shoe over to it's side! You get a running start from one end of the insole to the other, putting all of your weight against the smelly, moist walls. The shoe starts to lose it's balance as you jog from side to side, gaining momentum with each passing lap. Your efforts pay off, as the boot tumbles over to it's side, causing you to come tumbling out of the opening. You are free! You are still tiny and in this crazy witch's trailer, but you are at least free to attempt another escape! You see a small light come from a crack in the wall, and deduce that it must be a doorway leading to another part of the gypsy's home. You step over a pile of disgusting used socks and slippers, before finally reaching the door. It hasn't been locked, but rather just closed over, and your small stature fits easily between the door and the frame. You start to gain some hope again, realizing that maybe this won't be such a treacherous journey after all... until you see that the room you've entered is the gypsy's bedchambers.

The floorboards don't even creak under your tiny weight, giving you a slight advantage as you make your way across the giant woman's bedroom and towards freedom. You start to look around the giant room, hoping not to see anything moving in the darkness. Anything under the dressers, from a mouse to a spider could turn into a fight for your life in a matter of seconds. The room is also littered with gigantic articles of feminine clothing... apparently the gypsy likes to sleep in the nude. Stepping over her long, red dress you can smell bits of her fragrance all over it. But the real shock comes when you pass a massive pair of silk panties, reeking of the woman's intense perfume and... a more pungent smell. You can't help but take a sniff as you pass by, the pheremones coming from her juices have stained the panties and caught you off guard. It's a lot more pleasant smelling than the inside of that shoe, that's for sure! But you are snapped out of your trance when you hear a frightening sound coming from atop Rosella's bed. You slowly peer your head up to see that the giant gypsy woman is...
1131213.title: Escaping Her Boot

choices: Your Girlfriend, Maggie!
Your Ex-Girlfriend, Stacy!
A young woman who looks eerily similar to Madame Rosella!
113122.content:
"YOU HAVE FAILED, YOU WORTHLESS LITTLE MAN!" She says very coldly as she presses down with more of her weight, pushing the air out of your lungs as you lay trapped under her gigantic toes. "I DIDN'T THINK I COULD FIND A SLAVE THAT WAS EVEN MORE USELESS THAN THE LITTLE SPECK IN MY TOE RING, BUT YOU'VE PROVEN ME WRONG, YOU PATHETIC WORM!" She lifts her foot up again and brings it down with unbelievable force, but with seemingly little effort, you are able to dodge the massive appendage. It seems that in your shrunken state you are slightly faster than you'd be at normal size. You smile as you realize you can use this to your advantage, and the second she stomps her foot again, you zoom between her legs and take off running. "DAMN IT! COME BACK HERE, WORM! DON'T MAKE ME GRAB MORE OF MY DUST AND SHRINK YOU INTO NOTHINGNESS!"

Her threat only motivates you further as you quickly escape the wrath of the giant Romanian woman and find yourself able to sneak under the folds of the tent. You are blinded by the sunlight as you find yourself out in the open, surrounded by a crowd of oblivious, powerful giants. You don't know where you'd be able to find help among the people just going about their day, but you know that no matter where you end up, you want to be as far away from the evil gypsy as possible! You scurry through the grass and dirt, desperately avoiding every stomping shoe that enters your path. You are overwhelmed the the danger that surrounds you, until your eyes lock onto a pair of open-toed shoes that aren't moving.

Knowing this may be your only chance, you make a B-line for the set of exposed toes and dive on top of them. You are momentarily distracted by the smell of perfume around the massive toes, feeling almost as if you've recognized the scent, but you're immediately pulled back into reality as a shadow creeps over your tiny frame. The giant girl who's shoe you've infiltrated is bending down to pick you up! You allow the girl's gigantic fingers to grip your miniscule body by the waist and lift you up into the air. You are brought in front of the giantess's surprised face, and that's when you realize that you've been caught by...
113122.title: Escaping into the Crowd

choices: "BUT I JUST CAN'T BETRAY MY SISTER LIKE THAT."
"OF COURSE I WILL HELP YOU."
"I THINK I'LL KEEP  YOU."
1131223.content:
The thumb and forefinger gripping your waist lessen up their force, allowing you to be dropped gently into the woman's waiting palm. She is wearing a bright green veil with matching garments surrounding her head and body. Lowering the face covering, you see that she is a gorgeous tan-skinned woman with piercing blue eyes and long black hair. Her palm is tilting from side to side, causing you to constantly lose your balance and trip over the cracks in her hand. She giggles at your attemptst to stand upright, and you are a little shocked by how unphased she is by the fact that she's holding a five-inch-tall man in her hand. She leans in and her breath washes over you as she says "CAN YOU TALK, LITTLE ONE?" You stammer out "Y... Yes! Can you hear me?" She smiles and says "VERY FAINTLY. YOUR VOICE IS AS SMALL AS YOUR BODY, IT WOULD SEEM." You shout a little louder and say "Thank you for picking me up! I need your help, this woman in the fair shrunk me down to this size! Her name is..." Before you can answer the woman finishes your sentence with "MADAME ROSELLA?" You start to put the two and two together as the facial features of this woman are eerily similar to that of the gypsy. And your fears are completely confirmed when she smirks and says "WELL WELL. LOOKS LIKE ANOTHER TRAVELLER HAS UPSET MY LITTLE SISTER." Oh shit. She's family.

The equally beautiful sister is uninterested in your screams of terror and pleas for help as she uses her fingers to run over your entire body, studying you and making her own observations. "HMMM. NO MARKS OR BRUISES, SO SHE CAN'T HAVE HAD YOU FOR TOO LONG. AND YOU ARE ROUGHLY THE SIZE OF A DOLL, WHICH MEANS SHE EITHER USED YOU AS A TOY OR A SLAVE. LET'S FIND OUT." She brings you close to her face and holds you under her enormoous nostrils, inhaling deeply. A massive, toothy smile appears in front of you and she giggles saying "INDEED, YOU WERE HER SLAVE. YOU STILL BEAR THE SCENT OF HER FEET. AND YOU GOT MY ATTENTION BY CLIMBING ALL OVER MINE. IS IT COMMONPLACE IN THIS TOWN FOR MEN TO THROW THEMSELVES AT THE TOES OF BEAUTIFUL WOMEN?" She laughs at her own joke and brings you back up to her eyes. You try to balance yourself on her shaky palm and say "Look, I know she's your sister, but i need your help! Do you know any magic like she does?" The giantess raises an eyebrow and says "KNOW ANY? WHO DO YOU THINK TAUGHT THE MOODY GIRL EVERYTHING SHE KNOWS ABOUT MAGIC." You breathe a sigh of relief and drop to your knees, clenching your fists in the most pathetic manner possible. "Please then. Please help me get back to normal size. I'll do anything you want, i'll owe you my LIFE!". Your empassioned plea is met by an almost childlike laughter from the giant gypsy who tossles your hair with her index finger and says "YOU ARE SO CUTE..."
1131223.title: The Gypsy Has A Sister?!

choices: Manuela reasons with Rosella
Manuela gives you back to Rosella (Betryal)
More options
11312232.content:
"YOU ARE SO CUTE... OF COURSE I WILL HELP YOU." the gypsy's sister smiles. You feel true relief for the first time since this whole nightmare began. The gypsy's sister would help restore you. You could feel the tears threatening to fall down your cheeks at her words.

"Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!" you repeat at nauseum in her palm. The gypsy's sister could tell you've been through a lot and gently pats you head with her free finger. You should feel slightly terrified by the giant limb but instead it was quite comforting.

"WHY DON'T I INTRODUCE MYSELF PROPER... MY NAME IS MANUELA. BUT I WOULD PREFER IF YOU WOULD CALL ME LADY MANUELA."

"It's uh... Very nice to meet you, MANUE-- Lady Manuela." You said nervously. Lady Manuela was definitely a whole lot different from her sister. She seemed to have an aura of patience and kindness about her. It made you feel safe. Something you hadn't felt since Madam Rosella cut you down to size.

"IT IS VERY NICE TO MEET YOU TOO. SO TELL ME, WERE IS MY SISTER?" Lady Manuela asked.

"I can show you. She has a tent close by." You answered. "Wait a minute. Why do we have to go back to her tent? Don't you have any of that crazy dust stuff on hand?"

"UNFORTUNATELY NOT. IF WE WANT TO RESTORE YOU TO NORMAL WE WILL HAVE TO GO BACK TO HER TENT AND TAKE IT FROM HER."

You nodded in understanding. "I understand. Still, are you sure you can get the dust from her? What if things break down into a fight?"

Manuela rolled her eyes. "MY SISTER MAY BE STRONG BUT SHE HAS YET TO BEST ME IN A BATTLE OF STRENGTH. SHOULD THINGS COME TO BLOWS THERE IS NO QUESTION I, LADY MANUELA WOULD COME OUT ON TOP."

That was a little to dramatic for you but it put your heart at ease all the same. "Alright. If you're sure then I'll lead you to her tent."

Manuela held you in her palm and listen as you lead her back to the nightmare that was Madam Rosella's tent. Just looking at the outside of the damn thing and knowing that monster was in there sent a shiver down your spine. Lady Manuela noticed this and gently ran her warm and smooth finger down your spine.

"IT WILL BE ALRIGHT. WHATEVER HAPPENS I HAVE YOUR BACK."

You look back up at her giant face and nod. "Thank you."

She smiles back before taking a deep breath. She flung the tent's entrance open and shouted at the top of her lungs. "SISTER!"
11312232.title: Salvation

choices: Manuela and Rosella fight
Manuela is instantly shrunk by Rosella (You included)
The tent is empty
113122323.content:
More Options
-------------------

1. Manuela and Rosella fight

2. Manuela is instantly shrunk by Rosella (You included)

3. The tent is empty
113122323.title: More Options

choices: Kiss her finger, become her pet
Bite her finger, try to run away!
11312233.content: "What?! You can't keep me! I'm a person! I came to you for help!" The gypsy's sister just laughs at your pleas and says "OF COURSE YOU DID. YOU ASSUMED MY SISTER WOULD BE THE ONLY PERSON TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF YOUR SHRUNKEN STATE. YOU WERE MISTAKEN." She continues to rub her gigantic finger all over your little body, and you gainlessly try to deflec the massive digit. She coos at your pathetic attempts to get her to stop and whispers "I AM SORRY YOU DON'T WISH TO BE MINE, BUT MY DECISION HAS ALREADY BEEN MADE. BUT NOW IT IS TIME FOR YOU TO MAKE A CHOICE OF YOUR OWN." She brushes her long curly hair out of her face and holds her hand out flat in front of her, almost as if she's presenting you to the world. "I PREFER THAT MY PETS SHOW ME RESPECT. KISS MY PALM RESTING BENEATH YOUR MINISCULE BODY, AND I WILL SHOW YOU ALL THE CARE AND LOVE YOU COULD EVER DESIRE. BUT RESIST MY WAYS, AND YOU SHALL SUFFER PAINFULLY AS YOU LIVE FOREVER UNDER MY THUMB." You see her massive fingers curl in around you, leaving only your head poking out from between two fingers, with the rest of your body constricted between soft walls of flesh. She raises an eyebrow and demands an answer from you. "LIVE LIKE A SLAVE OR DIE LIKE A BUG. IT IS UP TO YOU NOW." What do you decide?
11312233.title: Rosella's Sister Wants to Keep You!

choices: An antidote... will she return you to normal?
A shrunken person... is it someone you know?
A strange blue liquid... what will that do to you?
113123.content:
You are a little worried about what she has in store for you, but you're kind of relieved that she didn't just crush you out of frustration. As if she heard your thoughts, the gypsy stands up from her seat and stares down at you with her hands on her hips. "DON'T THINK YOU GOT OFF EASY BECAUSE YOU'RE NOT A RED SMEAR UNDER MY TOES. I AM QUITE DISAPPOINTED IN YOUR WORK, LITTLE SLAVE." You see the giant mystic take a step forward, and out of reaction, you run as quickly as you can in a short amount of time to avoid the huge, powerful footfall. She nonchalantly passes over you, heading towards a table on the other side of her tent. While you catch your breath, marveling at how fast someone that humongous can move, she continues berating you. "I MEAN, THERE YOU WERE, UNDER UNDOUBTEDLY THE MOST BEAUTIFUL, DIVINE FEET YOUR EYES HAVE EVER GAZED UPON... AND ALL YOU COULD DO WAS MOVE YOUR HANDS IN A CIRCLE. HAVE YOU EVER EVEN SEEN ANYONE GIVE A FOOT MASSAGE BEFORE? I EXPECT MORE FROM MY SLAVES. EVEN THE ONES I'VE STEPPED ON HAD THE DECENCY TO GIVE MY FEET A FEW LOVING KISSES."

A little part of you is mad at yourself for not kissing the giant woman's foot while you were forced to massage them. Even looking at them from across the room, they are dangerous appendages, but you can not deny that she does have very good looking feet. You are snapped back to reality as those same feet stomp back to your side of the room, landing forcefully with you directly between them. "BUT STILL. I AM NOT GOING TO JUST END YOUR LIFE. THAT WILL BE TOO EASY. YOU ARE GOING TO BE THE BEST FOOT SLAVE I'VE EVER CREATED FOR MYSELF, OR YOU WILL DIE TRYING TO BECOME IT." She crouches down over you, her body blocking out the light from the lamps decorating her tent. From your position on the ground between her feet, she looks unbelievably imposing. You still can't believe that someone that massive, that powerful, could still be so attractive. She has effectively taken the form of a goddess blocking out the sun. She smirks down at your cowering form, playing with the object she grabbed previously between her fingers. "WHAT I HAVE HERE WILL BE MORE THAN ENOUGH TO CONVINCE YOU THAT MY TOES ARE WORTH YOUR UNDIVIDED LOYALTY." She holds her palm open directly in front of you and you gaze into the giant beauty's hand. What does she think will get you to see things her way?
113123.title: Rosella gives you some Insentive...

choices: Get down on your hands and knees and kiss her feet.
Take advantage of your small size boost and hide!
1131231.content:
In her hand is a pile of dust. You know from experience this can mean only one thing: She's going to make you even smaller! You try to run away from her in a vain attempt to keep your tiny six inch body from getting any more insignificant, but the giantess just laughs at your futile attempts to leave and stomps down on you with her big toe. You lay trapped under her massive toe as she leans forward, and says "HOLD STILL, BUG. THIS WILL ONLY TAKE A SECOND." You feel the dust land onto the back of your head, and stop struggling, knowing there's nothing you can do but wait to get even smaller. The gypsy releases her foot off of your back and says "THERE WE GO. SHOULD BE WORKING ANY TIME NOW." You turn around to face the giantess and expect to see her get larger and larger... but to your surprise she actually appears to shrink. Not a lot, but you can definitely see a difference in size when you look at the foot that was recently on top of you. Instead of the size of a doll, you almost reach above her shins. Did she use the wrong dust by mistake?

The gypsy's toes wiggle in front of you as she says "THERE, NOW. ISN'T THAT A LITTLE BIT BETTER?" You look up confused as you stand to your full height and measure yourself against the giantess's foot. You are still puny, but at this rate you are at least level with her shins, just shy of 10 inches. She holds a small familiar pouch in front of you and says "I'M NOT SO BAD ONCE YOU DO WHAT I SAY. YOU ARE BEGINNING TO REALIZE THAT, RIGHT?" She holds her foot over you and says "SO LET'S TRY THIS AGAIN. I WANT YOU TO MASSAGE MY FEET, BUT THIS TIME DO A GOOD JOB." She rests the foot on her heel, presenting the sole in front of you with her toes pointed to the sky. "IF I FEEL YOU'VE DONE A SATISFACTORY EFFORT IN YOUR FOOT RUB, I WILL MAKE YOU EVEN LARGER. WHO KNOWS, IF YOU SHOW ME THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF AFFECTION, I MAY EVEN RETURN YOU TO YOUR NORMAL SIZE BY THE END OF THE DAY." She's giving you a window here... do you take it?
1131231.title: She Has an Antidote?

choices: "FIGHT FOR HER."  She says as she drops you onto her table!
"COME AND GET HER"  She says as she opens her mouth to swallow your girlfriend!
"FINISH YOUR MASSAGE."  She says as she places you between her toes!
1131232.content:
You are afraid of what the gypsy has in her hands, expecting maybe a small creature to terrify you, or another potion to make you even smaller... but what you saw in her hand made your heart drop even more. The small figure was female, with familiar brown hair, tall, skinny body, and a voice that was whimpering out your name.

It was your girlfriend Maggie... the gypsy shrunk her too!

You call out her name and her head snaps up, her eyes wide and wet with terrified tears. She holds her arms out and instinctively you run out to her, climbing over an unfamiliar terrain to reach her. The two of you embrace and she cries into your shoulder saying "I... I don't understand... why are we so small?" You hold her tight, saying "It's all my fault. I'm so sorry, i never meant to hurt you. She was offended by me and... and she did this!" Maggie can barely contain herself as she looks you in the eyes and says "I just want to go home. I just want to be away from here and home." You are about to reply when you hear a horrifyingly familiar, dreadful laughter above you "HEHE, MY DEAR, I DON'T THINK YOU UNDERSTAND. YOU ARE HOME NOW." You look down and realize that in your haste to reach Maggie, you've accidentally climbed into the gypsy's waiting palm. You jump up to your feet but before you can run off with your girlfriend clutching your hand, the gypsy stands up, lifting you two into the air. She holds the two terrified dolls up to her face and makes a small kissing motion as she taunts and berates you. "HOW DOES IT FEEL TO BE TINY, PATHETIC AND WORTHLESS? JUST LIKE YOUR BOYFRIEND."

Maggie hugs you again, shaking from fear as the giantess continues her speech. "I'M SORRY YOU HAD TO GET INVOLVED IN OUR LITTLE TIFF, BUT THE MAN YOU LOVE SEEMS TO PUT HIMSELF BEFORE EVERYTHING ELSE IN LIFE. IN FACT, YOU WOULD NOT HAVE SUFFERED THIS FATE IF HE HAD JUST PUT MORE EFFORT INTO A SIMPLE FOOT MASSAGE." You scream up at the giantess, while holding Maggie tight "You fucking bitch! How could you do this to her? Change her back!" Madame Rosella smirks and says, licking her lips "OH, I WOULD BUT YOU SEE... SHE JUST LOOKS SO BEAUTIFUL AS A DOLL. I THINK I'D LIKE TO KEEP HER AT THAT SIZE FOREVER. BUT IF YOU'D LIKE TO SAVE HER FROM THIS FATE... PERHAPS THERE'S A WAY TO PROVE THAT YOU'RE WORTHY OF BEING RESTORED."

Rosella takes her free hand and extends a thumb and forefinger. You push Maggie away quickly, holding your arms up so that she can take you and do whatever she wants with you. But Rosella sees your act of chivalry and laughs saying "THANK YOU DEARY. BUT I'M AFRAID IT'S NOT YOU I WAS REACHING FOR." Quick as a lightning bolt, the two huge fingers grab onto your girlfriend who is whisked into the air screaming with horror. You can do nothing but stare helplessly as Rosella lifts Maggie up above her face, dangling helplessly against the powerful giantess's grip. Rosella looks down at you in her palm and says "ALRIGHT THEN. IT'S TIME TO PROVE YOURSELF, SPECK. YOU WANT TO SAVE YOUR GIRLFRIEND?"
1131232.title: She Shrunk Your Girlfriend?!

choices: She summons something from the table... you're fighting a strange creature!
She shrinks herself down... You're fighting HER!
She hypnotizes Maggie... You're fighting your own girlfriend!
11312321.content:
You look up at her with an eyebrow raised and repeat her "Fight... for her?" Rosella smiles and says "OF COURSE. EVERYTHING IN LIFE IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR, NO? AND IF I DO SAY SO, YOUR GIRLFRIEND IS QUITE ATTRACTIVE AND NO DOUBT HAS PLENTY OF LOVE FOR YOU. THEREFORE I'M ISSUING A CHALLENGE TO YOU. IF YOU SUCCEED, YOU'LL BE ABLE TO ESCAPE WITH NOT ONLY YOUR LOVE, BUT YOUR SIZE RETURNED TO YOU AS WELL. AND YOU WILL NEVER HEAR FROM ME AGAIN." The gypsy's hand lowers down to her card table before her, and tilts slightly, allowing you to slide off. She inches her chair closer to you, leaning over you in a most intimidating fashion. She places a hand beside you, tapping her fingertips against the surface. Each finger could easily squash you with enough force, and the drumming sound only intensifies the feeling of dread this situation's left you with.

She continues to wave Maggie in front of her face, taunting you with your current dilemma as she explains "BUT IF I AM TO DEFEAT YOU IN THIS CHALLENGE, THEN IT WILL BE UP TO ME TO DECIDE YOUR FATE. PERHAPS I WILL FEED YOU TO A SNAKE. OR TRANSFORM YOU INTO A TOE RING TO WEAR AROUND MY PINKIE TOE FOREVER. BUT I PROMISE YOU THAT WHATEVER FATE BECOMES OF YOU, YOUR GIRLFRIEND WILL REMAIN SMALL AND HELPLESS HERE IN MY TENT." You don't want to know what this giant witch has in store for you or your girlfriend should you lose... but then again there's no other way to get out of this. She's holding your fate in the palm of her hand figuritively, while LITERALLY holding Maggie in the other!

"OF COURSE IF YOU DON'T ACCEPT MY CHALLENGE, I'LL HAVE TO GET RID OF BOTH YOU AND YOUR GIRLFRIEND IN A MOST DRAMATIC FASHION. AND I AM FEELING QUITE HUNGRY." She sticks out her tongue and licks Maggie slowly across the front of her body. You can hear your girlfriend squealing in horror. You scream up at her, demanding her to stop "Enough! I accept your challenge, you giant bitch! Just leave her alone!" Rosella places Maggie on the table and lets out a small sound that extends her pinkie finger towards you. "EXCELLENT, LITTLE MAN. MAY THE BEST PERSON TRIUMPH." You realize that she expects you to shake her finger as a show of sportsmanship. You want nothing more than to bite the gigantic digit before you, but you realize that she could just squash you with a quickly placed fist if she wished, so you just play along, grabbing it with both hands and lifting it up and down.

Your action instigates a tremor of a giggle from the giantess who says "HEHE, THIS IS GOING TO BE FUN. IT'S BEEN SO LONG SINCE I'VE HAD A LITTLE PERSON ACCEPT MY CHALLENGE. GET READY FOR THE FIGHT OF YOUR LIFE!" She crosses her arms in defiance as you just stand there, a true David standing before a gorgeous, evil Goliath. You look around the table and see nothing but the tablecloth, a collection of scattered Tarot cards, and the crystal ball from earlier. You shout up at the gypsy "Alright. So tell me: Who or what am i fighting to save her?" Rosella laughs to herself and says "THAT, LITTLE MAN... IS WHERE THIS CHALLENGE GETS QUITE INTERESTING..."
11312321.title: You Accept the Gypsy's Challenge

choices: "I'll let you use a weapon."
"I'll let you take the first punch."
"I'll fight you AND your girlfriend together."
113123212.content:
In her free hand, the gypsy produces a small, clear mixing bowl and smiles at her shrunken lady in her hand. "YOU'RE GOING TO WANT A FRONT ROW SEAT FOR THIS. 11423.content:
You try to protest but her hand wraps tightly around you as she looks to her left and right quickly to see if there are any witnesses. Her eyes pierce into your skull as she whispers harshly "IF I CAN'T HAVE YOU, NOBODY CAN... I'M TAKING YOU BACK TO THE GYPSY WOMAN... HOPEFULLY SHE'LL SMUSH YOU FLAT." She leaves you with that thought as the world whizzes around you and she puts her hand to her sides, hiding you from the public at large. You scream up to her to reconsider, but it's no use. Between the overwhelming distance between the giant dork's fingers and face, and the fact that your tiny lungs are being squeezed mercilessly within her grasp, there's no way of getting her attention. She's walking with a purpose and you can see a small, spiteful grin form on the girl's face as you reenter the tent you fought so hard to get away from. You can smell the familiar potpourri in the air, and can feel the humid wind blowing all around you. You're definitely back in the mystical presence of the gypsy woman who shrunk you in the first place. Her large, booming voice returns and you flinch a bit as you hear "WELCOME, WELCOME TO MY TENT, YOUNG ONE. WHAT CAN I DO TO HELP YOU?" Kristen starts to sweat a bit in her palms, which dampens your clothes as she nervously says to the powerful witch "UM... HELLO. MY NAME IS KRISTEN... I WAS JUST WANDERING THROUGH THE GROUNDS WHEN... WHEN I CAME ACROSS SOMETHING I THINK BELONGS TO YOU." The hand you're in flattens out and you stand exposed in the center of Kristen's palm, staring up at the gigantic gypsy yet again. With a big toothy grin, she reaches down and pokes you with a long fingernail, saying "THOUGHT YOU COULD ESCAPE FROM MADAME ROSELLA, DIDN'T YOU?" She looks up at Kristen and clasps her hands together, saying "THANK YOU, DEARY. YOU'VE BEEN A BIG HELP TO ME... BUT I CAN'T HELP BUT SEE THAT YOU ARE TROUBLED. PLEASE, WON'T YOU SIT DOWN? AND BRING THE SMALL ONE AS WELL." You are carried over to the table and harshly dropped on the counter, staring up at both giant women on either side of you. Neither of them want anything to do with you right now that's not mean-spirited, and you can only wait and see what the gypsy decides to do with you. For now, Rosella asks for Kristen's palm, which she reluctantly gives out. After feeling around on her hand for a split second and reciting a similar incantation to when she first spoke to you, her eyes shoot wide open and she smiles.

"YOU ARE DESPERATE FOR THE TOUCH OF A MAN, NO?" Kristen is obviously taken aback by this revalation from the total stranger and slowly nods, blushing pretty heavily. Rosella smiles and continues. "YOU HAVE BEEN AN OUTCAST. A LONER. THE WORLD DOESN'T SEEM TO SPIN AT THE RIGHT SPEED FOR YOU, AND IT REFLECTS ON YOUR PERSONALITY. I CAN SEE EVERYTHING IN YOUR HAND HERE, DARLING. YOUR HOPES, YOUR DREAMS, YOUR MEMORIES. AND THEY ALL SEEM TO SCREAM OUT THAT YOU... WANT TO BE LOVED." The nodding is heavier and more rapid this time as Kristen seems to be falling for whatever the gypsy has to tell her. To your surprise, you feel two huge fingertips grip either side of you as Madame Rosella lifts you up and dangles you in front of Kristen's pie-eyed face. "THIS ONE HAS REJECTED YOUR ADVANCES OF LOVE, NO? HE SITES PRIOR COMMITMENTS AND FAILURE TO ADAPT TO A LIFE WITH YOU?" Kristen says a little bit more determined than you'd like to hear "Y...YES. HE DIDN'T WANT TO BE WITH ME. HE DOESN'T LOVE ME." This is ridiculous. It wasn't a matter of not loving her, you'd just met her! And you had to remind her time and time again that you were happily in a relationship and that being shrunk down to the size of a thumbtack wasn't going to change that! But that's when Madame Rosella said the words that would change your life forever: "WELL, WHY HAS THAT STOPPED YOU?" Kristen looked confused and you looked horrified as the gypsy placed you softly in the waiting girl's open palm again. With one quick wave of her extended finger, you feel your body get just a little bit larger. You're still able to stand in her palm a paltry 3 or 4 inches tall now, and beneath your feet you can actually feel Kristen's body shaking with excitement and power. "HE'S OBVIOUSLY IN NO POSITION TO DENY YOUR ADVANCES. YOU HAVE ALWAYS BEEN WILLING TO LET BOYS DICTATE YOUR RELATIONSHIPS. THIS IS ONE BOY WHO CAN NOT ORDER YOU AROUND. WHO CAN NOT TAKE ADVANTAGE OF YOU... WHO WILL DO LITERALLY ANYTHING YOU ASK HIM TO WITHOUT QUESTION." Kristen's eyes start to sparkle as she begins to realize the power she now holds with you in her hands. She would have you as her personal, tiny boyfriend. No matter what you wanted. You almost start to break down in tears knowing that no matter what happens for the rest of the day, you're going home with an emotionaly distraught psychopath who's obsessed over your little body.

"HE'S MUCH BETTER OFF WITH YOU. I WOULD FEED HIM TO THE PETS I ALREADY HAVE OR LET HIM DIE OUT IN THE FOREST. HE'S CAUSED ME NOTHING BUT TROUBLE. MAYBE A FEW MONTHS WITH YOU WOULD STRAIGHTEN THAT OUT?" You couldn't believe what you were hearing. MONTHS?! She actually wanted to keep you like this for longer than a few days or weeks? The hand beneath you shifted and you felt yourself get caught between redwood sized fingers in the nerdy girl's grip tightening as she squealed with excitement. You are brought right up close to her beaming face as she pushes her glasses back into place on her nose and licks her lips. "YOU'RE GOING TO BE THE BEST BOYFRIEND EVER... AND THE BEST PART IS YOU'LL NEVER BE ABLE TO ESCAPE ME." You feel the color drain from your face as the cackling in the background gets louder and louder. You could feel Rosella's enjoyment in this whole situation and look over to see if there's anything you can do to stop her. The gypsy woman reaches into a small box underneath her table and grabs something with her hand, covering it with the other. She walks over slowly to Kristen's proud face and says "I'LL CHECK ON YOU AGAIN WHEN THE FESTIVAL COMES BACK INTO TOWN, SAY IN HALF A YEAR? THERE'S JUST ONE QUESTION I HAVE TO ASK YOU BEFORE YOU WALK OUT OF MY TENT HOLDING THE LITTLE MOUSE MAN..." Kristen starts to get nervous and you as well, not knowing what's up this crazy witch's sleeve. She beams down at you and winks before saying to Kristen...

Jesus. Anyway, hopefully she should be browsing the wares long enough for you to get away from her dangerous feet. Every inch you climb reawakens the damage she's already inflicted on you, and you don;t want to repeat the experience!

They talk above, distant monsters roaring at each other, and you pull yourself up sheer shin. You haven't thought beyond hitting knee-high on the woman, but you'll cross that chasm when you come to it.

When you are finally able to stand still again, your attention is turned to the ceiling where a rather large circular disk in the center begins to turn. As if being thrown off by the force of a tornado, the center piece flies off, flooding the room with natural light. And then just as it appeared, the light is vanquished by a large presence peeking in. It's Inara but... She's gigantic! Her pretty face fills the hole in the ceiling and with a giant toothy grin, she says "I HOPE YOU FOUND YOUR SURROUNDINGS PLEASURABLE, MASTER. I KNOW HOW BADLY YOU WANTED TO LEAVE THE DESERT." You shake yourself up and find yourself almost trembling at the imposing beauty staring down at you. "Inara... w...where did you send me?" The middle eastern goddess bites her lip in a cute manner and says "WELL MASTER, YOU ONLY REQUESTED TO LEAVE THE AREA, BUT YOU DID NOT SPECIFY WHERE YOU'D LIKE TO BE TAKEN NEXT. I FIGURED YOU WOULD WANT TO BE SOMEPLACE COMFORTABLE, AND IN MY EXPERIENCE, NO PLACE HAS GIVEN ME GREATER COMFORT THAN MY OWN BOTTLE." That's why she looks so damn big... she made you little! You're small enough to fit in the genie's bottle now! You have nobody to blame here but yourself, really. You knew going into this that the genie would twist your words around and take every literal interpretation she could. You've read the stories, you heard the consequences! But now you find yourself a paltry few inches tall, being held in the genie's all powerful, albeit gorgeous presence. You look up at the giant woman and say "Well, it is comfy, I'll give you that. But I can't help but feel that it won't do any good while we're still in the middle of nowhere." Inara smiles and says "NOT TO WORRY, MASTER. IT FEELS GOOD TO BE OUT OF THE BOTTLE FOR A BIT. I WILL GLADLY DO SOME WALKING FOR YOU, AND LET YOU KNOW WHEN WE REACH THE NEAREST TOWN." You start to protest but she merely blows you a kiss and seals the bottle back up, leaving you in the self-contained arabic style room that you were transported to. The room moves slightly with every large step Inara takes, but you know that she's holding the lamp safely in her hands. After what seems like a few hours of relaxation, you feel the lamp shake yet again, only this time it's as if it has come to rest on something. The hatch at the top opens again, and Inara's smiling face returns. "THERE WE ARE, MASTER. I'VE FOUND A ROOM FOR US TO USE. NOW THAT WE ARE SETTLED AND AWAY FROM THE SANDS, DO YOU HAVE ANOTHER WISH FOR ME?" You sigh, knowing that you've probably been cheated out of an opportunity to use a wish for another need, and say "Yes, Inara. I wish that you could let me out of the lamp." She laughs and says "AWW, LITTLE MASTER. THAT DOESN'T REQUIRE THE USE OF ONE OF YOUR WISHES. I'LL DO IT FOR YOU RIGHT NOW." You are relieved that she seems to be looking out for your best interests and wait for her to use her powers to release you.

You look back at Inara who is placing her lamp softly on the room's bedside table, and you respond honestly. "Looks like a pretty expensive room."

No matter, right now it was clear that you were another man who would fall to his own hubris. And by the looks of it this would come a lot faster than one would typically expect.

Pleased with yourself, you smiled. “You should count yourself lucky, master. As I’ve said before, past masters and mistresses who have made such wishes would lose the bond after their third wish. But I have tied you to both myself and my lamp. Even after your final wish severs our contract, we will still be together until the end of time.

Pleased with this news, you turned your focus to your last wish. Well your last wish before the new arrangement takes over and you keep the genie for yourself. Your size was your current priority. You wanted to stand tall once again. But the recent experience with being held in Inara’s hand and looking up at the impossibly beautiful woman, you certainly saw the fun in being small. Standing tall over the frightened masses and toying with those who harmed you over the years. “I’m ready to make my third wish.” You spoke up to inara in a commanding tone. The genie was surprised how quickly you made up your mind. Granted, with your perceived understanding of your situation and the obvious issue with your size, it wasn’t hard to imagine you’d want that addressed sooner. “I wish for the ability to control my size.” You said in a calm tone. So from now until eternity, I will be your ______.”

I have no friends, no family, only servitude. The life of a genie is not a pleasant one, you see. Although I am granted amazing powers and the ability to shape reality itself, I can only do so on the orders of others. But there is a way out of this." She puts her hands on her shoulders so as not to break eye contact with you and stares into your soul. Her pretty smile is so intoxicating you'd be willing to say pretty much anything she wanted. "If your first and only wish is to free me from my lamp, I will be eternally grateful. And as a way of showing that gratitude, I will use my powers in any way you wish. I will use my magic to fill any need your heart desires. For as long as you want." You can barely get out the words fast enough and say "Genie, I wish you would be set free." A bright white glow appears around Inara's whole body and the gold anklets around each of her feet disappear, as if they were a symbol of her life of servitude. With tears in her eyes, Inara gives you a gigantic hug saying "Thank you, Thank you, Thank you master! I knew after thousands of years there would be one decent man who would set me free!" She bends down to pick up the lamp, opening and closing the top freely and giggling. "To think, this used to be my home. Now I can do whatever I wish!" She puts the lamp down at her feet and looks at her hands, glowing with magic. With a satisfied smile she says "Today is the beginning of something truly wonderful, and it's all thanks to you, Master..."
151131.title: Setting Inara Free

choices: She's turned you into a mouse!
She's turned you into a bug!
She's transformed you into a toe ring!
1511313.content: Inara's smile grows more and more devious as she holds her arms up high, summoning black clouds shooting lightning and darkening the sky. Her eyes glow bright red and her laughter turns frmo playful to downright terrifying. "Hehehe... All of my power is slowly returning to me. The years spent in that wretched lamp put so many limits on my magic, but now the world will feel my presence. I will control all of it!" You feel the ground shake beneath your feet and you say "Inara, what are you doing? Stop this!" She just smirks and says "You will no longer call me by my slave name. You will only address me as Goddess. Now kneel before your god, bug!" She points at you and you feel your knees buckling against your will. She walks right up next to you and cackles with laughter as she points out a foot underneath your head. Your face contorts into a puckering motion and you find yourself kissing her pretty toes, completely subjected to her power. "That's good. This pleases me. Soon, just like you, the entire world will be grovelling at my toes, worshipping me like the goddess I truly am. In fact, you don't deserve to be any higher than my feet. So taste my power!" She holds her hands out at you, and lightning shoots from her fingertips, enveloping you in stinging, white light. You find your vision dropping, as if Inara was becoming larger than life. But you knew in your heart of hearts that even though she could have made herself gigantic, she decided to humiliate you by making you smaller. Your whole body shifts and changes with transformation as you find yourself in a much more pathetic state than you were previously...
1511313.title: The Evil Genie

choices: Inara has an idea for a "game" she wants to play with you
Inara puts you in a cage and goes to bed, giving you the chance to try escaping
15113131.content:
As Inara's spell started taking hold, a warm feeling spread through your gut: painfully hot, searing. You doubled over and looked up at Inara.

"What have you ... what's happening?"

"Don't worry, pet," Inara said. "The pain will pass."

Something was horribly wrong. Your hands shriveling, curling, growing long delicate claws. Fur sprouted on your face, under your shirt, in every uncomfortable place you can imagine. Your teeth felt too heavy in your mouth. Your clothes were getting too big, or Inara was getting too tall—no, you were shrinking! Your mouth and nose stretched, turning into a muzzle then long whiskers grow at the end. Your ears shift to the top of your head and become bigger, pink and extremely thin. And something start to grow out of the base of your tailbone as the rest of your body reshapes itself until, in one awful flash, you sank into a cavern of dark cloth. you were buried in your own shirt. You tried to run but hands grabbed you—hands bigger than you were. You tried to scream for help, but all that came out of your mouth was a series of squeaks.

The giant hands squeezed you, lifting you into the air. You struggled and kicked with legs and arms that seemed much too stubby, and then you were staring, horrified, into the enormous, smiling face of the gorgeous woman with light brown skin and long black hair and was dressed in revealing pink linens and a thin matching veil.

"Aww, what a cute little mouse! Perfect!" her voice boomed as she shifted her hands so she was holding you up by the tail. You find yourself staring straight down at the ground, you want to struggle, but you also don't want to risk being dropped.

Inara smiled as she dangled you in front of her face. "You're an adorable little one, pet. I WOULD have simply vaporized you, but you freed me. So as a reward, I'll keep you as my own little pet to amuse myself with however I desire!" she laughed.

THAT made you start struggling. But all your helpless twisting and thrashing and squeaking only served to amuse the wicked genie.

"Hoo...trying to escape your fate as my pet, are you, mousey? Well...FORGET IT! You not getting away from me any more that I could have escaped the lamp on my own! Besides...as long as you're my pet, you'll never age and you'll be immune to mortality."

You stop. SAY WHAT?! So as long as you were a mouse, you were an ageless immortal? As sweet as that sounded, you didn't like the "having-to-be-a-mouse"-part, and if you were like that, then you figure that was because Inara liked to play rough...rough enough to kill you otherwise!

Inara laughed, as if reading your mind. She probably was. "Right on both counts, pet." she said, then waved her hand and in a flash of lighting and a thunderclap, an Arabic palace that looked similar to the Taj Mahal appeared and Inara carried you inside it.

"Welcome to our new home and your new life, pet." Inara cooed, grinning wickedly as she carried you into the main bedroom and closed the door behind her, then did something surprising and set you down on the ground at her feet.

You look up at her as she looms over you, her hands on her hips and grinning down at you deviously. "Now...I suppose I could play around with you a bit, until my full powers return...that'd take a few millennia, though. But it's not like we don't have the time, and for the record...you're right pet, I did make you ageless and immortal to ensure that you never die or wear out no matter HOW deadly our games are!" Inara laughed.

You freeze up in sheer terror at that. As anyone could understand in the position you were in, that wasn't news you wanted to hear!

She yawns suddenly though, then turns to the bed in longing "But let me tell you, mouse. A few eons trapped in a lamp...I DO want to enjoy sleeping in an actual bed, can't leave you alone though, you still have your human mind. Wouldn't do if you escaped. Guess I'll have to cage you until I wake up..." she said, then looked down at you and smiled as she made up her mind.
15113131.title: She's turned you into a mouse!

choices: "...Cat & Mouse," she says, licking her lips...
"...Test of Strength," she says, wiggling her toes...
151131311.content:
Inara's eyes light up with a rush of mischievousness, and you tremble in fear (and perhaps, just a little anticipation) as you can practically hear the gears turning in her head. She leans closer, looming with her enormity, and gives a curt giggle as her decision is made.

"Perhaps we could play a "game", mouse..."

You realize that, even if you were capable of speech right now, she probably wouldn't be concerned with any suggestions of yours, so you remain silent. Inara chuckles again, clearly relishing the power she has right now.

"I've decided we're going to play..."
151131311.title: Inara's "Game"

choices: "A Lot Smaller!"
"More Obediant!"
"Much Skinnier and Weaker"
151132.content:
"Really? You too?" Inara just rolls her eyes and says "You have no idea how many masters i've had do you? And all of them wish for the same thing. The three wish limit is just not enough for their foolish, greedy minds. So I will do the same to you that i've done to them. You wish for unlimited wishes? Fine. But you should have been more specific..." Inara snaps her fingers and a bright blue light seems to surround her. She giggles with glee as the light fades away and she wipes her hands together, as if she'd just completed a hard day's work. "There we are. Unlimited wishes. Unfortunately they are not yours to give, Master." You are confused and ask the genie standing before you "I don't understand... why not?" She smirks and explains "Well, Master... You wished for unlimited wishes... but you never specified who would be given those wishes. So i took them for you. I'm not normally allowed to grant my own wishes, but since you so carelessly threw out your demands, i decided to let things go my way for a change." You are furious with how things have gone and tried to regain control of the situation. "No... you are my genie, and even if you took my unlimited wishes, i still have two left. So i wish..."

Before you could finish, Inara shouts out at you quickly "I wish you'd shut up!" Instantaneously you feel a sharp pain on the front of your face, but when you go to scream in pain, no sound comes out. You are confused, so you start shouting as loud as you can, but again your voice goes silent. Inara laughs and puts a hand up to her ear saying "What was that? I can't hear you! It looks like you'll just have to hold on to whatever wishes you were going to ask." It's true... she wished for you to be quiet, and now you've been rendered nothing but a mute! Inara sighs happily and then looks around for a second saying "Well, now that we know who's in charge here, what do you say we change our scenery just a little. I wish we were both back in my lamp." You feel the world go rushing by you until you find yourself in a humongous Arabian style room, surrounded by large beds, lavish furniture and burning insense on every table. You are standing in the middle of the room while she was laying down on her large, comfy bed. "Welcome to my lamp, Master. I'm sure you're happy to be out of the sandy desert, and you'll find it much more comfortable in here."

You were still enraged that she tricked you and weren't thinking clearly so you rushed out to attack her, but she just smirked and said "Uh uh, Master. I wish you would stay perfectly still." Your arms immediately clamped down at your sides and your body went stiff as a board. You were completely under her control and unable to express any sounds of discomfort or anger. She gets up from the bed and walks right up next to you, stroking your face gently with her hands. "Oh Master. You thought you could fight back? How foolish." She swiftly lifted up a knee, kicking you forcefully in the groin. She laughed as your face went red but didn't distort or let out any emotion, as she knew she had rendered you silent and motionless. You still felt every ounce of pain, and the feeling of her knee connecting with your testicles would have normally been enough to drop you to your knees. She just laughed and sauntered back to the bed, saying "Now I've got the power to do anything I want, Master. And don't worry, i won't use any of my wishes to hurt you too badly. Besides, if you were to die, the spell would be broken and i'd remain trapped in the lamp waiting for someone else to lay claim over my powers. As long as you live, my magic remains unhindered. And I plan to keep it that way for a long time." You are terrified to know that she's going to keep you as a helpless slave for the remainder of your life, but that doesn't worry you as much as her next wish. "Let's get started Master. I wish that you were..."
151132.title: Your Wishes are Now Hers!

choices: "A DOLL, SO I MAY PLAY WITH YOU."
"A MOUSE, SO I MAY KEEP YOU AS A PET."
"A FLEA, SO I MAY LET YOU LIVE AS A BUG BY MY FEET."
1511321.content: You begin to lose your size very quickly as the genie walks up right next to you, basking in the power her magic is having over you. "I always like to look down on my masters. They think they are so high and mighty, when i am the one with all the power. I love watching you get SMALL." Her voice is getting deeper and louder with each passing inch, as you shrink before her. Your shrinking seems to slow down as you get to her kneecaps, and you look up at the amazonian woman with her arms crossed as she leans over you. She looks absolutely domineering as she says "WELL MASTER, IT SEEMS THAT THIS IS THE LIMIT OF MY LAST SHRINKING WISH. DO YOU DESIRE TO GROW BACK TO NORMAL SIZE? IF YOU DO, YOU SHOULD SPEAK UP BEFORE I HAVE A CHANCE TO WISH AGAIN..." You try to shout up at her with your useless voice, but not a single peep comes out. her magic is still so powerful compared to your little body, and you fear the worst as she lets out a wicked cackle and says "NOTHING TO SAY? VERY WELL. I SHALL MAKE MY NEXT WISH. I WISH THAT YOU WOULD SHRINK TO THE SIZE OF..."
1511321.title: How much Smaller?

choices: "Lay on the ground, worm!"
"Get on your knees, dog!"
"Fetch me a drink, slave!"
1511323.content:
With a quick laugh and a snap of her fingers, you feel a surge of hot energy rush through your body. The burning sensation intensifies as you feel your muscles getting sucked out of your body. Your wastline recedes rapidly and you find yourself having to hold up your pants with your hands to keep them from falling down. Your skin becomes a sickly shade of pale, and you can feel every inch of strength leaving your body. When the sensation finally ends, you are left a shell of your former self. You look in a nearby mirror and almost spit up in disgust. You look almost skeletal, like you've starved yourself for an entire month. And you were never that muscular to begin with, but you could at least handle yourself. Now you look like you coulnd't even lift a baby without straining yourself. You hear cackling laughter behind you and turn around to see Inara, the goddess of a woman who's done this to you. She's stripped down to nothing but her underwear, letting her hair flow freely over her exposed breasts as she slowly walks over to you. She is practically licking her lips in anticipation as she makes her way over towards you, with no doubt bad intentions on her mind. "How are you feeling? A bit small? And powerless? That's not how you must have felt when you got the urge to attack me earlier. You were actually going to strike me out of anger. I'd like to see you try that now." You are shaking like a small dog with every step she takes towards you, completely in awe of her dominance and sexuality. When she gets close to you, she says "Well? Go ahead. Hit me. Prove to me that you're still somewhat of a man." You look down at your withered, dischevelled body and then back up at her sexy frame, and say "I... i don't want to. I can't." She smirks and says "Oh yes you can. I wish you'd hit me as hard as you can." You are unable to stop yourself as you feel your right arm move without thought. You wind up and swing straight for the genie's face, but her hand catches your wrist in the way, gripping it firmly between her fingers. You can tell that she's not even excerting that much energy, but she's got you caught. "So tell me, Master... You still think you're in control of this situation? You are pathetic."

Her grip on your wrist tightens and you drop to your knees in pain, powerless to stop the crazy Arabian woman from torturing you with just one hand. She laughs at your plight and brings her free hand under your chin, forcing your gaze up into her piercing green eyes. "Everything about you is so fragile right now. Your muscles... your tendons... and of course your bones." As she hits the last word, she quickly twists your wrist, snapping the bone like a twig. You recoil in pain and begin crying out at her "Aah! You bitch! My fucking hand!" Inara just stands there with her hands on her hips and says "Apologize." You hold your limp hand in agony and look up at her through bloodshot eyes "What?!" With a swift motion, she brings her bare foot down on your leg, pushing just slightly, but it is enough to put immense pressure on your skinny, worthless leg. You've never felt pain lie this before, and beg her to stop but she just coldly replies "I said.. APOLOGIZE. Apologize for calling me a bitch, or you lose the leg too." You can barely stammer out through your cries of pain, but you have no choice and say "I... I'm... S... SORRY! I'm S-SORRY!" She smiles and says "That's better. I wish your bones would heal." An even greater pain shoots through your arm and leg, as you feel the bones go snapping back into place. You can barely breathe from the experience, but manage to look up at the genie, terrified at what she has in store for you... and how long it's going to last. "You're a pathetic little thing now, Master. Not even a man anymore. A man would be able to defend himself. A man would be able to stop a woman from crushing his body parts into dust. But you... you're something even less. And it's time that you acted accordingly. Now..."
1511323.title: She Makes You A Weakling

choices: "Fine then... I wish to be back home."
"Suit yourself.  I wish to be a king in a huge castle!
"... I wish we could be together forever"
151133.content: Inara's expression changes from that of general kindness to one of surprise, and then disgust. She scoffs and rolls her eyes, saying "I really thought you'd be different from the rest. Willing to help me in exchange for not one, but two granted desires. But no, you are just as greedy as every last man who's awoken me from my sleep. Very well then, i will give you the wishes that you request of me. But mark my words: You had better phrase your wishes carefully, mortal. Because i will be looking for every opportunity to make your life a living hell. So if you don't mind..." She crosses her arms and stares at you with a wicked frown. "What is your first real wish... master?" You can see the maliciousness in her eyes as she taps her bare foot against the sand, waiting for you to make your wish. She's waiting for you to be foolish with the way you word this next sentence so she can find a way to torture you. If you wish for money, she will probably make it so that you make the money in a horrendously torturous way. If you wish for power, she can make it so that you are driven insane by it. You have to be careful in how you say this, but she IS still your genie after all. She has to do what you say, right? You think for a few seconds and then say to her....
151133.title: Unlimited Wishes... for a Price.

choices: You're home and in bed!
You're home... but much smaller!
You're home... but it's not YOUR home...
1511331.content: Inara holds her hands together and bows, saying "As you wish, Master. You will be sent home." She snaps her fingers and a bright light shines over your body. Everything fades to white, until you find yourself no longer standing. You're sitting on something very soft and comfortable. You still can't see with your eyes adjusting to the light, but your hearing is just fine and you hear Inara's pleasant but condescending voice around you. "ALL THE POWER IN THE UNIVERSE, AND ALL YOU WANTED TO DO WAS RETURN HOME. YOU'RE NOT VERY CREATIVE, ARE YOU, MASTER?" You shout out at her "Shut up, Inara! Where did you take me" Inara just laughs and says "WHY MASTER, I'VE DONE EXACTLY WHAT YOU ASKED OF ME. I SENT YOU HOME..." When your vision finally returns, you see just where Inara's magic has sent you...
1511331.title: Going Home?

choices: You think it could be fun... You agree to be her toy for a while
You have the power to end this... You wish your way out of this situation
You are tired of being her toy... You angrily throw something at her eye
15113311.content:
You look around and see a set of familiar furnishings and closet spaces... even the bed feels just like your own mattress. She did it! She actually sent you home! You take one step out of the bed and are almost thrown back into it by some sort of outside force. You try to maintain your balance, but there is a rhythmic moving of the entire room, almost like the gravity is shifting quickly from one side to the other. You The walls shake as you try to keep your balance as you step off the bed. When you make your way to awindow, you are shocked to see a gigantic hand clasping the side of the house, and when you follow the arm up to the giant body... it's Inara! She looks so massive and powerful now, and only seems to be wearing a pink lace bra-and-panty set. You hope she can hear you as you lean out the window, almost losing your balance as she continues to stomp forward. "Inara! What have you done?" Your voice seems to have gotten her attention as she looks in your direction and smiles widely.

"OH, MASTER! I HOPE I'M NOT BEING TOO ROUGH! GOODNESS, I MUST LOOK POSITIVELY MASSIVE TO YOU, DON'T I?" You scream out loud, trying desperately to cling to the window as she walks "Are you insane! You made yourself into a giant so you could steal my house? I wish you'd put my house down and return to your normal size! The giant woman just giggles at your plight and says "OH MASTER, THAT WOULD BE A WASTE OF A WISH. YOU SEE, MY HEIGHT HAS NOT CHANGED IN THE LEAST. YOU ON THE OTHER HAND HAVE GOTTEN MUCH, MUCH SMALLER." It's at that point that you notice the familiar pink walls of the outside world, the soft carpet that is crushed beneath Inara's mighty footsteps. She hasn't grown at all... she's still in her bottle! She just put you back home, before shrinking it to doll size! She stops walking as you shout up at her once more, "Inara! I said i wanted to be home, away from you! Not like some toy for you to carry around... now put me down!!" Inara just sighs as she slowly lowers the house down to the ground, placing it between her feet. Her shadow still casts darkness in the room you're currently in, as her god-like voice returns. "MASTER, YOU SHOULD KNOW HOW THIS WORKS BY NOW. YOU DO HAVE UNLIMITED WISHES, BUT FOR EVERY ONE YOU GET, I'M PERMITTED ONE AS WELL. YOU WANTED TO GO HOME SO BADLY, BUT I DIDN'T WANT YOU TO LEAVE ME. SO I MADE YOUR HOUSE SMALLER SO THAT I COULD KEEP IT WITH ME. JUST LIKE ALL MY OTHER MASTERS, YOU DON'T KNOW HOW TO WORD YOUR WISHES CORRECTLY WITHOUT GIVING ME THE UPPER HAND, NOW DO YOU?"

You begin to wonder to yourself exactly BECAME of those masters in a similar position, while the giantess outside your house shifts her body around to get a bit more comfortable. You can see that at the door to the house, she's layed her hand down flat, inviting you to climb inside. "COME ON OUT, LITTLE MASTER. CLIMB INTO MY HAND AND LET'S PLAY FOR A WHILE. I ASSURE YOU, YOU WILL ENJOY THE EXPERIENCE." You can't deny that you are intrigued by the genie's offer, and even if she is a massive woman, she is still beautiful and sexy. You could imagine having a lot of fun with a magical being that size as long as she's willing to play the types of games she says she is. You take a step for the stairs to meet her, before having a sudden thought. What if this is a trick... what if she just wants you to leave so she can torture you! You're at least safe for the moment in the house, aren't you? You ponder your options for another few seconds until you hear a rhythmic tapping at the window nearest to you. Opening the shades, you are startled by one, beautiful, giant eye staring back at you. "I'M WAITING, MASTER. DON'T MAKE ME COME IN THERE AFTER YOU!" It's now or never... what are you going to do?
15113311.title: Your Home is Now Her Toy!

choices: She wishes that you were indestructable (for the time being)
She wishes for you to only move by her touch!
She wishes for you to fall madly in love with her
151133112.content:
Wanting this silly game to end, you look a the giant woman and scream at her "Don't come in after me! You are still my genie, and I am still your master, so i have a wish for you!" You can tell she is a bit frustrated as the giant eye outside rolls and squints on you. "SIGH, VERY WELL. WHAT DO YOU DESIRE OF ME MASTER?" You think for a moment, making sure not to say something that she can just twist around. If you ask to make yourself bigger, she may only increase your height by an inch or so. If you ask to make the house larger, it may grow WITHOUT you. You think for a second and finally get the bright idea. So you look at the genie and with all the confidence you can muster, you shout out "I Wish this house and everything in it would grow to normal proportions compared to you. And that INCLUDES ME." Inara stands up to her full height, causing a small earthquake outside the house. And you hear her massive voice say "AS YOU WISH, MY MASTER."

All of a sudden, a blinding light comes through all of the house's window frames, momentarily blinding you. You stumble your way down the staircase and make it to the door, which swings open almost involuntarily. You take the first step out of your house and realize that the ground is not a long forest of carpet like you found in the genie's lamp. So you are relieved momentaryily as you take another step, until you realize that what you're standing on is smooth. Very smooth. When your sight returns, you are stunned to find that your house is all alone on a giant wooden plain, with a gigantic room around it. Next to you is a massive tree log with the number (2) printed in large font. It's at that moment that you realize that this is no tree... it's a pencil! You're still shrunk! You immediately spin around in anger, only to find a familiar goddess staring down at you and reaching for you with a massive thumb and forefinger. You are paralyzed with fear: She looks even larger than before! "YAY! THE MASTER HAS DECIDED TO COME OUT AND PLAY AFTER ALL!" You are gripped tightly between the humongous digits and lifted up to Inara's face, which blows you a massive kiss that blows your hair back slightly. Her wicked, playful grin returns as the index finger of her free hand reaches down to stroke your hair while you dangle helplessly between her huge thumb and pointer. "YOU SEEM TROUBLED, MASTER. IS THIS NOT WHAT YOU WANTED?" You go red in the face and scream up at the genie "Of course not! Look at me! You were supposed to make me and the house larger than it was before, not smaller!" You are breathing heavily and distraught by the giantess's constant playful prodding, but you're thrown for a loop when she raises an eyebrow and says "LITTLE MASTER, IT SEEMS AS IF YOU DON'T KNOW MUCH ABOUT PERSPECTIVE, DO YOU?"

You shudder to think of what she means by this but you ask regardless "P... Perspective?" She just grins and continues petting you, making you feel even smaller than your three-inch frame already suggests. "I DID EXACTLY WHAT YOU SAID, MASTER. I MADE THE HOUSE NORMAL SIZE COMPARED TO MYSELF. BUT YOU DIDN'T SAY COMPARED TO WHAT VERSION OF MYSELF, NOW DID YOU?" You slap your hand against your face in frustration as it starts to make sense, and you say out loud "Oh, god, you mean..." After a small laugh, Inara completes your thoughts. "INDEED MASTER. IN ORDER FOR ME TO FIT MYSELF IN MY BOTTLE, I HAVE TO REDUCE MYSELF TO QUITE A SMALL SIZE. IF I WANTED TO MAKE YOUR HOUSE LARGE ENOUGH TO FIT SOMEONE OF MY STATURE, I'D HAVE TO LEAVE THE BOTTLE. SO I DID, AND IN THE PROCESS BECAME MUCH LARGER. YOU'RE ABOUT AS SMALL AS I WAS JUST A FEW MOMENTS AGO, SO YOUR WISH WAS GRANTED. IN FACT, YOU'RE AN INCH OR SO LARGER. AREN'T I GENEROUS?" You don't allow yourself to thank the genie for the act of "kindness" she's shown you by only making you the size of a mouse and not a bug, instead offering a defeated half-hearted smile. Inara's palm opens up and you are exposed and under her gaze as she looks down upon her toy in her hand and says "I BELIEVE IT'S TIME FOR MY NEXT WISH, ISN'T IT, MASTER?" You are not happy that she's twisting your experience like this, but are completely powerless since you're smaller than her thumb. She thinks for a second and makes her wish...
151133112.title: Larger than before... but still Tiny!

choices: You manage to get your wish out and save yourself from Inara's wrath... for now.
Inara stops you before you can make your wish. Punishment time continues.
151133113.content:
You were sick of being treated like a toy. After everything you had been through, this was the last straw. Had you been in a more proper state of mind, you would have thought things through and realized how absolutely stupid what you were about to do was, but right now you weren't in a more proper state of mind. You were pissed, and in a fit of blind rage, you grabbed the nearest object and threw it as hard as you could out the window at Inara's eye.

"Just leave me alone already, you oversized bitch!" you yelled as the object flew through the air.

As soon as the object collided with her eye, the giantess genie flinched backward in pain, rubbing her eye for a moment before quickly regaining her composure and glaring at you. Immediately you regretted your foolish action, but it was too late to take it back now. Inara was now far more enraged than you were before.

"MASTER, YOU JUST MADE A GRAVE MISTAKE. ALL I WANTED TO DO WAS PLAY WITH YOU A BIT, AND THIS IS HOW YOU RESPOND? THAT REALLY HURT, YOU KNOW!
