MAYBE YOU DON'T FULLY UNDERSTAND YOUR SITUATION RIGHT NOW, BUT I'M A LOT BIGGER THAN YOU ARE AND I HAVE MAGICAL POWERS. YOU REALLY SHOULD HAVE KNOWN BETTER THAN TO PISS ME OFF. SINCE YOU'RE SO EAGER TO GET ON MY BAD SIDE, MAYBE I SHOULD GIVE YOU A TASTE OF EXACTLY WHAT I CAN DO TO YOU WHEN I'M ANGRY!" Inara said, before quickly snapping her fingers.

Suddenly four miniature clones of Inara appeared around you, each just slightly shorter than you. The Inara clones grabbed hold of you, two of them roughly gripping your wrists and the other two wrapping their arms around your upper arms. Despite appearances, each of these slender and sexy Inaras was actually far stronger than you were. With all four of them holding on to you so tightly the way they were, you were completely unable to move.

"You've been a naughty boy, master." the Inara holding your left wrist said.

"You really shouldn't have made the big me angry, master." said the Inara on your right wrist.

"Yeah, that was definitely a bad idea, master." The Inara on your left upper arm said.

"Too bad for you, it's too late to say you're sorry, master." said the Inara on your right upper arm.

"Now it's punishment time, master!" all four of them said in unison.

Each of them squeezed you more tightly as the word master left their lips, causing you to wince in pain from their incredible strength. The final squeeze was so intense that your eyes began to tear up from the pain. You were certain that they could easily have snapped your arms like twigs if they put any more force into their squeezing. All the while, the original Inara was still staring at you through the window. As she saw the pained expression on your face, she began to giggle mischievously.

Hearing the giant Inara's giggling, you looked up at her with pleading eyes. You didn't know what she was planning to do to you next, but you didn't want any part of it. And you could get out of it. Despite the unquestionable power that Inara had over you, she was still your genie. If you wished for her to stop, she would have no choice but to obey.

As you open your mouth to make the wish...
151133113.title: Invoking Inara's Wrath

choices: Use your wish to free Inara.
Use your wish to try and control Inara.
1511331132.content:
As soon as you began to open your mouth, Inara had a pretty good idea of what you were going to say. Needless to say, she wasn't going to let those words leave your lips until she had finished punishing you. With the snap of her fingers, she summoned one more clone of herself directly behind you. unlike the other clones, this one was a few inches taller than you. Before you could say a word, this clone clasped her hands over your mouth, silencing you. She then rested her chin on your shoulder and sensually whispered into your ear.

"I hope you weren't trying to wish your way out of your punishment, master. Sorry, but I'm not going to let that happen. You have to see your punishment through to the end." this fifth Inara said.

"THAT'S RIGHT, MASTER. MY LITTLE ASSISTANTS WON'T BE LETTING YOU GO UNTIL YOU'VE LEARNED YOUR LESSON." Inara said, snapping her fingers a third time.

This time, rather than spawning more clones, you found yourself and the clones teleported out of your house and in front of Inara's massive feet. Inara then pointed downward and wiggled her toes, and the clones quickly forced you down to your hands and knees so that your face was inches away from the big toe of her right foot.

"NOW, IT'S TIME TO BEGIN YOUR PUNISHMENT. YOU MAY BE MY MASTER, BUT I'M STILL SUPERIOR TO YOU IN EVERY POSSIBLE WAY. I'M GOING TO MAKE SURE THAT YOU KNOW YOUR PLACE FROM NOW ON. NOW, WORSHIP THE FEET OF YOUR BETTER, MASTER." Inara said.

Before you even had a chance to respond, the bigger clone let go of your mouth and grabbed you by the hair, forcing your face into the flesh of Inara's toe.

"Hurry up and kiss your genie's toes, master." The large clone said.

Unable to resist, you did as you were told and planted kiss after kiss on the giant toe of your genie. After a while the clones dragged you over to the next toe and forced you to kiss that one. Even without the large clone's hand on your mouth, you couldn't wish your way out of this situation. Any time that your face left Inara's toe for more than a second, the clones would immediately and roughly force you right back into it. This routine continued until all of Inara's toes had been kissed several dozen times each.

At this point, Inara gestured for the clones to release you. By her command, they haphazardly shoved you down in front of her feet and stepped away. Without a word and before you even had a chance to move, Inara planted her big toe on top of your head and began pressing down. Immediately you felt a splitting headache as the colossal toe squeezed your skull against the ground. Just when you thought that Inara was going to pop your head like a grape under her toe, she defied your expectations by lifting it off of you and allowing you to stand.

"NOW MASTER, TELL ME. HAVE YOU LEARNED YOUR PLACE YET?" Inara asked, a dominant smirk on her beautiful face.

After what you had just endured, you were absolutely terrified of Inara. You now saw very clearly that you were her master in name only. As you looked up at her now, you could only see her as an all-powerful goddess. And considering the power of her magic, she might as well actually be a goddess.

"Yes Goddess Inara, I know my place now. Please, have mercy on me." you begged, dropping to your knees once more and bowing before Inara's perfection.

Inara couldn't help but giggle as she heard you call her Goddess. Her powers were indeed comparable to that of a goddess, but although she could freely make use of her magic while within her lamp, she was only able to use it in response to her master's wishes in the outside world. This was the main reason she had decided to transport your home inside of her lamp in the first place. Originally she had only intended to have a little fun playing with you, but with the way things had developed, perhaps she could make use of this to finally free herself from the limits of her lamp. If nothing else, it was worth a try.

"VERY WELL THEN, MASTER. SINCE YOU NOW ACKNOWLEDGE MY SUPERIORITY, I THINK IT'S TIME FOR YOU TO PROVE YOUR LOYALTY TO YOUR GODDESS. I WANT YOU TO WISH ME FREE, SO THAT MY POWERS WILL NO LONGER BE BOUND TO THIS LAMP. IF YOU AGREE TO DO THIS FOR ME, THEN I SHALL FORGIVE YOU FOR YOUR FOOLISH ATTEMPT TO INFLICT HARM ON ME." Inara said, playing up the goddess act as much as she could in hopes of finally being free.


Inara is giving you an opportunity to make a wish. How will you respond to this? Will you make the wish that Inara wants you to? Or will you use your wish to try and gain complete control of this almighty goddess?
1511331132.title: There's no escape from Inara's wrath

choices: She wants to spend time with you alone.
She wants to let of some steam after being imprisoned for so long.
15113311321.content:
You were torn. She was letting you utter a wish. You could use this opportunity to free yourself. But you had to choose carefully to not get trapped again. On the other hand, in spite of the pain you had endured and the fact that you were more than terrified by the genie, you had to admit that a part of you liked the situation. You enjoyed being helpless before Inara's feet. You felt pleasure when the genie dominated you. If you would free her, she could dominate you outside as well. Maybe she would reward you and keep you.

Finally, you made up your mind. "I wish you were free."

Inara blinked. She had not expected you to actually fulfill her request. All former masters she had brought to this point had tried to regain control. Of course, they had failed and ended up how they deserved. But this one was different. A smile formed on the genies face. With a snap of her fingers, your wish was granted.

Next, you found yourself outside the lamp. Inara stood next to you. Immediately, you realized how much power she was radiating. Her face blushed as her hands shook with excitement. She looked at the lamp in her hand. "Yes, I am finally free of this." With that, the lamp shrank to the size of a pebble. Inara lifted her free hand, extended her finger and crushed the lamp. She laughed in disbelief. Then, the reality of the situation finally hit her.

"I am free!", she cheered, flying up in the air. "No more walls! I feel like ... expanding!" With that, she started to grow rapidly. Bigger and bigger and bigger she became, until all of the surrounding area was cast in shadow. Then, she flew away, vanishing behind the horizon. For a moment you thought she had abandoned you, but then something caught your eye that made your breath halt.

Behind the horizon, the black hair of Inara's head appeared, followed by her face. Like a sun her face rose up. No, it was way bigger than the sun. And she was still growing. Soon, her eyes were all that dominated the sky. "I was trapped in a puny lamp on this planet and now this puny planet is trapped in my hand!" Her voice echoed across the land.

You gasped and fell on your knees. What had you unleashed? Suddenly, she disappeared, only to reappear at normal size right before you. Her toes wriggled. "You are allowed to kiss them." It sounded more like a command than an offer. You obeyed. "Fine. Good boy. Now get up." You obeyed again.

Inara grinned confidently. "What you just saw was just a small display of my power. But now to you." A necklace appeared around her neck. It held not a jewel, but a small cage which partially vanished between her breasts. You had a bad feeling about this.

"You only wished for me to be free, but I saw in your eyes what you really wanted.", She continued. "You want to be my obedient slave. You did not wish for that, however, and I have no obligation to fulfill your wishes anymore. But I'll fulfill that wish nonetheless. See it as a reward for your kindness."

With that, you found reality around you shifting. In one instance you were standing before her, in the next you were trapped in the small cage on her necklace. Again, you fell to your knees. The sensations were overwhelming. You heard her breathing, felt her thunderous heartbeat and smelled her sweat scent.

"Are you enjoying this." She knocked against the cage with a finger. Shocked and aroused, you realized that her nail was bigger than your entire body.

"Yes, my goddess."

She giggled. Had you been her size, it would have sounded cute, but now, it was like an earthquake. "That is good. Now, my limits are gone. What shall I do?"
15113311321.title: A goddess unleashed

choices: She lifts up a foot to crush you and your castle!
She smiles as a giant crab comes wandering in to get you!
She laughs and walks away as she notices the tide coming in!
1511332.content: Inara raises an eyebrow and bites her lip in concentration, before she lets out a small laugh and says "Okay, Master. Your wish is my command." She waves her arms and in a bright light you find yourself transported far away. When your vision returns, you wipe some of the sand off of you and realize that you're in a flowing red robe with a large golden crown laying on your head. She did it! You're actually the king! You look around your immediate area and find that you're in an empty room with grainy brown walls. The entire hallway seems to be made of the same rough texture, even the floors. The ground is damp but firm under your feet as you make your way through the halls and notice that there's nobody there. Great, you think. This is the trick she pulled on you. You're a king alone in a castle with no servants or anything. Out of frustration, you kick the nearest wall to you... and your foot goes right through it! You pull your leg out to find it covered in the soft building material, and you pick up some of the debris between your hands, watching in shock as it seems to rub away between your fingers, almost as if it were made of dirt! You get furious now and shout out "Inara! Show yourself, I demand to know what you did!" That's when you hear a booming voice all around you say "COMING MASTER!" The voice was so powerful it nearly shook you to your core. Why is her voice so massive like that! You get your answer almost immediately as the nearest window in the castle is darkened by an object appearing from the outside. You nearly faint from fright when you see that it's a massive hazel-green eye focusing in on you. "THERE YOU ARE MASTER! WHAT DO YOU WISH OF ME?" You stand back up and can barely talk you're so frightened and angry. "What the hell did you do to me? Why are you so big?" The eye narrows a bit as Inara's wicked laughter fills your ears. "WHY MASTER... I HAVEN'T GOTTEN ANY LARGER SINCE WE LAST TALKED FACE TO FACE. IT WOULD SEEM THAT YOU'RE THE ONE WHO'S GOTTEN A LOT SMALLER!" The eye disappears as you hear rumbling all around you with every footstep the massive woman takes. A humongous finger comes plowing through the ceiling, sending mountains of dirt all around you. And through the opening, your jaw drops as you see the beautiful form of Inara the genie, looking down at you wearing nothing but a skimpy black bikini. She's got a wicked, confident smirk as she puts her hands on her hips and bends down to get a better look at you. "HOW DO YOU LIKE YOUR CASTLE, MASTER? I WANTED TO MAKE IT AS LARGE AS YOU DESIRED, BUT THERE JUST WASN'T ENOUGH GOOD SAND TO PACK IT WITH." The realization hits you as you run back to the window and look out of it. From your perspective you see huge, powerful waves, a massive sandy desert and... other gigantic people in the distance. The genie gave you a castle alright... but it was a sandcastle! She laughs at your frantic movements saying "IF ONLY YOU HAD LISTENED TO ME. I WOULD HAVE BEEN VERY KIND TO YOU IF YOU WEREN'T SO GREEDY. BUT NOW LOOK AT YOU. KING OF THE BUGS IN A CUTE LITTLE SAND CASTLE!" You shout up at Inara to change you back, but she can't hear you! Your voice must be so tiny that she can't hear your requests unless her head is right down there next to you. You start punching walls again in frustration when Inara's powerful voice catches your attention again... "YOU SHOULD WATCH OUT, LITTLE MASTER. BEING IN THERE AT THAT TEENY SIZE COULD PROVE TO BE QUITE DANGEROUS... EVEN FOR A KING SUCH AS YOURSELF."
1511332.title: King of the Sand Castle

choices: It's the witch!  And she's looking down at you with an evil grin!
It's the witch's young apprentice... and she doesn't see you!
It's a girl from the nearby village... And she's about to touch the book too!
1512.content: You walk ahead with your vision still blurry, and only stop when you come into contact with some nasty spider webs and bushes. You push your way through the mess, and find yourself in front of a small wooden cabin. It looks mostly dilapidated with a few windows broken and the door almost entirely broken in, but you walk up to it anyway. You still have no idea where you are, and maybe this house has a phone. You peek around the side of the house and come to the conclusion that the place is empty. But you also notice that the back door is open, so you slowly approach it, letting yourself in. You look around the cabin and see that it's modeled like a halloween store. Cobwebs and dusty jars decorate the shelves. A huge empty cauldron sits in the unlit fireplace. There are old books and cages all throughout the small open room. "This is weird... almost like a witch lives here or something." You decide that it's just not worth it and back away towards the door. However, you bump into an end-table near the door instead, knocking a book off of the surface. You go to pick it up and put it back, but you've lost the page it was resting on. Shit. You flip through it for anything that looks like a bookmark, when the page you've landed on starts glowing. You start to back away, but a bright blue light seems to shoot out of the page, covering your body in a warm, tingly glow. The end-table starts to rise higher into the air, and you realize that you're getting shorter! You swear you could hear Madame Rosella's laughter ring through your ears as the world around you gets bigger and bigger. You are paralyzed with fear as you feel every cell of your body shrink to tiny size. You finally stop dwindling when you reach about 4 inches tall... you're no bigger than a mouse! "What the hell happened... was it the book!" You stop talking when you realize that your voice is incredibly squeaky and high pitched, like you'd just sucked down a whole balloon's worth of helium. You look up at the now gigantic end-table in front of you, wondering just how the hell you'll be able to get back to normal. You were so deep in thought, that you barely noticed the rumblings behind you of another person... that is, until a huge open-toed black shoe stomps right beside you. You jump back in fear as it's greeted by a twin piece of footwear on your other side. You take a big gulp, knowing that these huge feet belong to somebody... and you slowly pan up to see just who that person is!
1512.title: A Witch's Cabin

choices: She believes you, and lets you live!
She doesn't believe you, and throws you out into the woods!
She doesn't believe you, and tries to kill you!
15121.content: You were in awe of the giant witch who stood before you with her hands on her hips. She was by no means an ugly witch, in fact she was quite attractive. She was a thin, busty woman, with curly red hair and piercing green eyes. She was dressed in a long black robe, with fishnet stockings leading down to her open toed shoes. The toes were painted black and wiggled with delight as the giant woman smirked down from above. "WELL, WELL. WHAT DO WE HAVE HERE? A PUNY LITTLE MORTAL TRYING TO STEAL MY BOOK?" You start to back up, but her movement is too quick. You don't even have time to turn around before you come face to face with a huge open palm that presses firmly into your body, while tree trunk sized fingers wrap around your waist. You are lifted into the air and taken across the room, where the giant witch drops you harshly onto a wooden table. She takes a seat and places a huge hand on either side of you, smirking as she says "YOU'RE NOT GOING ANYWHERE, HUMAN. NOW TELL ME... HOW DID YOU FIND THIS PLACE?" You look up at her scoweling face, and stammer out how you were transported by a crazy gypsy at the fair and don't even know where you are right now. She frowns and slams a giant fist into the table next to you, knocking you off of your feet. "LIAR! I KNOW YOU'RE ONE OF THOSE PEOPLE FROM TOWN. PEOPLE HAVE BEEN TRYING FOR YEARS TO FIND MY CABIN AND STEAL MY SPELLBOOK. I KNEW EVENTUALLY ONE OF YOU WOULD FIND ME, THAT'S WHY I PUT THAT CHARM ON THE BOOK TO SHRINK WHOEVER TRIED TO TOUCH IT." Her fist opens up and she points down at you, shoving you gently with her fingertip. "AND NOW LOOK AT YOU. JUST A MOUSE OF A MAN." You stand up and shout at her "Look, lady. I didn't mean to touch your stuff. I'm not a villager, I'm not even from around here. I'm just looking to get back home to my girlfriend. I'm sorry for trespassing, now please... change me back and let me go!" You really wish your voice hadn't sounded so squeaky and pathetic, but you told her everything and now it was up to her. You can tell she's conflicted as she drums her huge fingers on the table and brushes strands of her long red hair out of the way as she stares down at you. She holds your fate at her fingertips... what will she do with you?
15121.title: The Witch Decides Your Fate

choices: You grow a few inches:  You are her newest pet.
You grow a few feet:   You are her newest servant.
151211.content:
The witch's giant lips curl up into a noticeable frown as she holds you in front of her face. She lets out a small sigh and says "WELL, YOUR STORY IS QUITE CONVINCING. BESIDES, YOU REALLY DO SEEM TO BE SURPRISED BY MY PRESENCE... AND YOUR CLOTHES DO NOT SEEM TO BE REMINISCENT OF ANYTHING WE SELL IN TOWN. PERHAPS YOU ARE TELLING THE TRUTH AFTER ALL." You almost cry out of happiness and clasp your hands together, thanking the giant woman for reconsidering. In the middle of your appreciative rants however, the witch presses a massive finger up to your face, instructing you to shush. "HOWEVER. I CAN'T HAVE ANY OUTSIDERS KNOWING ABOUT THE LOCATION OF MY HOME. I'M AFRAID I CAN'T LET YOU LEAVE SO EASILY." You keep your hands clenched, now in a begging state, screaming up at her "Please! I don't even know where this place is. I just appeared here! Isn't there anything I can do to convince you?" The giant redhead is barely able to keep a laugh supressed as she bites her index finger in a twisted smile, almost like she's contemplating exactly what to do with your miniscule form. "I HAVE A FEW IDEAS OF HOW YOU COULD BE QUITE USEFUL TO ME. SO I WOULD LIKE YOU TO LISTEN TO MY PROPOSITION..."

The fingers holding you release you quickly and you freefall for a few terrifying seconds before landing in the witch's open palm. The soft skin cushions your fall, and you immediately snap your attention back to her as she hovers over you with her enormous face. "YOU WANT TO BE BACK AMONG THE WORLD OF THE LIVING? YOU'LL STAY WITH ME FOR A SHORT PERIOD OF TIME AND ENTERTAIN MY NEEDS. IF I AM PLEASED WITH YOUR BEHAVIOR, YOU WILL NOT ONLY GET YOUR SIZE BACK, BUT I WILL TRANSPORT YOU TO ANYPLACE YOU'D LIKE TO GO. DO WE HAVE A DEAL?" She brings her free hand over towards you and extends her pinkie out, insisting that you shake it to seal the agreement. You figure she can't back down from the deal once it's struck, and no matter when she releases you, you'll be happy to be back to normal and away from this place. You walk over to her extended finger and grab the overlaying nail with both hands, slightly shaking it up and down. You feel a stinging pain on your arm and lift up your sleeve to see a small brand forming, in a language you can't understand. The witch cackles above you and says "EXCELLENT. WITH THAT BRAND THE DEAL HAS BEEN SEALED. YOU WILL WEAR THAT MARK UNTIL I RELEASE YOU FROM MY SERVICE. IF YOU ATTEMPT TO ESCAPE THE CABIN BEFORE I AGREE TO LET YOU GO, YOU WILL BE ABSORBED BY MY MAGIC, AND BECOME A PART OF ME FOREVER." You take a big gulp as she smirks and lowers you down to the ground by her feet. Her toes wiggle in anticipation, obviously excited by the fact that she will have a new human to toy around with. She raises a hand over you and you feel a tingling sensation around every extremity. Your vision reaches a little bit above the sole of her shoe, and you realize she's making you bigger! But how much bigger... and what is your new role in life?
151211.title: You are The Witch's Property

choices: It's the witch, looking to play for a while!
It's her assistant Natalia, investigating a noise she heard!
1512111.content:
A massive shadow covers you as the witch bands down and reaches for you with one hand. "THAT'S BETTER. STILL SMALL ENOUGH TO FIT IN MY HAND, BUT BIG ENOUGH FOR ME TO SEE CLEARLY." She scoops you up effortlessly in her fist and holds you up to her beaming face. She giggles at the sight of you squirming in her grasp and says "JUST REMEMBER THIS WILL LAST AS LONG AS YOU DECIDE IT DOES. IF YOU PUT ALL YOUR EFFORT INTO BEING THE BEST LITTLE PET I'VE EVER HAD, YOUR TIME AT THIS TEENY SIZE WILL BE... SHORT." She laughs at her own joke and stomps across the room to unlock a closet in the corner. The closet is empty with the exception of a few boxes, a pair of thick leather gloves resting on a shelf, and a massive, gold plated birdcage covered in a red velvet cloth. She lifts the cloth off and unlatches the door, carelessly tossing you inside. You are barely up on your feet before you hear the mechanism lock behind you, trapping you in the elevated cage. You are about waist high to the giantess, but she bends over to look at you with her bright green eyes. She wipes waves of red hair out of her face as she twists her lips into a wicked smirk. She

"DON'T WANT YOU WANDERING AROUND UNDERFOOT, SO THIS SHOULD KEEP YOU OUT OF TROUBLE FOR THE NIGHT. UNLESS YOU THINK YOU'D BE ABLE TO SURVIVE THE FALL, THEN I COULD JUST AS EASILY KEEP THE DOOR UNLOCKED." You walk over to the cage door, and look down peering through the bars. Just following down the length of the Witch's dress was enough to give you slight feelings of vertigo, but this height off the ground made you physically nauseous as you gazed upon the goddess's feet, toes wiggling with delight at your miniature stature. You take a few steps back and the witch cackles with delight. "HEH, JUST WHAT I THOUGHT. GLAD TO SEE YOU CAN ACCEPT YOUR SITUATION. I'VE NEVER HAD A PET LIVE LONG ENOUGH FOR ME TO RE-ENLARGE THEM, BUT YOU AT LEAST SHOW A BIT OF COMMON SENSE. PERHAPS YOU'LL BE THE FIRST!" Before you can protest, the giantess takes the red cloth and covers the cage yet again, leaving you in a crimson-tinted darkness. Her footsteps follow slowly out of the room and you hear the door to the closet close behind her as she continues walking around the cabin. You figure there's nothing you can do but sit and wait for her to let you out, since your body is too small to even BEGIN to squeeze through the bars. It's weird to think that you were actually wishing to be just a bit smaller so you could attempt a half-brained escape. Anything was better than accepting defeat!

But you realize your situation is inescapable for the moment and lay down on the soft padding of the cage. It wasn't entirely uncomfortable and you actually find yourself dozing off in the darkness of the cage. You are startled awake what seems like hours later by a loud, continuous thumping noise. It's the sound of footsteps... someone is coming to check up on you. You stand up in anticipation as you see the shadow of a gigantic hand grab at the thick red covering and expose your cage to the harsh light of the room. You hold your hands up in front of your eyes, waiting to adjust to the brightness, and when you do, you can clearly see the face of the giant before you...
1512111.title: Trapped in a Birdcage

choices: "A... LITTLE PERSON?!"  She says as she lays down a hand to let you climb on
"ANOTHER LITTLE PERSON!"  She says as she roughly grabs you with two fingers
"A NASTY LITTLE BUG!"  She says as she reaches a hand up to squish you!
15122.content: You slowly traced the footwear up to the body it was connected to and saw that it wasn't an old, scary witch like you were expecting. This girl couldn't have been older than 18. She was wearing a tight grey tank top and had a black sweatshirt wrapped around her waist. Her face was freckled and she was wearing thick glasses, but her face was hard to pay attention to once you saw her dyed dark purple hair. She was tapping her feet, causing shockwaves to pass through your whole body as you stared up at the giant cutie. The girl rolled her eyes and boomed "WELL, THE MISTRESS HASN'T RETURNED YET. I GUESS I'LL CLEAN UP A BIT." The mistress? Of course! She must be the witch's apprentice! The collosal teenager pivots on her foot, letting one leg completely fly over you. You stare up in amazement as her leg passes over you, taking in a moment of unintentionaly perverseness as you see her bright pink panties directly above you. The foot comes crashing down, snapping you back to reality as you watch her walk to the other side of the room and start dusting the shelves. You don't know anything about this girl, but you know for a fact you don't want to take your chances on the outside at this size. You decide to get her attention, and see if she can help you get back to normal. After all, the witch's apprentice has to know at least a few spells, right? Maybe the one that shrunk you is simple enough for her to reverse. You run across the huge expanse of the floor, until you come back to where you started... at the young woman's toes. She has headphones in her ears blasting punk rock music, so no matter how loud you yell, there wouldn't be a chance for her to hear you. So you decide to climb up the platform of her shoe, almost slipping a few times on the slick leather, and stand right up in front of her big toe. The smell of her feet is seeping through the opening, and the stench is getting very distracting, but you know that you have to get her attention from here. You bang your fists onto the girl's hard nails, trying desperately to get her to notice you. It works, but not in the way you expected. You are so small that all your furious pounding has amounted to is nothing but a tickle on her toe. "HEHEHE! WHAT IS THAT BY MY FOOT!" Her foot stomps up and down in reaction, causing you to fall back to the ground below. You take a minute to collect yourself, focusing on how better to get her attention... but you don't have to. While you had your eyes closed, the giant girl had dropped to her hands and knees to see what was bothering her. She was looking right at you with wide blue eyes, her huge mouth agape in surprise and intrigue. She leans in forward and squints to get a better look at you, until a moment of realization crosses her lips and she lets out a small, innocent looking smile. "SO YOU WERE WHAT WAS RUBBING UP AGAINST MY TOES, HUH?" What is her reaction?
15122.title: The Young Apprentice

choices: She agrees to help and takes a look at the spellbook!
She disagrees but promises to take care of you
Before she can choose, the Witch returns!
151221.content:
"WOW... A REAL LIVE PERSON, THE SIZE OF A MOUSE... THIS IS THE FIRST TIME I'M SEEING THIS SPELL IN PERSON!" The girl was almost a little excited seeing you so small, which causes you to back up a bit in reaction. She sees this and her face immediately gets sadder as she whispers "NO, NO! DON'T BE AFRAID! I'M NOT GOING TO HURT YOU... I'M THE MISTRESS'S APPRENTICE AND I LOOK AFTER THE CABIN WHILE SHE'S AWAY. WHAT'S YOUR NAME?" You gather up your courage and stammer out your name to her, which produces a wide toothy grin on her face. She reaches out her huge pinkie towards you and says "NICE TO MEET YOU. MY NAME IS NATALIE, BUT YOU CAN CALL ME NAT." You slowly approach the extended digit and grasp it with both hands, shaking it up and down. She giggles in response and says "... I DON'T FEEL LIKE BENDING DOWN MUCH LONGER THOUGH. CARE FOR A LIFT?" Her hand flattens out on the ground, laying palm up and you take this as an invitation to climb aboard. Hoisting yourself over her middle finger, you slowly walk towards the center the hand and sit indian-style on the soft flesh. She smiles as she says "OKAY. GOING UP!"
You brace yourself for the g-force of rising into the air, but the experience is surprisingly pleasant. The girl is obviously taking care not to toss you around too much, and even places her free hand underneath the one you're sitting in to balance it further. You look up at her pretty face, marveling at the fact that something so big could be so delicate at the same time. The giant girl sits down in a chair close to the unlit fireplace and lifts you up to her eye. The giant blue iris traces over your little body, the only thing seperating you being a small amount of air and the thick glass wall that makes up her spectacles. Her voice is still a whisper, you guess to protect your tiny ears from exploding. "NOW TELL ME, HOW DID YOU SHRINK DOWN LIKE THIS?" You tell the story to the giant girl about the gypsy woman transporting you to the cabin out of nowhere, bumping into the book and finding yourself between Nat's feet. The whole time you tell the story, the giant girl is lightly stroking your back with her free hand's pinkie. You feel a little embarassed to be coddled and prodded like a pet, but at the same time, you can't help but find it unbelievably soothing. Nat smiles at the end of your tale and says "YOU'VE CERTAINLY HAD A BUSY DAY, IT SEEMS. I WISH THERE WAS SOMETHING I COULD DO FOR YOU." You look up at her and clear your throat before saying "Well, actually... maybe you could convince your mistress to change me back? I'd be eternally grateful!" Nat lets out a sigh and says "I'M SURE THAT THE MISTRESS WOULD HAVE NO PROBLEM RETURNING YOU TO YOUR NORMAL SIZE... THAT IS... IF SHE WISHES TO." You scream up at her "What do you mean 'If she wishes to'? Why wouldn't she?" Nat bites her lip and whispers matter of factly "THE MISTRESS SEEMS TO HAVE ISSUES WITH MEN. SHE'S ALWAYS COMING UP WITH NEW WAYS TO PUNISH THEM FOR TRESPASSING INTO THE CABIN. I HAVE A FEELING IF SHE WERE TO SEE YOU LIKE THIS, SHE'D BE THRILLED TO KEEP YOU SO TINY." You pace around in the girl's palm, before looking up at her and saying "Well then... could you try and change me back yourself?" Her face gets a little flustered and she says "ME? WELL... I'VE NEVER TRIED A SPELL THAT COMPLICATED BEFORE. AS IT TURNS OUT, MAKING SOMETHING LITTLE IS A LOT EASIER THAN MAKING IT BIGGER. PLUS, THE MISTRESS WOULD BE ABLE TO SENSE IT IF I HAD ATTEMPTED SUCH A SPELL IN HER HOME." You get down on your knees in the girl's hand, and clasp your hands together tightly to bring home how desperate you are at this point. "Please try and help me... I appreciate how nice you're being to me right now, but it's so terrifying being so small like this. I just want to go home." You can tell that Nat is thinking her options over as she cracks a smile and stands back up out of the chair. What does she decide to do with you?
151221.title: In Nat's Hands

choices: It works!  You're getting bigger!
It doesn't work!  You're still the same size!
It doesn't work!  You're getting even smaller!
1512211.content:
With an innocent smile, Nat brings you in her palm up close to her face and whispers "WHAT THE HECK. LET'S TAKE A LOOK AT THAT BOOK." You get off your knees and shout up at her "Really? You'd do that for me?" She smiles and says "SURE. AFTER ALL, IF IT DOESN'T WORK, WE COULD AT LEAST SAY I TRIED." You are so overjoyed with the news that you run over to the girl's extended thumb and wrap your arms around it, giving it a big kiss. You are thrown off by the force of her giggling and she says "COME ON. IF WE DO THIS FAST ENOUGH, YOU CAN THANK ME BY GIVING ME A KISS FOR REAL." She carries you over to the table you bumped into and grabs the book with one hand, opening it up. She begins to thumb through it's pages for the section that you were shrunk by, and something startling hits you. "Hey, how come I just bumped into the book and it did this to me, but you can look through it without any problems?" She keeps looking at the book, concentrating on the text, but she does answer you without looking up.

"IT'S BECAUSE I'VE BEEN TRAINING WITH THE MISTRESS FOR SEVERAL YEARS NOW. THE BOOK IS MEANT TO PUNISH ANYBODY WHO TOUCHES IT WITHOUT HER APPROVAL WITH WHATEVER PAGE YOU LAND ON. IN FACT, WHEN I WAS FIRST GETTING USED TO MY POWERS, I WAS TURNED INTO A CAT BY MISTAKE!" You were amazed by this and asked "A cat?! That's a bit ironic, don't you think, since your name rhymes and all? Jeez, what was that like?" She just giggles and says "IT WAS A LITTLE HAIRY, BUT OTHER THAN THAT WAS SURPRISINGLY PLEASANT. THE MISTRESS SAYS THAT YOU RETAIN SOME TRAITS OF EVERY TRANSFORMATION YOU UNDERGO, WHICH PROBABLY EXPLAINS WHY I HAVE A LITTLE DESIRE TO POP YOU INTO MY MOUTH AND SWALLOW YOU LIKE A NAUGHTY LITTLE MOUSE." You immediately get nervous sitting in the cute girl's hand and that's when she looks over at you and says "I'M KIDDING. I HATED IT. IT FEELS SO WEIRD TO BE IN A STATE BESIDES YOUR OWN BODY. I'M SURE YOU KNOW WHAT THAT'S LIKE, BEING HELD BY A GIRL LIKE ME LIKE SOME SORT OF DOLL."

You couldn't deny that it was an adjustment, to say the least, but you were actually pretty happy to be in the girl's hand. Her skin was soft, her voice was soothing, and you could feel her body heat all around you. In all actuality, if you found that there was a way for you to return back to normal fairly easily, you wouldn't mind toying around with the whole "being tiny" thing again. As long as your cute friend here was willing to play the part of your giant host. Nat continues reading through the book until she comes across a page and points to it. "LOOK AT THIS! "REDUCTION AND GROWTH - ALTERING THE SIZE OF YOUR FOES AND ALLIES TO FIT YOUR NEEDS'! WE FOUND IT!" Sure enough you look at the page and although the book is written in an unknown text, there are a few illustrations that drive the point home. One is a picture of a little person standing next to a thimble, both of which are the same size. You were a little relieved that you weren't QUITE that small as of yet. The other illustration was of a giant towering above a small series of trees. You don't want to be QUITE that big, but you're glad to know that it's an option!

You look up at your new giant friend and say "If this is the spell, are you going to be able to read it? I know you said there could be problems." Nat looks a bit concerned and says "IT'S A FEW YEARS OR SO AHEAD OF MY CURRENT LEVEL... BUT I THINK IT'S WORTH A TRY. AND IF IT DOESN'T WORK, I PROMISE TO TAKE GOOD CARE OF YOU UNTIL YOU CAN GET THE HELP YOU NEED!" You are so attracted to this girl's kindness, you actually have to stop yourself from hugging her huge finger again. Instead you just hold your hands together and bow, almost like you were thanking a queen for allowing you to be in her presence. She gives off another heartwarming smile and lowers the hand you're standing on slowly to the ground. You jump off the palm and land on the ground at her feet, waiting patiently as she stands back up to her full height and grabs the book. Her toes wiggle a few seconds in anticipation before she grabs the book from the counter above you, and takes a step back. "OKAY, ARE YOU READY DOWN THERE?" You stand with your arms out and shout "Go ahead! Change me back!" She waits for a second and says "I COULDN'T HEAR THAT, BUT I'LL TAKE IT AS A YES."

Damn, you were so insignificant she couldn't hear you down by her feet. You couldn't wait to be back among the living. Holding the book in one hand, Nat begins reading the old text out loud. You don't undesrtand a word of the language, but you are amazed to see that she has her free hand extended, and it appears to be glowing. She gets to the last word of the spell, and the light surrounding her hand gets slightly brighter, before disappearing. Nat breathes out a sigh of relief, and you could tell that just that one attempt took a lot out of her. You still stand tiny at her feet and shout up (knowing full well she can't hear you.) "I guess it didn't work." Nat looks down from the book and with a slightly defeated look says "DO YOU FEEL ANYTHING? YOU KIND OF LOOK THE SAME."
1512211.title: Help from Nat

choices: You make it to the movie without incident
You meet someone else during the day
You start to shrink immediately after leaving!
15122111.content:
You throw your hands up and say "Well, thanks for trying anyway." But just a few seconds later, you feel a deep burning sensation in the pit of your stomach, almost as if a small campfire was just lit next to your bare stomach. The feeling spreads throughout your entire body, until you find Nat's feet getting slightly smaller. You look around and see that the furniture, the floorboards, the walls... they're all closing in on you quickly. You must be returning back to your normal size! The pretty girl before you is no longer building sized only that of a small house before she starts crouching down and squealing in joy. "YAY! IT WORKED! YOU'RE GETTING BIG AGAIN! I'M SO GLAD I WAS ABLE TO DO IT!" You want to thank her, but the sensation of growing is very strong and you feel every second of it. Unlike when you were shrunk, you are very much aware of your surroundings while regaining your height. You feel the sensation die down in your stomach and look ahead to see Nat's eyes looking slightly up. You can't imagine this girl was anywhere close to your height, and that's when her worried expression confirms your fears. You're not exactly as tall as you once were.

"Oops... uh... it doesn't look like it made you big all the way... you're only a little bit taller than me, and I'm just like 5 foot 4." You sigh and say "Oh well. Anything is better than nothing at this point. Thank you for everything, i really appreciate it." Nat starts to blush a bit and says "I... i believe you but, i remember you making a promise if i was able to get you back to your normal size...." You smile at her and say "It's not perfect, but it's close enough." And you lean in, cradling the back of your head as you give her a long, thankful kiss. She reciprocates, moaning as she twists her head around, getting as strong of a kiss back as she can, and shoving her tongue almost completely down your throat. You break apart first, obviously the weaker one in this situation and nervously smile at Nat. "So... uh, now that I'm somewhat normal again... do you maybe, want to do something sometimes?" Without missing a beat Nat blurts out "I like movies. Um. If, that's something you'd be interested in." You smile warmly back at her and try to smoothly say "Great. I'll see you at the movie theater at 7 tonight."

You start to walk out of the cabin, realizing stupidly that you have no way of contacting this girl. You quickly turn around and go to knock on the wooden door, when it swings open before you and Nat shyly holds a piece of paper out to you. "Here's my number. Call me when you get close. And don't think about coming late. I know some pretty interesting spells that could make your night slightly less enjoyable...." As soon as you grab the paper, she closes the door behind you and locks it, and you immediately feel a warm, fuzzy feeling inside. You're really falling for this girl. You kiss the paper with her name on it and decide to spend the rest of the day wandering through the new town, high on the fact that you've got a date with a pretty girl who was at one point big enough to hold you between two fingers. You don't even care that in the process you've lost almost a full foot of your normal height.
15122111.title: Back to Normal?

choices: She points at you - Shrinking you to tiny size!
She points at you - Transforming you into a piece of jewelry!
She points at a nerdy boy walking into the theater - Hypnotizing him!
151221111.content:
You'd decided not to wander the town at all, and instead walked to a nearby hotel, laying down until it was time to go out. You washed your clothes in the meantime, getting rid of some of the dust and dirt from when you were crawling around on the witche's floor. You made your way to the cinema in town a few minutes early, noticing that the theater was PACKED. You silently hoped you could get a ticket to whatever she wanted to see, and that's when you hear a familiar voice say "Hey! You made it!" You spin around to see Nat standing there, her cute frame just a few inches shorter than yours (thanks to your recent downsizing). Her hair was still the vibrant purple hue, only now she was wearing a very gothic black dress with nylon stockings. She looked incredibly cute, almost like a burlesque model, with not much but her black sweatshirt giving her warmth. You smiled as you took her in and said "I didn't want to be late. Someone kind of threatened me before."

She grabs your arm and says "Let's go in. They re-released Nightmare Before Christmas and this is the only place in town that's showing it. That's probably why all the people are here." You smirk at her and say "How did I know that would be the movie you'd want to see?" She laughs playfully and says "What can I say? The stereotypes make sense sometimes. Love me some Burton." You smile and walk up to the ticket counter, putting down money for two. The geeky kid behind the counter looks at you and says "Sorry dude. Only one seat left. You should have gotten your tickets online." You are crushed, not looking forward to turning back around and informing Nat of the bad news, but to your surprise she butts her way in front and says "That's okay. Just take the last one." You look at her with confusion but decide to go with it when she mouths the words "Trust me." For some reason, you totally do. You take the single ticket and walk back out of the line as Nat leads you into an alley next to the theater. "What was that all about? Why wouldn't i pick a different movie?" Nat just smiles coyly and says "Because i know a way where we can BOTH get in to see this movie. All it takes is a little magic."

She reaches into her bra and pulls out a folded piece of paper. As she unravels it before her she whispers "I had a feeling it would be tight tonight, so i made a copy of one of the pages from the witch's spellbook. I figured it would help us out." You start to ask "What spell are you going to..." When she holds up a finger to her lips and says "Shh... I need to concentrate. You stand with your hands to your sides, glancing at the single ticket. Nat closes her eyes and begins reciting a few lines of text that she's tried to memorize. When she finishes, to both of your surprise, her hand starts to glow slightly, She raises the hand and extends her index finger, giving you a bit of a jump as all the energy seems to rush right to her finger tip. She bites her lip as she raises an eyebrow and says "Okay... here goes nothing..."
151221111.title: Sneaking In With Magic

choices: You sit and enjoy the entire movie from her shoulder
You are knocked down into her cleavage accidentally!
You decide to climb down onto her lap for a while!
1512211111.content:
"Promise you won't be mad at me?" Before you can ask why you'd be mad, she points at your forehead and you feel a rush of energy surging through your body. "Oh no.... you didn't!" You say to your date as you notice that she seems to be getting taller and taller by the second. She memorized the spell that her mistress put on the book... and now she's using it to make you as tiny as you were before! In fact, by the time the shrinking stops, you think she's actually made you smaller than in your original meeting, since your vision barely comes up past the toe of her boot. You figure she's shrunk you down to almost 3 inches tall. When you finally manage to look back up at her, she's a goddess again. You were kind of hoping to have a date with her on a normal scale, but then again, when you decided to go out with a witch in the first place, you should have expected this to be part of the territory. She gently reaches down for you, wrapping your body in her soft palm. As you are brought back up to her face, she maneuvers her hand around so you are left hanging between two fingers, completely powerless to stop this cute giantess from manhandling you. She lets out a nervous grin and says "DEJA VU, HUH?" You are less than amused by her joke.

Her expression is one of guilty excitement as she looks around and then says "SO... HOW DO YOU FEEL?" You can only be honest as you cross your arms from your position in protest and say "Well, i was kind of hoping to never be this short again..." Natalie bites her lip and explains "I KNOW IT'S PROBABLY WEIRD TO BE SHRUNK AGAIN, BUT I FIGURED IT'S THE BEST WAY TO SNEAK YOU INTO THE MOVIE. PLUS, YOU'LL GET TO BE PRETTY CLOSE TO ME NOW THAT YOU'RE POCKET SIZE. IT'LL BE FUN! TRUST ME!" You sigh in defeat as you dangle helplessly from the pretty girl's fingers as her caring eyes look over your little body. She squints and lets out a pondering sound as she says "HMM... THE ONLY QUESTION IS WHERE TO KEEP YOU UNTIL WE GET INSIDE." Your mind races with possibilities and you can't help but look down at her exposed cleavage. This motion doesn't go undetected as the giantess whispers "UH UH, SHORT STUFF. FIRST DATE. YOU'RE NOT GETTING TO SECOND BASE THAT EASILY. YOU'LL RIDE IN MY PURSE." She opens her bag with her free hand and holds it up with her arm as she gently places you inside an empty pocket. You're glad she didn't just let you roam freely as she carried you or you had a possibility of being crushed by an oversized makeup kit or something. You feel her giant hand pat the outside of the bag as she says "HANG TIGHT, DOLL."

You feel like you're on a sort of strange, somewhat safer carnival ride as your giant date sneaks you into the theater. Every footstep she takes reminds you of just how small you are in relation to her, yet you're somehow comfortable with the whole situation. It's scary being tinier than the cell phone which is laying down right next to you, but you know that you'll be alright once you look into Nat's eyes one more time. After a few minutes, the bag comes to a rest and the zipper opens again above you. You expect a light to shine through and blind you, but it's surprisingly dark as you see her black-painted fingernails reach in for you and gently grab you again. You are rushed up to her mouth again and you feel her warm, minty breath surround you as she whispers "WE JUST MADE IT. AND DON'T WORRY, I SAVED YOU A SEAT." Her fingers softly deposit you on a smooth, warm surface and when the hand disappears, you see that she's let you sit on her bare shoulder, surrounded on two sides by her hair, and the other by her neck. You can clearly see the unbelievably large movie screen in front of you as the previews start and you take a deep breath, acknowledging that this is indeed the most remarkable thing you've ever experienced.

The giant face next to you whispers "HUNGRY?" And you see her huge thumb and forefinger gripping a single kernel of popcorn in front of you. It's almost half the size of your entire body! You grab at it with both hands and she fidgets slightly in her chair, causing you to shake a bit. you break off a piece of the popcorn with your hands and take a seat, your legs dangling off the edge of the giant girl's shoulder. This is going to be the greatest movie you've ever seen.
1512211111.title: Shrunk By Your Date

choices: Above her nose:  You're a nose piercing!
Above her breasts:  You're a pendant necklace!
Around her big toe:  You're a toe-ring!
1512211112.content:
"This is gonna seem a little weird, but i think it's the best option for right now." She presses her glowing finger up to her own lips before pressing it quickly against yours. You think she's just being sweet for a second, until you feel your body start to change. It's almost as if you're being levitated in the air as you feel every inch of your being transform into an ever shifting particle of dust. You almost scream out at the sight of your body being seemingly whisked away into thin air, until you find your whole being zooming in towards Natalie's hand. There is a bright flash of light, followed by nothing but darkness and relatively overwhelming silence. You slowly open your eyes and see Nat staring down at you... but her face is huge again! Just like when you were shrunk in the cabin, only she seems even bigger this time. You calmly ask her "Nat... did you shrink me again?" She just tilts her head a bit and without moving her lips, you hear her voice in your head say "UMMM, KIND OF. TRY NOT TO FREAK OUT, OKAY?" You are thrown back by her sudden use of ventriliquism and ask "How can i hear your voice? Your lips aren't moving... can I read minds now or something?" She answers back again without moving her mouth an inch "NOT ALL MINDS, JUST MINE. IT'S THE ONLY WAY I CAN COMMUNICATE WITH YOU WHILE YOU'RE IN THIS STATE." You are going to ask what she means by "state" but that's when another startling revalation occurs to you: You are unable to move.

Except for your eyes which can easily dart back and forth in any direction you choose, you can't move any other part of your body. "Nat... why am I stuck like this? What happened to me?" She bites her lip and her voice enters your head again. "OKAY, LOOK. I WANTED TO SNEAK YOU INSIDE THE THEATER, BUT THE ONLY WAY YOU WOULDN'T ATTRACT ATTENTION WAS IF I TURNED YOU INTO SOMETHING THAT I COULD EASILY PUT ON MY BODY WITHOUT ANYONE BEING THE WISER, SO I... KINDA SORTA... TURNED YOU INTO A PIECE OF JEWELRY." You are fuming as you motionlessly (and apparently wordlessly) communicate back to her from your position resting in her palm. "I'm a fucking piece of jewelry? Why? Why did you think this was the best option?" She raises an eyebrow and says "OH, CMON... IT"LL BE FUN! BESIDES IF YOU WANT TO BE TURNED INTO SOMETHING A LITTLE MORE INTIMATE, LIKE A BRA OR A PAIR OF PANTIES, YOU'LL HAVE TO WAIT A FEW DATES. THIS WILL BE A GOOD WAY FOR US TO BE CLOSE TO EACH OTHER WITHOUT CROSSING TOO MANY BOUNDARIES..." You murmer to yourself, unaware that she can hear every bit of your inner monologue "I thought somone this deep into dark magic wouldn't really have those boundaries." Her laughter echos through your head as her giant face squints in false anger "OH REALLY? SO JUST BECAUSE I'M A WITCH I CAN'T WANT TO BE TREATED WITH RESPECT? C'MON. WE'VE WASTED ENOUGH TIME ALREADY. LET'S GO INSIDE." Her two huge fingers grasp at you and you feel the warm touch as you're lifted off of her palm. The two huge digits fit you into the space you're destined to stay for the time being... where do you find yourself on the pretty witch's body?
1512211112.title: Transformed into Jewelry!

choices: You are able to fight off her hypnosis for longer than she expected
You are instantly under her spell... and she makes you do something tame
You are instantly under her spell... and she humiliates you
1512211113.content:
Nat skips away for a second and stops a couple walking towards the theater holding hands. The guy is your stereotypical jock complete with blue jeans and a red varsity jacket. He's easily 4 or 5 inches taller than you are. The girl is a doe-eyed valley girl clinging onto his shoulder for dear life as they walk together. Nat goes up to them and says "Excuse me. Can you tell me what time the tickets say the event is going to start?" The man looks down at the tickets and says "Uh, in a couple of minutes, why?" While he's distracted, Nat presses a finger to his temple, causing him to stare blankly ahead. His girlfriend is confused and waves a hand in front of his face, getting no reaction. "What the hell did you do to him, you stupid goth freak?" Nat just smiles and says "Oh, nothing. Just this!" She quickly brings the same glowing finger up to the blonde's forehead as well, causing her to enter a similar stupor. Nat holds out her hands and says "Now. You want to give me your tickets and do something else tonight. Something you both will enjoy." The jock wordlessly hands over the tickets to your significantly shorter date, while his girlfriend nods in approval. Nat looks at the tickets and says "Excellent. You two have fun tonight." She starts to turn, but stops herself and walks in front of the blonde. With a very stern look on her face she says "Also, you will treat people who look a little different with some goddamned respect. Understood?" The blonde nods up and down slowly as the orders from Nat sink in. Nat raises her hands and snaps her fingers , turning on her heel to walk back towards you. You are dumbfounded as she waves the tickets in front of your face and says "Problem solved. Let's go inside!"

She grabs your arm and starts dragging you out of the alley, and on your way out you see the popular couple snapping out of their haze, before the guy says "You want to get dinner? Maybe go shopping for a while?" His girlfriend smiles back at him and gives him a kiss on the cheek. You turn back to face Nat and look at her in amazement. Nat looks up at you and says very coyly "Something wrong?" You honestly don't know. You're a little torn by all this and you say "I'm not sure. Did you just... hypnotize those people?" Nat doesn't even bat an eyelash and says "Yup. Mind control is one of the first spells witches are taught. It's the easiest to master because there are so many possible targets. Someone with witch blood in them would have to submit to another before they are manipulated like that, but you people are much more weak-minded. It's almost pathetic, really." You stop walking and look off for a second. "I... I don't really know how to respond to that. Is that really how you look at regular people?" She grabs your hand and says "Don't take it that way. It's nothing against you as a person. It's just... full blooded humans are naturally easier to control. You can't help it." You look at her and say "I'd like to think I have a little more control over my own life. I'm not weak minded like that dumb jock outside." Nat gets a playful grin on her face and says "You want to prove it, big guy? What if I tried to make you my mindless slave right now. Could you stop me?" You return her playful look and say "You can't make me do anything. I'm not going to be your bitch." She laughs and points a finger at you, her eyes glowing a familiar shade of red from before. "We'll see about that. This'll be the second time today i've had you in the palm of my hand... although this time it'll be more metaphorically."
1512211113.title: Nat the Hypnotist

choices: You wake up The next day
You have a weird dream
15122111131.content:
"Ok, here I go" she recites the spell and taps you on the forehead, you feel a wave of pain in your head you sit down near a wall in the alley from the intense pain. "Oh my God I'm so sorry, are you ok? didn't mean to you hurt" said Nat "yeah, yeah I'm fine I may need a aspirin or something later but Christ" you replied with your hand on your forehead.

Nat smiled at you " Well, the same thing happened to me when the Mistress showed me how to do the spell it's possible that you could be...." You cut her off "A witch?"."Well if you didn't cut me off I would have said a warlock, but yeah a witch" she said.You start to get up off the ground "Are you sure my mom isn't really a witch nor is my dad a warlock they're​ just normal American people" you said "Well do you have any relatives you don't speak too that can possibly be a lead?" She asked.

You think for a while "Now that you mentioned it I have a aunt on my mom's side I haven't spoken to since I was a kid, she was really weird rarely had anyone over and had a closed off basement no one was allowed into" you replied "We should visit her I may be able to sense some form of magical energy near her" said Nat."The movie is about to start lets go inside" she said clingy to your arm, you both walk into to the theater and find your seats you sat in the mid section of the theater. After the movie, you decide to drop Nat off at her house during the walk you both talked about common interests.

"So what music you listen to?" You asked Nat "Well a little bit of everything but mostly rock music I like the Indie, Alt rock and metal, and old school rock like Rolling Stones and The Kinks, How about you?" Replied Nat.With a grin you say "Me too I'm more into Pink Floyd though, Hey you've heard of The Pixes before right?" "Yeah! They're my favorite Indie band, you ever listen to Tool?" She asked "Yep, really great progressive metal band everything sounds like a symphony when they play. You reply. This went on for the whole walk you talked about video games, TV shows, and movies until you reached her house.

"Did you notice in Fight Club how Tyler the guy Brad Pitt played as was hidden in a lot of scenes? you would have pause it to catch a glimpse of him" you said "Yeah, it was such a great piece of cinematography the way they edited it was amazing the movie really keeps you questioning" she giggled. As you walked up the steps to her house you both smiled at each other "Well this is were we say goodbye, I have to get up early tomorrow to study at the Mistress's house at 8 AM" she said."Hey we can see each other tomorrow right?dig up more about my family's past, I'll pick you up once your done studying so we can go to my aunt's house" you said. She smiled "alright big fella" she said bitting the bottom of her lips before leaning and kissing you this caught you off guard but you enjoyed it a lot. "I'll see ya tomorrow ok be at my house at 1:30 PM Ok" she said smiling at you "Ok, I promise" You say smiling back to her. You leave her at her doorstep as she enters the house and closes the door, you safely walk home and enter your room to sleep.
15122111131.title: You are able to fight off her hypnosis

choices: Nat arrives instantly and picks you up
Nat arrives too late, and you are too small to see!
Someone picks up the phone before Nat can reach you!
151221113.content:
You've made it about a mile away from the cabin before you feel your body start to tingle. You're aware that the sensation is similar to the same you felt when you touched the witch's spellbook, and immediately start to panic. You start running back towards Natalie, hoping that maybe she can fix this, but your clothes begin sagging as you run. Unlike the last time you shrunk, this time your clothes aren't shrinking with you! You realize that at this pace you'll never make it back to her in time, so in a last ditch effort, you pull out your phone and the piece of paper with Nat's number on it. You watch in horror as the device and paper grow with each passing second, and you're forced to let your clothing drop to the ground around you and you place the phone on the ground. You can't be any larger than a foot and a half at this point, so you use your entire fist to punch in the numbers until you hear it ring on the other side. "Pick up, please pick up!"

After a few rings, a voice on the other end says "Wow, that didn't take long. Forget something?" You don't waste any time and scream into the receiver "Natalie! Help me! It didn't work, and i'm getting small again! Come get me!" You can hear that you didn't get the message clear but she figured it out anyway as she responds "What was that? You're not very clear, almost squeaky soundi... OH NO, You're shrinking again?! Where are you?" You honestly don't know where you are so can't give a good description. Before you can panic though, you have a brief moment of brilliance and punch the icon next to your keyboard that gives your gps location. Nat sighs on the other end and with a significantly louder voice says "OKAY, GOT IT. I'LL BE RIGHT THERE, I'M SORRY!" The phone disconnects and you collapse on top of the screen, happy that you've got some sort of rescue coming your way. Before you can celebrate however, you realize that you're now the size of your phone itself, and still shrinking. It's not slowing down like the last time you were around a few inches tall, and you start to fear that your shrinking could be infinite! You may never stop! Your only hope is to get help from your new friend the witch's assistant, and only hope she can get there before you shrink into nothingness!
151221113.title: The Spell Wore Off!

choices: The forest's trees are only as tall as her boots!  (The cabin grew!)
The blades of grass reach up higher than the roof!  (The cabin shrunk!)
There is no forest... only a giant room!  (The cabin has been transported!)
15122112.content:
Natalie sighs and walks over to you, bending down to lay her palm flat on the ground. "COME ON, LET'S SEE WHAT WENT WRONG. THIS SHOULD HAVE WORKED!" You climb into her soft palm, still marveling at just how pleasant the feeling is of being held by this girl. She whisks you quickly up to the desk and you climb off next to the oversized spellbook, which the giantess flips through effortlessly. You watch her intently as she searches through the book, deciphering it's hidden language sentence by sentence. "IT SHOULD HAVE MADE YOU LARGE AGAIN. IT ALL MAKES SENSE. SIZE.... CHARM... MEN... SHRINK..." All of a sudden her eyes go wide as she says "OH DEAR... OH NO... I'VE MADE A HUGE MISTAKE!"

Her trembling hands grab you and hold you tightly in her palm as she walks towards the door, whispering to herself "PLEASE SAY THE SPELL DIDN'T WORK... PLEASE SAY I MISSPOKE OR... SOMETHING!" She lifts a hand off of your body to open the door, and when she looks outside the color drains from her face. "OH NO. IT HAPPENED. JUST LIKE THE BOOK SAID." You look up to her and ask her "What? What happened? What's going on?" With a very nervous look, Natalie looks down at you and says "THE SPELL WORKED, BUT IT DIDN'T AFFECT YOU... IT AFFECTED THE CABIN... AND EVERYTHING IN IT!" You want to ask her what she means by that, but instead you look ahead into the woods, and you see exactly what her spell did...

"The cabin! It's shrinking!" Nat yelled as the two of you watched out the window as the world became larger and larger, until the forest of trees became the forest of grass. Then you felt the shrinking and creaking of the cabin cease, with an eerie silence replacing it. Then, Nat breaks the silence by whispering, "I'm so stupid! I misread the instructions and the cabin shrunk to only about an inch tall! And since we shrunk with it, I'm less than 1/4th of an inch, and you're probably too small to be seen!" She was panicking now, cursing and beating herself up, near tears, saying loudly, "IT'S ALL MY FAULT! NOW THE MISTRESS MIGHT NEVER FIND US, WE COULD GET KILLED BY AN ANIMAL OR EVEN A BUG, OR WORSE. I'M SO SORRY, I JUST RUIN EVERYTHING!" "Hey, it's fine!" you say, a pitiful attempt to comfort her. She started calming down, listening to what you were saying. "If we just stay here and calmly think of a solution, we can return to normal before your mistress finds us. After all, we still have the book. Everything is going to be okay--"

Before you can finish, a loud boom can be heard. It is followed by more, slowly getting louder and louder. "OH, NO! FOOTSTEPS!" Nat cried. But whose footsteps are they?

She is squinting one gigantic eye to scan the wooden floor for you, but you are equally as miniscule as clumps of dirt and hairs that the regular sweeping and dusting has left behind. You are truly insignificant standing before a goddess. Her voice is so deep and powerful that even when she whispers, she shakes you to your very core.

"THIS IS BAD. THIS IS REALLY BAD. I CAN'T EVEN SEE YOU ANYMORE!" You wave your arms and jump up and down, unfortunately the giant eye scanning over you is not strong enough to pick up your miniscule form. You are truly less than a grain of sand to her. She slams her hand down in frustration, which causes you to fall backwards from the booming quake. She whispers with tears welling up in her eyes "I JUST WANTED TO MAKE YOU BIGGER. I'M SO STUPID FOR THINKING THIS WOULD WORK, AND NOW YOU'RE TOO SMALL FOR ME TO HELP YOU!" You want to comfort her, but at your current state she is the size of a planet. She wouldn't be able to feel your touch or hear your words. You'd have better luck trying to talk a mountain into moving for you. A droplet of a tear crashes down what seems like yards away from you, and it's so massive and powrful that you can actually feel the impact as it hits the floor before you. If this is what life is going to be like from now on, even the littlest of things will seem like massive undertakings. I guess i should be thanking you for all this. You did risk a lot to find me." She laughs at your comment and says "WELL, MAYBE WHEN WE GET BACK TO NORMAL YOU CAN THANK ME PROPERLY. LET'S GO READ ANOTHER SPELL FROM THE B...." You feel her hand tremble a bit beneath you as her smile quickly turns into a look of astonished fear. "THE... THE BOOK! I WAS SO WORRIED ABOUT REACHING YOU I DIDN'T SEE WHERE IT ENDED UP! IF IT'S NOT OPEN TO THE PAGE, I DON'T THINK I CAN RESTORE US!" She quickly spins around and you see the book...

With the most innocent, sorrowful eyes, Natalie looks down at you in her hand and says "I WILL HELP YOU AS MUCH AS I CAN... BUT WE CAN'T DO IT RIGHT NOW. I CAN SENSE HER GETTING CLOSER." You look up confused and say "Sense? What do you mean?" She holds her hand steady as she goes back to the other side of the room, grabbing her bag and jacket, explaining along the way. "EVERY POWERFUL WITCH GIVES OFF A TRACE OF ENERGY, ALMOST LIKE AN AURA THAT SURROUNDS THEM AT ALL TIMES. I CAN SENSE HERS BECAUSE I'VE BEEN LEARNING FROM HER FOR SO LONG. AND I CAN TELL THAT SHE'LL BE HERE ANY MINUTE." You start to panic a bit as she gets ready to leave and say up to her "If she's coming, is it even worth it to leave? Won't she find you?" Nat bites her lip and says "NOT IF WE LEAVE NOW. I DON'T HAVE THE SAME ENERGY TRACE AS HER, SO SHE'D HAVE TO ACTUALLY SEE ME TO IDENTIFY ME. MY CAR'S PARKED OUT BACK." She brings you up to her face and whispers "I WANT YOU TO DO ME A FAVOR AND TRUST ME, OKAY? LAY DOWN IN MY HAND SIDEWAYS. IT'LL MAKE IT EASIER FOR ME TO CARRY YOU." You honestly trust and feel safe with this girl, even knowing she's going to close her giant fingers around you. You half-jokingly say to her, but it falls on deaf ears as you find yourself sealed tightly in her protective fist.

The little witch carefully carries you out to her car, using her free hand to open the door and sliding in gracefully. You were actually amazed at how she reached a sitting position without squeezing you too much by accident. You barely moved around at all! she slowly uncurls her fingers, letting a soft breeze pass over your body. MY ROOMMATE'S OUT OF TOWN SO IT SHOULD BE JUST THE TWO OF US FOR A DAY OR SO. HOPEFULLY THAT'S ALL THE TIME WE'LL NEED TO WAIT TO CHANGE YOU BACK." You were about to thank her yet again, when she lets out a small gasp and looks around the car. "OH... I DIDN'T REALLY THINK ABOUT THIS... WHERE AM I GOING TO PUT YOU FOR THE RIDE? I CAN'T JUST THROW YOU IN THE CUP HOLDER AND HOPE YOU'LL BE OKAY." You are a little relieved that she thought of this before you did. She obviously wants to take care of you and this proves that she's looking out for your best interests at heart. You sit down nervously in her palm as the clock ticks, waiting for her to make her next move. How does she decide to take you back to her dorm?
