This time you are thankful that you are glued to the hand, as at your relative size it feels like you are a thousand feet above ground, if not more... "Wellll... it makes it kinda 'handy' to play with you again...
151311321.title: 'Attached' to the fairy.

choices: It knocks you out.  She's kidnapped you!
It makes you follow her every command.  She's brainwashed you!
It makes her seem even larger.  She's made you shrink!
151312.content: You spin around quickly and soon find your face mushed into the muscular abs of a giant woman! You look up to see that the woman appears to be 8 or 9 feet tall, wearing nothing but a leapard skin loincloth and bra. Her skin was dark brown, and she had jet black hair tied back into a ponytail. She is no doubt intimidating, but you can't help but be attracted to her at the same time. She spoke with a loud, powerful voice and said "Puny man! You are in the forest of the Amazons. You are not welcome here." You start to back away from her and say "I'm sorry! I don't even know how i got here! If you can tell me how to get back out of this place, I'll leave you alone forever!" The woman grabs you by the throat and rams your shorter body against a tree, almost cracking it in half as you hit it back-first. "No! You trespass on Amazon land! Now you can not leave!" You can't breathe or even attempt an escape from the gigantic woman. All you can do is watch as she reaches into her pocket, pulling out a small drawstring bag. She lets go of your neck, allowing you to gasp for air and clutch your throat in pain, only to find that she's undone the bag and is going to pour it's contents on your head! A large amount of white powder comes down on your body, and when it touches your skin, it disappears almost immediately. You begin to wonder just what is going to happen to you, when all of a sudden your vision becomes much blurrier. The amazon before you continues to speak. Her voice rings in your head with a mighty echo as she says "YOU WERE A FOOL TO COME HERE. NOW YOU WILL SUFFER FOR IT." What does the powder do to you?
151312.title: Woman of the Amazon

choices: As tall as her knees!  The perfect size for a pet!
Only up to her ankles!  The perfect size for a toy!
As small as her littlest toe!  Too small for her to play with!
1513123.content: Your throat goes dry and you can barely move as you feel the ground shifting slightly beneath you. Taking a look down at your feet, it's almost as if the world is expanding beneath you, but you know for a fact that it must be the powder she sprinkled on your head... she's shrinking you! Her voice gets deeper and more frightening as she laughs at your plight. "HAHA, LOOK AT YOU SHRINK! YOU TRESPASSERS ARE ALWAYS SO PUNY TO BEGIN WITH, BUT NOW YOU'RE GOING TO SEE WHAT IT'S LIKE TO BE A TINY LITTLE CREATURE AT MY FEET! SHRINK, LITTLE MAN! SHRINK AWAY!" At your regular height, you only came up to just underneath her ample chest, but now she was shooting higher and higher into the skies! She stood imposingly proud of her work as your body continued to dwindle next to her already massive body. You finally stop shrinking and look straight ahead to see just how small you've become in relation to the powerful amazon!
1513123.title: An Even Taller Amazonian

choices: "A Bit Shorter!"
"Obey my every command!"
"... Disappear!"
15132.content: The smoke begins to clear a bit, but before you can see clearly, a soft gloved hand reaches out and grips your wrist. You hear a feminine voice say to you "Thank you for accepting our invitation. Let's hear it everyone for our volunteer!" You are startled by the sound of applause all around you as the hand leads your woozy body up a small flight of stairs through the fog. When you reach a flat platform, the smoke disappates completely, and you come face to face with a tall, bright eyed girl in a revealing red dress. She holds out her hands and whispers "Okay, stay right where you are until you hear Mrs. Rivers talk to you. Got it?" You don't have time to respond before the girl faces away from you and you are shocked to see a sea of people sitting down facing you. Are you on stage somewhere? You must be because the girl's voice seems to be a lot louder as if being transmitted through a speaker. "LADIES AND GENTLEMEN, I'M PLEASED TO BRING OUT THE STAR OF OUR SHOW, THE QUEEN OF ILLUSION, THE MAGICAL MISTRESS OF MANCHESTER... PLEASE WELCOME TO THE STAGE, THE SENSATIONAL ALEX RIVERS!" In an explosion of confetti and streamers, a woman's body appears directly in front of you. The crowd goes wild upon seeing their entertainment for the evening, and you wait for her to talk before moving, just like her assistant said. She had a powerful but pleasant voice that sang in a thick british accent "Hello, ladies and gentlemen. How are you all doing tonight?" The crowd cheers again and she begins to pace around the stage. Her footsteps were powerful and sexy, as she strutted around in her tall black high heels, pushing up her sexy fishnet covered legs. "Every single one of you is here because you are interested in the unusual. The unexplained. The... mysterious. Well, that and some of you just came to see my outfit." Some of the men in the crowd whistled at this comment, and you could see why. Her top was a sleeveless black and white corset with a short miniskirt attached. The outfit did little to hide her voluptuous figure, and when she turned around to face you, her huge breasts shook freely within the material. Her pretty green eyes opened up with delight as she spotted her next helper. She blew you a kiss and walked over to you, her frizzy blonde curls bouncing up and down just as much as her ample cleavage trying to escape out the top of the corset. "Hello, Sweetie. Is it your first time in Vegas?" You are still a little startled from the trip and you manage to get out "I... guess so?" She laughs and motions to the crowd saying "I'll bet he's not the only one who's had a little too much to drink tonight, huh?" A few small cheers from the audience and then the woman goes back up next to you. She shoots you a quick smile and says "Tell me, stranger. Do you believe in magic?" More than she could ever know. But then again... you've seen REAL magic. An actual being of strange mystical powers. Her? She was just a street magician. She knows some tricks, sure but she can't possibly have any real power over you. So to play along, you shake your head and say "No. Not really." She smirks and looks back at the crowd saying "They all say that. Until I bring out this little baby..." She motions to her pretty assistant who brings over a thin, long pine box and holds it open for her employer. The magician makes a small appreciative nod as she reaches in with two fingers and pulls out a thin black rod with a solid white tip. She waves it around for a second and says "Ladies and Gentlemen, I give you the very magic wand that belonged to my grandfather, the great Horatio Rivers!" The crowd oos and ahs for some reason at hearing that name. You've never heard of any great magician named Horatio, so you just continue to stand dumbfounded until something interesting happens. Rivers points the wand at you and sizes you up, closing one eye in concentration as she says "Are you ready to see some real magic, my skeptical volunteer?" You just sigh and nod up and down, waiting to see what she's got in store for you. She stands right next to you and looks out at the crowd, saying "Ladies and Gentlemen, watch and be amazed as I take this man and make him...
15132.title: The Magician's Volunteer?

choices: A foot or so tall - not even up to her shins!
Just a few inches tall - You're nothing but a doll!
Bug sized - You can't even see over her toes!
151321.content: As soon as she said the word "Shorter", a wave of warmth flowed through your entire body, almost like you were in a nice hot bath. You smiled a bit from the sensation, but that smile quickly turned into a gasp of surprise when the magician appeared to get taller and taller before your eyes. The crowd gasped in amazement as well, as they watched the skeptical volunteer on stage turn into a midget right before their eyes. The tall woman smirks and lowers her wand, allowing the magic spell she held over you to cease. When all was said and done, you were a paltry three feet tall! You couldn't move out of fear, knowing that this woman was truly magical and could do anything to you at that size! You were nothing but a child in her presence, and she laughed out loud, obviously basking in the success of her trick. The audience roared with applause as you stood dumbfounded in the presence of an amazon. She stood right up next to you and motioned to the crowd saying "WELL, WELL, LOOKS LIKE SOMEBODY'S A LITTLE BIT SHORTER THAN WHEN THE WALKED IN HERE, AREN'T THEY?" She lowers a hand down on top of your head and lets out a tisk tisk sound saying "I KNOW A LOT OF GIRLS SAY THAT SIZE DOESN'T MATTER, BUT THERE'S GOT TO BE A LIMIT, AM I RIGHT?" The crowd laughs out loud and you try to push her hand away, embarrassed at your current situation. She puts her hands on her hips and says "AWW, HE'S A GRUMPY LITTLE SHRIMP, ISN'T HE? MAYBE WE SHOULD TEACH HIM ANOTHER LESSON IN TREATING BIG PEOPLE WITH RESPECT!" Your heart jumps up into your throat as you see her whip the wand out again and point it at you. She continues to tease and berate you as she waves the wand around again. "PITY. MY ASSISTANT OVER THERE SAID YOU WERE PRETTY CUTE, AND AT THAT SIZE, I THINK YOU"RE JUST THE RIGHT HEIGHT TO GIVE HER A... SPECIAL KISS?" Her pretty assistant starts to blush a bit, but plays it off for the crowd and giggles at the joke. "BUT I THINK THESE GOOD PEOPLE CAME TO SEE A SHOW THEY'D NEVER FORGET, AND IN ORDER FOR THAT TO HAPPEN, YOU'RE GOING TO HAVE TO BE EVEN SMALLER!" You turn your attention back to the imposing magician, who's hair began to blow back behind her head as she winked down at you. With a slight satisfied chuckle in her voice she whispered down to you "YOU'RE DOING GREAT, SWEETIE! HERE COMES THE FINALE!" How small does she make you this time?!
151321.title: "A Bit Shorter!"

choices: She gives you to a teenaged girl in the front row
She gives you to a young woman  in the second row
She is joking and hands you to her assistant
1513212.content:
You felt the energy flow through you again and before you knew it, you were no longer looking at the magician's ass... you were looking at her ankles! You couldn't have been more than 5 inches tall! The sandal-clad feet of the giant woman re-positioned so your shrunken body was in between them, and a shadow cast down on you which could only mean that Alex was bending down to pick you up. Over the roaring applause of the audience, you could make out the giantess's booming voice as she giggled in delight saying "STAY STILL HONEY. I DON"T WANT TO SQUEEZE YOU TOO HARD WITH MY FINGERS." Not wanting ANYTHING like that to happen, you juts allowed yourself to be picked up by the oversized hand of the magician, and you soon found yourself being lifted up towards her pretty (if not incredibly magnified) face. Her grip was much gentler than you were expecting and found yourself almost secure being doll sized in this woman's soft hands. With a quick smirk she whispered down onto you, her minty breath washing over your tiny body between her thumb and forefinger. "MOST LITTLE MEN FAINT THE FIRST TIME THEY ARE EXPOSED TO MY MAGIC. YOU'RE A SPECIAL LITTLE GUY, AREN'T YOU?" You just shrugged your shoulders at the giant, taking into account that maybe your experiences with the gypsy have rendered you a bit more experienced to the "strange and unknown" that Alex made a living off of.

She says louder now so the audience can hear her, "THANK YOU, SWEETIE! YOU HAVE BEEN AN EXCELLENT VOLUNTEER!" She brings you up to her giant mouth and puckers her lips together, covering your whole top half in a quick, wet kiss. You spit some of her lipstick and saliva out of your mouth and try to wipe off your face as you dangle helplessly from between her fingers, when she lifts you up a little higher to present to the audience. "NOW, I CAN THINK OF MORE THAN A FEW THINGS THAT I'D LIKE TO DO WITH A SIX INCH MAN, BUT MAYBE SOMEONE OUT THERE WOULD RATHER GO HOME WITH MY LITTLE HELPER? WHO WANTS A SOUVENIR!" You are beyond shocked... is this crazy woman really going to just give you away to someone in the audience?!
1513212.title: A Doll-Sized Souvenir?

choices: On her somewhere
In her purse
Instead, someone else snatches you from her.
15132122.content:
The crowd shouts after she offers to give you away. You dangle in horror as the woman presses her other hand against her eyes like a blindfold and throws you into the audience. You fly through the air as the crowd cheers.

You land harshly against a mesh of fabric. A young woman in the second row used her hat to catch you. Even though it did break the impact of your fall enough not to hurt you, you’re still sore.

The woman tips you from the hat onto her palm and smiles down at you. The magicians shouts as she prepares for her next trick. Where does the woman store you during the show?
15132122.title: Tossed into the Crowd

choices: The gentlemen in the audience (permanently)
The entire audience
Herself
1513213.content: Before you had time to react you were shrunk down to an inch tall. You looked up at the goddess sized woman who just shrunk you down to the size of a bug. The audience applauded her performance. "Thank you ladies and gentlemen." "Do you want an encore?" she asked. The audience clapped in approval. "Ok then" she said with a smile. "For next act I'm going to shrink...
1513213.title: Bug sized - You can't even see over her toes!

choices: Continue with your POV
Follow a shrunken man with his wife POV
15132131.content: ...only the gentlemen in the audience. The men faces were frozen with fear. She looked into the audience and saw their fear and smiled. "The gentlemen looked scared ladies." she said with a laugh. The women laughed with her at their male husbands and boyfriends sitting next to them. "Ok ladies." Rosella said. "It's time to shrink these pathetic gentlemen down to size." The females in the audience erupted with applause." Just then Rosella made a flash of light and when it disappeared all the men the audience were one inch tall. The women began picking up the male companions and studying them with their men in between their finger nails. "The best part about this ladies is that your men are permanently this size forever". she said with a smile. All the men were in complete shock while the women were filled with delight. The men realized now that their female partner could now completely control their life from now on, even though the women in the audience were already in control of their man's lives when they were normal sized to begin with. The men also realized that their beautiful goddess sized woman could crush the life out of them with one toe at their whim. After the female audience applauded Rosella as the curtain closed, each of the women picked up their tiny man and left smiling and thought about all the power they all now had over their pathetic bug sized men.
15132131.title: The gentlemen in the audience (permanently)

choices: She re-enlarges the two of you
She re-enlarges just Alex!
Something goes wrong and she doesn't change you at all
15132133.content:
She stopped herself and smirked down at your little bug sized body, lifting a foot up threateningly. "THIS THEATER REALLY HAS A SERIOUS BUG PROBLEM. MAYBE I SHOULD STOMP IT OUT!" The crowd gasps with excitement as you react to these words by darting in the opposite direction. When the shrinking had finally stopped, you were slightly smaller than an inch tall, running for your life from the curly haired goddess! Her laughter booms through the air as she stomps behind you, giving chase. "FEE, FI, FO, FUM! THINK YOU CAN ESCAPE? DON'T BE SO DUMB!" You almost run out of breath when her giant foot slams down right in front of you, knocking you backwards. You find yourself looking up at the absolute goddesses that are Alex Rivers and her assistant Anna, and can do nothing but put your arms up in a feeble attempt to protect yourself when Alex reaches down for you with her thumb and forefinger. "COME HERE, MY MICROSCOPIC ASSISTANT! MAMA ALEX WILL PROTECT YOU!" The crowd oo's and ahs as you are lifted up into the air, in full view of the camera, with your tiny body wriggling between Alex's huge fingers being displayed for all to see on the projection screen behind you. Alex motions for her assistant to come by, who produces a small glass jar. Alex drops you gently into it's tilted side, letting you slide softly to the bottom. Alex lifts her arms up one more time and says "LET'S HEAR IT FOR OUR PINT SIZED VOLUNTEER!" The crowd cheers again as Alex takes a bow before her audience. You are held safely in the jar kept by her equally giant assistant, who up close is still just as beautiful and cute as you remember before your size changing.

Alex goes into her exit schpeal, asking "DID EVERYONE HAVE A GREAT TIME TONIGHT?" The crowd answers with another round of applause, and Alex says "THANK YOU ALL VERY MUCH, I'LL SEE YOU NEXT TIME. ANNA, IF YOU WOULDN'T MIND HELPING ME OUT, I THINK MY LITTLE FRIEND IN THERE COULD USE SOME COMPANY." Alex quickly hands her magic wand over to her assistant, who lets out a small breath of nervousness, before closing her eyes and pointing it at her boss. To the audience's amazement, Alex begins to dwindle in a manner similar to you, ending up at about your size on the ground. Anna gently bends down and picks up the older woman, dropping her into the jar alongside you. The miniaturized woman brushes herself off as the giant girl holding your container takes a final bow before walking behind the curtain. You both sway in the jar to the motions of Anna's legs pumping with each step, but you are taken off guard by Alex walking right up to you and giving you a hug.

She kisses you on both cheeks and says "Well done, my friend! You were wonderful out there! You've been in showbusiness before, haven't you?" You just respond "Umm, no not really. But you're... you're real. This isn't a trick." She just winks and says "As far as anyone else is concerned it's just an elaborate show with mind blowing special effects. But the truth is that me and my assistant have been studying the mystical arts for some time now. There's no limit to what we're cabaple of!" You look up and see her lovely assistant still staring straight ahead while carrying the two of you and you admit "Yeah... i can see that... how did you get these powers?" Alex just stands with her arms crossed and says "First rule of stage shows, dear. A good magician never reveals her secrets. Just use your imagination." You know for a fact there's a variety of ways she could have come across these powers. For example, you've already been introduced to similar magic from the gypsy at the fair. Which could be hundreds of thousands of miles away from where you are right now! You decide to just lay back and accept it for now.

The glass containing you is lifted up to Anna's pretty face as she looks in on the two of you. She focuses on her employer however and says "WE'RE ALMOST AT THE DRESSING ROOMS. WE SHOULD BE IN THE CLEAR IN A MINUTE OR TWO." She covers the jar up again with her hands, and within a few minutes you make it to Alex's dressing room. You are shaken around slightly as Anna closes the door to the dressing room behind her, placing the jar gently on the end of the bed. She gets on her knees to look at the two of you and says "I CAN'T BELIEVE IT WORKED. LOOK AT THE TWO OF YOU, YOU'RE SO TINY!" Alex smiles and shouts up at her "You did wonderfully, Anna! You'll be doing this show by yourself in a few years." Anna blushes a bit and pulls out the famous magic wand from her dress. "ALRIGHT. I GUESS YOU'LL WANT TO GET BIG AGAIN. HERE WE GO..."
15132133.title: The Big (Little) Finale!

choices: "ADD HIM TO THE COLLECTION."
"HE'S ALL YOURS."
"DISPOSE OF HIM, WOULD YOU?
151321332.content:
Anna bites her lip in concentration as she reaches her thin, manicured hand into the jar. Her thumb and forefinger press up against her boss, and Alex laughs as she says up at the giant girl "Careful, Honey! Don't squish me now!" You are amazed at how lighthearted and casual Alex is taking the entire being tiny thing, even if she had done it before. Anna slowly lifts her out of the jar and places her gently on the ground at her feet. When she stands up she stares at the magic wand from before and says something in foreign gibberish before pointing it at the ground. Slowly but surely, you watch in amazement as the magician Alex Winters rises back to her former height, towering over the jar containing you. She brushes herself off and measures herself against a wall, saying "THAT'S MORE OR LESS THE RIGHT HEIGHT. WELL DONE, ANNA!"

The two giants embrace in a big hug as Alex says "I FORGOT HOW MUCH ALL THAT SIZE CHANGING TAKES OUT OF ME. DO YOU HAVE A CIGARETTE, DEAR?" Her assistant searches through her pockets pulling out a pack and handing her one and a lighter. As she lights it up and takes the first drag, the assistant begins going over the specifics of the show with her. "WE HAD A DECENT CROWD TONIGHT. ESPECIALLY FOR THE HOLIDAY THIS WEEKEND. WORD MUST BE GETTING AROUND THAT WE HAVE THE BEST SHOW IN TOWN." Alex laughs and says "IS IT ANY WONDER? WE'RE THE GENUINE ARTICLE. AND I THINK TO AN EXTENT PEOPLE KNOW THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN ILLUSION AND REALITY." To your surprise, her attention turns down to you as she kneels down next to the bed to look at you face to face yet again. At her normal size, she was a fairly attractive older woman, but now that she's huge again, she is an imposing, dominant goddess. She lets out a big toothy grin and strokes the container with her index finger. It is truly a surreal sight as the distortion of the glass and the smoke from her cigarrette create the illusion that her face is floating in midair, almost like a special effect come to life. She takes another puff, saying "HELLO DOWN THERE, SWEETIE. YOU WERE A LOT OF HELP TO ME OUT THERE, BUT I'M AFRAID THIS IS WHERE WE TELL YOU THE BAD NEWS." You had a feeling where this was going, and look up to try and get some help from Anna, but her face shows that she's seen this happen several times before. It was nothing new to her. "YOU'VE HAD A GLIMPSE INTO SOMETHING WONDERFUL AND MAGICAL DARLING, BUT I'M AFRAID WE CAN'T HAVE YOU BLABBING ABOUT MY POWERS... OR MY ASSISTANT'S FOR THAT MATTER. SO WE WON'T BE MAKING YOU BIG AGAIN."

You are speechless and drop to your knees. You bang on the walls of your glass prison and shake your hands up, pleading for her to make you your normal size. Your efforts are met with nothing but a thunderous giggle and a condescending whisper "THEY'RE ALWAYS SO CUTE WHEN THEY BEG." She blows you a kiss and rises back up to her full height, leaving you trapped and alone in the jar. Her pretty face hovers above the opening as she grabs something from the bed next to you. "DON'T WORRY, YOU WON'T BE IN THAT JAR FOR MUCH LONGER. BYE BYE, LITTLE MAN!" She slowly places a lid on top of the jar, leaving you in relative silence. It's hard for you to hear anything but the sound of your own breathing from within the glass container, with the exception of the vibrations from Alex's giant feet stomping across the room towards the door. You are terrified that you are not only going to be trapped forever, but that you'll suffocate from the lack of air holes. You press yourself up against the glass trying to hear Alex as she talks to her assistant. You faintly hear Anna say "WHAT DO YOU WANT ME TO DO WITH THE LITTLE GUY?" To which Alex replies "WE WON'T HAVE A SHOW FOR A FEW DAYS, SO WE DON'T NEED HIM FOR ANY MORE TRICKS..."
151321332.title: The Magician Keeps You Tiny

choices: "CLEANING MY TEETH."
"DOING MY NAILS."
"MASSAGING MY FEET."
1513213322.content:
Wait... did she just say that you were all hers?! You don't need confirmation as you see her assistant's face light up delight as she turns towards you. She quickly stomps in your direction and picks up the jar with two hands, saying "AWESOME. I HAVEN'T PLAYED WITH ONE OF YOU GUYS IN A WHILE." The older magician just rolls her eyes in the distance and says very calmly "JUST TRY AND KEEP THIS ONE ALIVE MORE THAN A FEW DAYS, WILL YOU HON?" Anna looks at you through the glass and licks her lips saying "DON'T WORRY, MOM. I'VE GOT A GOOD FEELING ABOUT THIS ONE." Before you can react to discovering that the girl is actually the magician's daughter, the jar is shaken and gracelessly carried as Anna runs from her mother's dressing room to her own. You barely have time to react to the sound of Anna's door slamming before your world is turned upside down and you go flying towards the mouth of the jar. You leave the glass container with great velocity, plummeting down onto a soft, smooth surface that you can only determine is Anna's palm.

You sit up in her hand and look at her pretty blue eyes and flawless white teeth as she cracks a joyous, malicious smile. "HELLO, LITTLE VOLUNTEER. LET ME INTRODUCE MYSELF. MY NAME IS ANNA RIVERS. I AM YOUR NEW OWNER, MISTRESS... WHICHEVER WORD YOU'D LIKE TO USE. OOH! ON SECOND THOUGHT CALL ME GODDESS. I LIKE IT WHEN THE TINY PEOPLE CALL ME GODDESS." You are blown away by the girl's psychotic personality, jumping from serious to bubbly in a matter of milliseconds. But you refuse to call her your Goddess, so you just clear your throat and say "Look... Anna, I know what you're thinking..." But she responds to your attempts at communication by simply inhaling and blowing a small gust of air through her puckered lips. The wind is too strong for you to continue and you are knocked over in her palm. Anna giggles with delight at the sight of you stumbling and says "DOWN YOU GO! ALL YOU LITTLE SHRINKEES ARE ALWAYS SO UNBALANCED." You climb back up to your feet and point up at the giantess, not so sure how to appear intimidating when you're only an inch or two tall. "Listen here Anna... you and your mother made me this small, which must mean you can make me big again. So you change me back right now!"

Anna sighs and says "LOOK, EVEN IF I WANTED TO CHANGE YOU BACK, I CAN'T. I DON'T HAVE THE WAND, AND I'M NOT STRONG ENOUGH TO USE THAT KIND OF MAGIC WITHOUT IT. I CAN DO OTHER THINGS THOUGH, LIKE I COULD MAKE YOU SMALLER. IN FACT, SINCE YOU KEEP REFERRING TO ME BY NAME, MAYBE I'LL SHRINK YOU REEEEAL SMALL. TO LIKE GERM SIZE." You can see her crack a wicked grin as her index finger starts to glow. You hold your arms up as she slowly and methodically moves it woards you and you scream "No, please! I'm small enough... Goddess!" She recoils her finger and tilts her head saying in a sing-songy voice "LOOKS LIKE SOMEONE FINALLY GOT WHO'S IN CHARGE, HUH?" You walk around the surface of her palm trying to ignore the crazy woman's taunting. But it gets harder when she takes the nails of her forefinger and thumb and clenches the back of your shirt, saying "AND SINCE YOU'RE MY PET NOW, YOU WON'T BE NEEDING THESE CLOTHES ANYMORE." In one swift jerk, she rips the shirt off of your back, exposing your upper body. She rolls the ripped fabric into a ball between her fingers and says "NOW, ARE YOU GONNA TAKE OFF YOUR OWN PANTS, OR ARE YOU GONNA LET ME GRAB EM FOR YOU?" You are humilated but don't want to have her strip you forcefully again, so you quickly take off your pants, standing there in nothing but your underwear. She squints a bit and says as she picks up the discarded pants "HMMM... YOU'RE NO FUN."


She carries you over to a dresser, and opens up a drawer near the top. Among the varying colors of panties and bras, she also has in this drawer a shoebox, which she uncovers with her free hand. She drops the clothing into the shoebox, and when you peek over the edge of her hand, you see something you're not quite prepared for. Hundreds... maybe THOUSANDS of discarded clothing items of all shapes, sizes, and styes. You slowly look back up at Anna's face, which is unyieldingly chipper as she closes the box and says "JUST KEEPING A SOUVENIR OF OUR TIME TOGETHER." You are almost too stunned to ask, but you decide to go for it anyway, managing to stammer out "Are... Are those clothes from... other..." Anna nods and says "MMHMM. OTHER LITTLE MEN. YOU GUYS DON'T TEND TO LAST TOO LONG AROUND ME. I CAN BE A LITTLE CLUMSY SOMETIMES." You can't believe how casually she's going about this, acting like this is the most normal thing in the world. "You're so cruel... how can a person be like this?" Anna just puts on a fake frown and says "D'AWWW, SOMEONE'S A LITTLE GRUMPY PANTS AREN'T THEY?" Her expression immediately changes into one of stern confidence as she says "LOOK. YOU'RE TINY, I'M BIG. THAT'S JUST THE WAY THINGS ARE FROM NOW ON. SO JUST ACCEPT YOUR NEW POSITION IN LIFE, AND TRY NOT TO GET SMUSHED, KAY?" You are dumbfounded by this girl's psychotic attitude towards you at this size. All you can do is look up at her and ask solemnly "How can you do this to other people?" She smiles and says "BECAUSE YOU'RE NOT PEOPLE. NOT ANYMORE. YOU'RE MY LITTLE PET. JUST LIKE ALL MY OTHER PETS, YOU'RE GOING TO DO WHAT YOU LITTLE PEOPLE DO BEST. AND THAT'S..."
1513213322.title: The Crazy Girl's Pet

choices: You're getting even smaller!
You're turning into food!
You're turning into... Ink?
1513213323.content:
Your jaw hits the floor as you hear the magician instruct her assistant to "dispose" of you. And you're even more shocked with her response: "YES, MOTHER. RIGHT AWAY." Yes?! No problems at all?! MOTHER?! You have so many questions but unfortunately you would probably never recieve them as Alex puts on a coat and gives her daughter a kiss on the cheek. "I'M OFF TO MAKE ARRANGEMENTS FOR THE NEXT PERFORMANCE. MAKE SURE NOBODY SEES YOU WHEN YOU DO THE DEED, UNDERSTOOD?" Anna nods and says "OF COURSE. HOW WOULD YOU LIKE ME TO DO IT?" Alex looks over at you and laughs for a bit before putting her hand on Anna's shoulder. "USE YOUR IMAGINATION. I THINK HE DESERVES TO GO IN A BIT OF A CREATIVE FASHION, DON'T YOU?" You don't know whether you should be furious or flattered or both, but it's all coming to a head as Alex spins her body and leaves, closing the door behind her. Anna slowly walks over to the bed and reaches a hand out to grab the jar you're in. She effortlessly lifts up your prison with one hand and slowly tilts it while whispering "COME ON, LET'S GET THIS OVER WITH."

You come sliding out onto Anna's waiting palm, and immediately spin yourself around to face her. She is undoubtably beautiful even at her gigantic form, but you can't let your emotions get in the way of pleading for your life! You beg with your hands clasped at her "Please, Anna! Don't do this! Let me go and i'll give you anything!" Anna nonchalantly places the jar back onto the bed and closes the lid, her face unshaken by your pleas. "SORRY, BUT MOTHER WANTS ME TO GET YOU OUT OF THE WAY, SO THAT'S WHAT I'M GOING TO DO. IT'S NOTHING PERSONAL." You can tell this is absolutely not new to her. You can't imagine how many people you'd have to snuff out yourself before you had that same look of eery disinterest in getting rid of a human being, albeit a shrunken one! Anna holds you up to her face, just under her nose. You can tell she's pondering her options as her eyes narrow in to focus on you. "LET'S SEE... SOMETHING CREATIVE. HMM..." You can feel the giantess's steady breathing as she ponders what to do with the little life form in her palm. You are only able to sit back and wait for her to pass judgement on you, as her skin is too smooth and damp for you to gain any footing, and moving around is pretty much worthless. Her eyes light up as if she's got the greatest idea in the world, and a wicked smile forms on her face. It's eerily similar to the one that her mother had plastered on her face when she told her to dispose of you. It must run in the family. "I KNOW JUST WHAT TO DO WITH YOU. IN FACT, I'M AMAZED I NEVER THOUGHT TO TRY IT BEFORE..." She raises the wand up to the side of her face and giggles, which sends shockwaves down your body. You are surprised to see her holding the wand, you thought for sure Alex would have taken it with her! But before you can think of anything else, Anna points it directly at you, and with pinpoint accuracy shoots a bolt of blue energy into your miniature chest. She squeals with delight as your arms go out to your sides, and you can only wonder... just what is happening to you?!
1513213323.title: Disposed of Rather... Creatively.

choices: Blow you of her hand and into the crowd.
Place you somewhere backstage
Something more... personal.
15132133231.content:
When that blue beam hit you in the chest it created a weird feeling but what has you shocked you is that the world seemed to be getting bigger and bigger around you.
The landscape of Anna's hand also expanded all around you and now all you can see is flesh for miles around you. Then appearing above you was an enormous eyeball, and you also heard Anna's now booming voice say "WOW, I REALLY MADE YOU TINY DIDN'T I AND I CAN BARELY SEE YOU ON MY HAND. I MUST HAVE SHRUNK YOU TO THE SIZE OF A DUST SPECK."
Anna's eye moves away from her hand and leaves you wondering what she is going to do to you at this size. Anna continued to think of to dispose of micro sized you and an idea popped into her head. She figured the best way to get rid of you is....
15132133231.title: Small as a dust speck

choices: To a bedroom somewhere?
To a dark, damp area?
Backstage at the venue, safe and sound?
151323.content: She waves the rod over your face and a small spark seems to escape from it. The older woman instructs the crowd, without taking eye contact away from you "Everyone say goodbye to our volunteer! He's going on a little trip!" The crowd says "Goodbye" in unison, playing along with the show, while you look around at your feet, searching for some sort of trap door or mirror. But you can't find anything, just the normal wooden floor of the stage. Just when you think it can't possibly get any weirder, the assistant takes a step away from you, as if to protect herself from what's happening. That's when the eyes of the magician start to change from their pretty green hue to a bright and menacing shade of red. You are about to say something when she waves the wand harshly shouting something in another language. Before you can react, you are blinded by a bright white light and you feel a rushing sensation all throughout your body. You can't see but you feel your feet landing on a platform different than the stage you were standing on. When the light starts to fade, you no longer find yourself on stage. In fact, you're in a different place altogether! Where did the magician send you?
151323.title: Disappearing Act

choices: The magician walks in
Someone else walks in
1513231.content:
You awake next to a giant bed. It appears as if you are an inch tall, as you look into the reflection of the clock next to you. The catch was that you were an anthro spider! Your bottom half was spider and your chest up was human.

Freaking out, you start to move, and swing a web across the room. The lights turned off, you stand on the ground next to a crack in the door.
1513231.title: To a bedroom somewhere?

choices: Your father.
15132312.content:
Suddenly, the door opened, and, their stood an attractive, but slightly older woman. She had long, brown-hair with some slight of gray, electrical blue eyes, and, an hourglass-shape body. She'd looked like Marilyn Monroe, but only brown-hair and electrical blue eyes.

Her feet stank. Her feet stank, because, she wore Nude sandals all day. Suddenly, you, realized that this woman, is, your mother, and was about to, unknowingly, step on by accident, until, she'd stopped in front of you.

"MOMMMMM!!!!! I'M DOWN HERE!!!!!," you yell. But, sadly, she didn't hear you. In fact, one of the Nude sandals, almost crushed you to death.

The smell of your mother's feet is so stank, that you, almost, got sick.

Then, another, stomp of one your mother's Nude sandals, almost crushed you to death.

When, things, couldn't get any worse, you, suddenly, realize that a man, appears, in the doorway of the bedroom. You realize, that this man is:
15132312.title: Mommy Deadliest.

choices: "I think you're going to need some help."  She gives you her wand!
"I think you'd be better off with me instead."  She hypnotizes you!
"I think you should stay the hell away from my daughter!"  She punishes you!
1513233.content: There's a screen of smoke in front of your face that you cough and try to wave away with your arms. When it clears, you find yourself behind the curtain, hearing a roar of applause on the other side. You were actually just transported a few feet away? That's incredible! The first person to come through the curtain is the magician's assistant. She caught your eye and smiled, giving you a hug. "Good job out there! I know it must have been a little weird to be put through the trick like that." You are still a little dumbfounded and say "Uh... yeah. I guess. It's almost like... was that real?" The girl giggles and says "I don't know what you mean by "real" but it's definitely amazing. I've been learning from Miss Rivers for the past few years, and I'm still impressed by her tricks. I have no idea how the hell she does half of the stuff on stage, and I'm right there next to her every night!" You two continue to have a pleasant conversation, and after a few minutes, the girl says "By the way, I don't know how long you're in town, you said you weren't from here... but I'd like to give you my number. Call me if you aren't doing anything tonight?" You take a piece of paper from her with her number scribbled on it, and she gives you a wink as the great Alex Rivers comes through the curtain. The crew members all give her a light round of applause, which she takes a half-joking bow for. "Excellent work on the lighting and smoke tonight, gentlemen. The show was a complete success." She walks over to the two of you and gives her assistant a hug. "Anna, great job as usual. You're growing into quite the showgirl, aren't you?" Anna blushes and bows saying "Thank you, ma'am. Always a pleasure to work with you. I'm going to go get changed out of these clothes, if you don't mind." She turns to you and smiles saying "Nice meeting you again!" You smile back at her and say your goodbyes before she turns on her heels and skips away. Now you're left alone with the older woman who shakes your hand and says "Thank you so much for your assistance tonight. Tell me, do you have any experience on the stage?" You shake your head and reply "No miss. To be honest, i don't even know how the hell I got on the stage to begin with." Rivers laughs and says "So, I see you were talking before with my stagehand, Anna. What were you two chatting about before I got here?" You start to blush a bit and say "Oh, you know... stuff, I guess." She smirks and says "She seems to have taken a real shine to you, sweetie. Did I see you get her number?" You nod and say "Yeah. I mean, I have sort of a girl back home, but she seems really nice. Maybe i should see if it's worth it?" The magician puts her hands on her hips and says "Well, you know what I think?"
1513233.title: Backstage At the Magic Show

choices: Call Anna to come over
Watch some TV
15132331.content:
The magician then handed you a wand. "Is this real?!" You ask her. "Entirely." She responds. You then run off and find a random person. You point the wand, and he suddenly turns into a rat. You flee back to the stage, and thank Alex Rivers.

"No problem." She said. "I have plenty of these. Just make sure your careful.... Just kidding!" You then take the wand and go into the parking lot. You check your lets and see they are to a 2001 Passat. With a flick of the wand, your car turns into a new Lamborghini. You hop into your newly acquired ride and drive off to the middle of the woods. You then flick a nice comfy cottage into existence and park into your new home.

You rest on the couch as you
15132331.title: "I think you're going to need some help...

choices: Call Anna's cell phone
Strip for her
Massage Her Feet
15132332.content:
You make a strange face at her comment and say "Umm, ma'am, thank you for everything tonight but i don't think you're quite my type. Besides, Anna seems really cool and i want to see where that goes." She doesn't change expression and just waves her hand in front of your face. After a second or two, the entire world around you seems to fade away, leaving only Alex River's body in focus. "Look into my eyes and tell me that again." You find your gaze drifting towards her eyes subconciously, and although you try to respond to her, you can barely get a word out. You don't know what she's doing to you, but you are unable to talk, or move any one of your limbs for that matter. It's almost as if she's keeping you hostage in your own body.

"Don't take this too personal sweetie... I'm sure you and Anna would have made a wonderful couple, but it's so hard to find a good looking man in my line of work. And whatever I want, i take." You were frozen in place, unable to call for help or even move your own head. All you could do was shift your eyes around in your motionless body, screaming silently for help from anybody who was around and working on the show. Alex caught wind of this and looks in the direction of your gaze, at a construction worker taking apart her set. "Sir, if you could continue on that section later, that would be great. I need to get past there for the moment." The guy just shrugs his shoulders and walks away, and like that you're left alone with the powerful magician.

She leans in close to you and says "You are now completely under my power. Anything i command of you will be done without question. Is that understood?" You can not stop your lips from opening and your voice from escaping your mouth as it shouts out "Yes, Ma'am. Whatever you say." She smiles in delight at your compliance and says "Please. There's no need for brevity here. You can call me Alex." You immediately shoot back "Yes, Alex. I'm sorry." She leans in close to you and says "That's perfectly okay, my new lover. Now let's get a little more comfortable, shall we? Follow me into my room." She kisses you quickly on your lips, and you can taste the strawberry flavoring from her lipstick. It seems that although you can't control any of your body parts, you'll still be able to feel every sensation that goes through it. "Yes Alex." You respond even though every inch of your inner thoughts are screaming at her to let you go and have control of your body again.

She grabs you by the hand and leads you through the sets to the other side of the backstage area, where you come across a door with her name spelled across it in fancy lettering. There is a security guard posted outside the door and she whispers to him "Nobody gets in for the next few hours. Understood?" The guard blankly stares ahead and says "Yes, Alex." And that's when you realize that she's hypnotized pretty much every member of her staff as well! But she obviously had different plans for you as she leads you into the dressing room and has a seat on the end of the bed. She points at the door and says "Shut that, would you? I don't want any unexpected visitors." "Yes, Alex". You respond as you turn and quickly shut the door. "Latch it as well, dear!" You hear behind you and you shut the lock, keeping everything out.... and you in. You turn back to face the curly-haired witch who's holding you against your will and She crosses her arms, biting her lip in thought as she says "Well then... what should I have you do for me first?"

What does she want your first job as her hypnotized lover to be?
15132332.title: Her Brainwashed Lover

choices: "As small as a flea!"
"No longer a human!"
"Hundreds of miles away!"
15132333.content: Wait... Did she say DAUGHTER?! Before you could even backtrack a bit, Miss Rivers throws her hands up into the air and you find yourself caught in a web of magic energy. Your arms are held out against your will and you can feel your feet leaving the ground, almost as if she's making you levitate in mid-air! This woman was the real deal: Magic exists and you've angered somebody who could actually control it! With a wicked smirk, the magician flicks her wrists, and you feel sharp pains enter your chest. You can only wince and moan with pain, your body won't bend or move to react to the stinging aches. She just laughs at your pain and says "You think I'd let Anna go out with a common piece of trash like you? I'd rather die than watch as someone so much beneath her treats her like a piece of meat." You can't even protest, it's almost as if your lungs are compacted too tight for you to breathe. The magician has you completely under her power and there's nothing you can do to stop it. You've never felt so helpless in your entire life. All you can do is float there, totally immobolized as the magician makes her next move. With a free hand, she reaches into her back pocket and pulls out the same magic want you saw her use on stage. Is she going to use it on you again? "You should know better than to mess with the family of a powerful magician! It's going to be a lot harder for you to go out with my daughter when you're..."
15132333.title: Stay Away from The Magician's Daughter!!

choices: "I'LL GRANT YOU YOUR WISH."  She carries you to her daughter's dressing room!
"YOU'LL HAVE TO EARN THAT PRIVELEDGE."  She carries you into HER dressing room!
"GO FIND HER".  She flicks you off her hand to the ground below!
151323331.content:
All the magician has to do is wink and snap her fingers, and before you know it a feeling that resembles a million lighting bolts striking you at the same time forces it's way onto your skin. Your entire body glows with a thin blue aura, and you feel as if the air around you is compressing you at all sides. The frizzy-haired woman holds her hand open with her palm facing up, and you find yourself being drawn towards it in mid air. The compression gets harder on all sides and that's when you realize that everything around you is growing at an alarming rate. She's using her magic to shrink you! Inch by inch is shaved off of your height until you're the size of a small doll. You float down onto the magician's hand, marvelling at how soft the landing was. But the blue aura doesn't fade away, and you continue to shrink smaller and smaller. The gaps and cracks in the giant woman's palm continue to get wider and longer, changing your terrain from a soft smooth bed into a rough, cracked landscape. When the light finally fades away, you are unfamiliar with your surroundings, although you know exactly where you are. A peach colored land mass surrounded by tall similarly colored pillars. You can't be more than half an inch tall standing in this magical woman's palm. You slowly lift your head up to see the massive head of this woman staring down at you. Her bright blue eyes seem to be staring daggers in you as she keeps her hand steady, not wanting to lose her prize. She licks her glorious lips and whispers down to you "WELL THEN. STILL LOOKING TO DATE MY DAUGHTER? YOU'D BETTER HOPE SHE LIKES SHORTER GUYS, BECAUSE YOU CAN'T BE ANY LARGER THAN HER LITTLEST TOE!"

You scramble to the edge of her palm, hoping to get someone's attention, but you are far too small to be heard by anyone other than the giantess holding you. And besides, nobody seems to be paying Rivers any mind, almost as if they've seen this thing a million times before. You hear a loud chuckle overhead and look back up at the goddess gazing down at you. "NICE TRY, LITTLE THING. BUT EVERYONE UNDER MY EMPLOY KNOWS BETTER THAN TO INTERFERE WITH ME WHEN MY MAGIC IS CONCERNED. AND BESIDES, FROM THEIR PERSPECTIVE I'M NOT DOING ANYTHING UNUSUAL. JUST CRUSHING AN ANT." She raises her other hand above you, extending her pointer finger and slowly lowering it to your tiny frame. You scream in fear, fully expecting her to squash you out of existance in her palm like a measley speck. However, when the finger gets within a few feet (to your scale) of crushing you completely, it stalls. Rivers' voice rings through the air as she whispers "IT WOULD BE SO EASY, YOU KNOW. LIKE WIPING AWAY A SPECK OF DIRT. BUT I THINK YOU DESERVE BETTER THAN THAT. YOU DESERVE A LONGER, MORE DRAWN OUT PUNISHMENT." She raises the palm up to her piercing eyes, and with a long, drawn out smile she says "YOU WANT TO BE CLOSE TO MY DARLING ANNA?..."
151323331.title: An Ant in the Magician's Palm

choices: "DOLL!"
"SHOE!"
"VIBRATOR!"
151323332.content: You drop back down to the ground as she releases her grip on you, but you can feel a magic aura still surrounding you. She crosses her arms and says "Hope you enjoyed your humanity, because it's all over for you RIGHT NOW..." Her voice gets deeper and more powerful, and before you can register what's happened, you feel your body start to compress on all sides. The Magician Alex Rivers gets larger and larger before you. She laughs at the power she has over you as her magic causes you to dwindle down in size in front of her eyes. "THAT'S IT. SHRINK FOR ME. YOU WERE A POOR EXCUSE FOR A HUMAN, SO I'M GOING TO GIVE YOU ANOTHER LIFE. MAYBE IN THIS ONE YOU'LL BE A BIT MORE USEFUL." You try to scream out in pain and objection, but your voice goes silent. You're unable to communicate with the outside world anymore! Your limbs and organs all seem to either drop off or disappear completely, and you are left in a completely new, terrifying shape. When you feel the magic leave your body, you know that you've been made into something smaller... something inhuman. You still have your conciousness but are unable to move and react like you used to... and that's when you feel the magician's powerful, soft hands wrap around you as she lifts you up to her awe-inspiring face. With a wicked grin and open, pleased eyes she whispers down onto your new form "JUST WHAT I NEEDED! A BRAND NEW..."
151323332.title: Turned Into an Object

choices: You hear a voice call out to you (The islanders are your size!)
You hear a rumbling noise come from beyond the trees (The islanders are huge!)
You feel a sharp sting on your ankles (The islanders are tiny!)
151323333.content:
"Goodbye, you meddling little worm!" is the last sentence you hear before a surge of electricity runs through your body at lightning speed. You are immediately blinded by a change in light as the magician disappears from your sight completely, replaced by a bright, hot sun. You put your arms up to shield your eyes from the brightness as you realize that you're in a completely different place than you were before. She's teleported you to a warm, sandy beach! You are momentarily awestruck by how clear and blue the water is, along with the pristine woodlands behind you. This place is gorgeous! But much like when you found yourself on stage, you have no idea what country you're even in... or if the beach you're standing on has even been drawn on a map before! You sigh with disapproval and take a seat in the sand, wondering how you're going to get out of this mess. And that's when you hear in a clear, powerful voice...

"YOU ARE JUST MAKING FRIENDS EVERYWHERE YOU GO, AREN'T YOU?" You recognize the voice instantly as the one that sent you on this journey to begin with... it was Madame Rosella! You stand back up and look around for a second, before realizing that she's contacting you from her tent somehow. She reiterates this by saying "DON'T BOTHER TRYING TO FIND ME. I'M RIGHT WHERE I'VE ALWAYS BEEN. YOU ON THE OTHER HAND HAVE FOUND YOURSELF ON A SMALL STRIP OF PARADISE HAVEN'T YOU?" You feel the sand beneath your toes and the cool breeze, before gazing once more at the tall, blooming palm trees behind you. You shrug your shoulders and say "I... guess so. It does seem like a nice place. I wonder why that crazy magician would want to send me here." You hear her laughter ring through your head and sigh knowing that something isn't right. "Unless there's something about this island that you're not telling me." She puts on a mock surprise voice that even without watching her face you can tell is toying with you. "WHAT? WHY, NOT AT ALL. IT SEEMS LIKE A PERFECTLY WONDERFUL PLACE TO SPEND A VACATION. JUST AS LONG AS YOU OVERLOOK SOME OF THE... SMALL... SURPRISES..." Before you can ask what she means by that, you are distracted by something peculiar...
151323333.title: Welcome to the Island

choices: "Shrinks to a smaller size!"
"Grows into an Amazon!"
"Becomes the nearest person's slave!"
1513233331.content:
You see something in the distance and walk over towards it. It looks like a resort of some kind... a resort occupied by people! You see all sorts of men and women playing on the beach and tanning, just genuinely enjoying the sun. You smile to yourself, thinking that maybe you've finally found a stroke of luck. That's when your eye catches a beautiful brunette woman sitting alone at a table. She's reading a book and looking bored, so you decide to approach her. "Excuse me, miss, is this seat taken?" She looks up at you and lowers her eyeglasses, scanning you up and down. With a pretty smile she says "Sure, i don't mind." You sit down and strike up a conversation with her, looking out on the other gorgeous people hanging out on the beach. The girl scooches her chair up next to yours and continues talking.

"My name's Cali. Is this your first time vacationing here?" You answer back "Yeah but... i've gotta be honest I have no idea how i got here. What is this place?" She cocks her head and says "What did you just wash ashore? This is Isl De Taille. It's off the coast of Martinique. Not a lot of people know about it, but it's quite the special place." You can see why. The water is crystal clear, the beaches are unpolluted and it's just all in all a gorgeous scene. You are interrupted by a beautiful ebony woman in a bikini carrying a tray of fruit. "Sir, can I offer you a sample?" You are starving from your experiences the whole day long, and grab it from her politely. "Yes, please thank you." As soon as she wanders away, you start to take piece after piece of the juicy sweet fruit pieces. You are thrown off a bit by Cali's odd stare. She's almost looking at you in amazement as you eat the snacks before you. She raises an eyebrow and says "Umm, are you sure you want to eat all that at once?" You don't think you're making that big of a spectacle of yourself and say "Sorry, i mean it's not very filling. And i've only had like four pieces."

"Four p... oh my god... you don't know, do you?" Cali's laughter reverberates through your head and you start to feel a little funny. You put your drink down and hold your head going "Woah... i can't be this drunk already can I? I only took a few sips of this?" Cali leans in and whispers "That's what i was trying to tell you! This whole island is special because of the food. It has certain... qualities about it..." You look at her with a little bit of worry in your eyes and say "What's happening to me?" She just smirks and says "Well don't freak out... but anyone who eats it..."
1513233331.title: Sampling the Fruit

choices: "CAN YOU HELP MY FRIEND?"  She says as she gives you to the waitress
"CAN I HAVE SOME GROW FRUIT PLEASE?"  She says as she shows you to the waitress
"CAN I GET THE CHECK?"  She says as she drops you into her shoe!
15132333311.content:
The pretty girl sitting next to you looks immediately more intimidating, and it looks almost as if the entire world is expanding around you. She's right: The fruit made you smaller! You stand up in the chair, shocked at the fact that even standing up on the seat, you're still only a few inches taller than the girl and shrinking fast. "I'm getting smaller! What the fuck am I supposed to do!" Cali holds her hands up and slowly brings them down, as if motioning for you to breathe, saying "Just calm down. It'll be over soon, but you did eat a lot of it. Do yourself a favor and stand up on the table so you don't fall off the chair or something." You nod your head in agreement and lean over the edge of the table, hopping over it like you were climbing atop a massive platform. You step towards Cali on the table, marvelling at how big she's getting. She has her elbows propped up on the table, with her hands supporting her head as she looks at you with a worried look on her face. Her voice is getting deeper and louder as you continue to dwindle.

"WOW. YOU'RE UH... YOU'RE GETTING PRETTY TINY THERE." You roll your eyes and say "I hadn't noticed. Seriously, how small am i supposed to get?" Cali bites her lip and says "UMMM... SEE THAT'S THE THING. NOBODY'S REALLY SUPPOSED TO HAVE MORE THAN TWO. AND EVEN THEN, THE SMALLEST I'VE EVER SEEN ANYONE WAS TWO FEET TALL. YOU'RE WAYYYY SMALLER THAN THAT." You continue to stare up at Cali, thinking that maybe you'll eventually shrink down to nothing on the table. That feeling goes away however, when you see the giant girl stop growing. She notices it too as she lifts her head off of her hands and says "OH! GOOD! I THINK YOU STOPPED SHRINKING." The girl looks absolutely enormous, but you're a terrible judge of how small you are just from her, so you ask her if she's got a ruler or a tape measure or something. She looks at you like you're crazy and says "YOU THINK I BROUGHT THOSE WITH ME ON VACATION? NO, BUT I DO HAVE SOMETHING THAT MIGHT HELP.

She reaches down below the table for a few seconds, and pulls up a humongous black pump. She places it on the table and says "OKAY, STAND RIGHT UP NEXT TO IT." You stand next to the gigantic piece of footwear, smelling faint traces of the sand and sweat stuck to it over time. Cali places her huge finger right above your head, which frightens you for a second, but her smile comforts you in this most unfortunate situation. "HMM.... YOU'RE TALLER THAN THE HEEL, WHICH IS THREE INCHES... BUT NOT BY MUCH. I'D SAY YOU'RE ABOUT FIVE OR SIX INCHES TALL. AT MOST." You sigh vocally and say "Great. I'm the size of a friggin' ken doll." Cali tilts her head and says "WELL, NOT QUITE. BUT STILL MOST MEN THINK SIX INCHES IS A PRETTY ACCEPTABLE SIZE." You tried not to laugh at her silly joke, but her smile was just so inviting you couldn't help but feel alright with being doll-sized around this beautiful woman. That is, until you heard another giantess approaching from behind Cali. You didn't know how to respond so you just hid behind her shoe on the table, waiting to see what was going to happen. The Waitress was a gorgeous asian woman with long black hair, dressed in a tight green bikini. She spoke in broken english, but her voice was massive and domineering. "MA'AM. YOU WANT ANOTHER DRINK?" Cali looks at the table quickly and sees you hiding, smirking at your little body under her hovering hand. She gently reaches down for you and says "OH, NO THANK YOU BUT..."
15132333311.title: The Shrinking Fruit

choices: "YES!  I MAKE YOU BIG NOW!"
"NO!  YOU WAIT WITH ME UNTIL IT WEAR OFF!"
"NO!  YOU STAY TINY FOREVER!"
151323333111.content:
Cali carefully scoops you up into the palm of her hand and lifts you off the table. She holds you close as she says "IT SEEMS MY LITTLE FRIEND HERE HAS SHRUNK HIMSELF A LITTLE TOO MUCH. CAN YOU HELP HIM?" You are presented to the waitress who's eyes go wide as she spots you in Cali's palm. She puts down her tray and leans in close to you, brushing her long black hair out of her face to get a clear look at you. "AWW, LOOK AT HIM! HE SO SMALL NOW! HOW MUCH HE EAT?" Cali looks down at you and says "WHAT WAS IT THAT YOU HAD? THREE, MAYBE FOUR PIECES OF THE SHRINKING FRUIT?" You nervously hold up a hand and stick out four fingers, not wanting to lie to the waitress if it comes back to affect your re-growth in the end. She holds a hand up to her mouth and says "OH GOODNESS! NOBODY EVER EAT FOUR BEFORE! YOU LUCKY YOU DIDN'T SHRINK TO NOTHING!" That's a possibility? Getting so small that you just keep shrinking for all eternity? You are glad it hasn't come to that but still want to fix yourself, so you wait for the waitress to leave her hand flat up against Cali's and you quickly hop from one gigantic person to the next.

Cali giggles to herself as she feels you leave her fingers and puts her hand down to her side. She looks up at the waitress and says "TAKE GOOD CARE OF HIM, AND WHATEVER FRUIT HE ATE, JUST PUT ON MY TAB. I'LL COVER IT." YOU ARE LESS THAN A BUG… I NEVER FEEL THIS BIG COMPARED TO ANOTHER PERSON…” She bites her lip as she starts to sway a bit, keeping her finger glued to the table in front of you. You feel it’s for fear of accidentally knocking you over, but you also think she may just love taking in the sight of seeing someone so pitiful standing next to her fingernail. She narrows her gaze on you and says “THIS PUNISHMENT SUITS YOU. YOU ACT ALL BIG WHEN I HAVE YOU IN MY HAND, BUT NOW YOU SMALLER THAN ANYONE ON THE ISLAND. MAYBE EVEN THE WHOLE PLANET. NOW I THINK YOU RESPECT ME." She glances down at the hand clutching the dehydrated piece of fruit, some of it still dripping from her fingertips and she lets out an earth shattering giggle. “IF NOT… I JUST GET MORE FRUIT. SHRINK YOU TO NOTHING.” As if the words weren’t powerful enough, She gently lifts her finger off the countertop and slams it back down with minimal force. The simple action was enough to cause a wall of force to come flying at you, almost knocking you off your feet. The goddess above you grins at how insignificant you are, and she lowers her whole body down to get a better look at you. It’s like watching amountain cave in on itself as she presses her face against the edge of the counter, and your miniscule form still has to force itself to stare upwards to look at her eyes. The asian behemoth shows her teeth with a wide smile before a deafening whisper covers you… “I’M YOUR GOD NOW. WORSHIP ME.”
1513233331113122.title: Smaller Than Her Fingernail

choices: "OF COURSE.  HERE!"  She says as she cuts you a small piece.
"IN A WHILE.  LET'S HAVE SOME FUN FIRST."  She says as she packs it for later.
"UM... WHO SAID IT WAS FOR YOU?"  She says as she eats the whole piece!
151323333112.content:
Cali grabs the massive shoe you're hiding behind and tilts it ever so slightly, just so your little body is out of the sight of the gargantuan Asian taking her order. "CAN I HAVE ONE PIECE OF THE GROW FRUIT, PLEASE? AND THE CHECK WHENEVER YOU GET THE CHANCE." The waitress nods and walks away. Cali lifts up her shoe and says "YOU CAN COME OUT NOW. THE BIG BAD FIVE-FOOT-TALL WAITRESS IS GONE NOW." You are a bit embarassed and say "Sorry, I just didn't know how to handle that. She was so big!" Cali rests her hands on top of each other, laying her chin atop them both to look at you closer to your level. "WELL, THAT'S WHY PEOPLE COME TO THIS ISLAND. IT'S FUN SEEING PEOPLE AT ALL DIFFERENT SIZES. I DON'T THINK I'D WANT TO SEE THINGS FROM YOUR PERSPECTIVE, THOUGH. I PREFER LOOKING DOWN ON MY GUYS." You sit indian style, half-amazed that you're still talking to this gorgeous woman who's the size of a skyscraper. Every movement she makes turns you on. Every turn of her head followed by a cascade of red hair. Every word that she speaks in a deep, powerful voice. And every smile she makes that just warms your heart. You can't help but say out loud "I kind of like things from down here. There's a lot to admire." Cali smiles and says "SUCH A TEENY LITTLE GENTLEMAN. WELL, IF YOU STICK AROUND WITH ME I'M SURE YOU'LL FIND PLENTY OF THINGS TO STARE AT. BIG AND SMALL ALIKE." You knew it now. You were completely in love with this girl.

Cali's eyes widen a bit as she raises a massive hand over you, softly covering you in one quick motion. You hear commotion on the table around you, but the sound is muffled by the soft skin of Cali's hand which is covering your ears. You are so comfortable and protected in this state, you almost hate when she removes her hand a few seconds later. She makes a guilty face and says "SORRY, I DIDN'T NOTICE HER COME BY WITH THE CHECK... BUT SHE ALSO BROUGHT SOME GROW FRUIT, CHECK IT OUT!" You walk over to her plate, and see a massive, multicolored fruit cut into convenient slices. Well, they'd be convenient for a normal sized person. Each sliver seems to be longer and wider than the height of your entire body. You shout up to Cali incredulously "How big can this make someone?" Cali scrunches her nose and says "I'M NOT REALLY SURE. THE TALLEST I SAW ANYBODY HERE WAS ABOUT FIFTY FEET TALL. THEY WERE STOMPING ON BEACH CHAIRS AND TREES AND EVERYTHING. BUT I THINK YOU CAN GET EVEN BIGGER THAN THAT." Wow, there were a lot of possibilities on this island, and you wanted to try them all! You approach Cali and say "Not that i haven't enjoyed being small or anything, but my neck kind of hurts from looking up at your face this whole time. Could i have some of that fruit now?" Cali lets out a low belly laugh and says...
151323333112.title: The Grow Fruit Arrives

choices: You easily overpower the puny women
You are overtaken by the small swarm of people!
You are defeated when they bring you down to size...
1513233333.content:
You decide not to dwell on it for a moment, taking into consideration how beautiful the island is. The water is crystal clear, and while the jungle behind you is definitely vast and dark, there is easily enough room on the shore for you to avoid it for the time being. So you just sit down in the sand and stare out into the ocean, enjoying the breeze. You close your eyes and breathe in the fresh air thinking "Okay... this is kind of nice and all but... how the hell am I going to get home?" You hold your arms out to the world expecting some sort of sign, but instead you are greeted with a sharp pain to your foot. You immediately look down and see some movement. Expecting a bug or a crab of some kind down there, you sweep your hand down to knock it out of the way. But upon touching the offending object, you realize that the small creature is warm and soft to the touch. You pinch at it with your thumb and forefinger, and bring it up to your face. Your jaw drops as you see that the creature attacking you is not some bug or rodent... it's a woman! A tiny naked woman, no more than three inches tall!

The girl is admittedly very cute at that size, with long, black hair and smooth brown skin. She is obviously indiginous to the island, and you wonder if everyone else is this tiny to you. You also see that she's clutching a long hand-made spear, which you effortlessly flick out of her puny hands. She is furious at the loss of her weapon and screams at you in the most adorable high pitched screech her little lungs can muster. "Put me down, you giant, ugly beast! Release me at once!" You laugh at her bravado as she visiously swipes at your face even from her position dangling between your fingertips. You shake her around for a minute, momentarily disorienting her as you say "Oh yeah? Well I didn't appreciate Why don't you make me." You are enjoying the power you have over the tiny girl, when all of a sudden you hear a faint chant grow closer. Other, similarly miniscule voices are singing in unison "Kill the beast! Kill the beast! Kill the beast!" You look around you to see that you are surrounded on all sides by tiny women! All of them are brandishing small, primitive weapons and aiming at you. You look at the girl in your hands and say "Oh, you've got to be kidding me." The girl just smiles and says "You asked for it... Get him, girls!"
1513233333.title: An Island of Tiny Women

choices: You are equal in size to the indigenous girls!
You are only half their size... get ready for payback!
You are only the size of a bug to them!  Try to escape!
15132333333.content:
All at once, the women at your feet hoist up their spears and attack your feet from all sides. Ankles, toes, soles and the webbing are all stabbed in one solid movement, causing you to jump up and down in pain. "OW! What the hell? You're asking for it, you little nothings!" You raise your foot to step on some of the women, just to scare the rest into letting you escape, when you realize the girl in between your fingers seems to be growing in size. Can the women here change their height whenever they want? No, it can't be because the surrounding area, the trees, even the grass appear to be rising up around you. The woman in your hands giggles and says "Well, well. Looks like someone should have been nicer to the little 'nothings' by his feet... How does it feel to lose your height so quickly?" The woman has grown to the size of a large doll now, and you hold her tightly in between two hands. "What is going on? Why am I shrinking? Answer me or i'll squeeze the life right out of you!"

The amazon dismisses your threats and brushes her hair aside, confidently shouting up at you as you dwindle down "Just because we are smaller than you, did you think we are so helpless? We have survived here for hundreds of generations because we know the secrets of this island! The fruit that grows from these trees has the power to turn even the mightiest of warriors into the smallest of ants! And we have coated all of our weapons in the juices that these fruits contain! So every stab you took on your foot while you were a giant is taking its' toll on your size right now!!" After a while, the shrinking rapidly occurs, and you find yourself unwilling to hold the amazonian woman growing in your arms. You drop her, watching in amazement as a trio of equally scaled women rush to formation, catching her effortlessly. You look at the cheering group of women, hoping you'll stop shrinking soon. But when you do, just how small are you going to end up?!
15132333333.title: Shrunk by the Tiny Women!

choices: Attempt to scale one of the women and hide in their clothing!
Run between the women's feet and head for the forest!
Bury yourself in sand and try to avoid the stomping feet!
151323333333.content:
You continue sinking towards the ground until you are only about 10 feet tall compared to the miniscule women, but you feel it in your gut that you are about to become a lot smaller. Every one of them has their attention drawn to you, and you feel you have to do something drastic so they do not capture you. Realizing you're on a beach, you take advantage of your size while you still have it and dig your toes deep into the sand. In one swift motion, you kick up a flurry of dust, temporarily blinding the girls as they raise their hands up to block the infiltrating dirt and dust from entering their eyes. In the whirlwhind, you sink slowly into the cloud, hoping to run away from the mob in their confusion. Still disoriented from the feeling of shrinking, you attempt to walk through the crowd, only to stop just short of a horrifying site. A set of five brown toes half buried in the sand. They are clenched into each other, as the giant woman before you attempts to stand her ground amidst the dust storm she's battling. The shrinking didn't take very long: You are only a few inches tall compared to this woman. Which is pretty amazing considering she was the size of a doll not more than a minute ago. You don't even dare think of what a normal sized human would look like from your scale. The nubian giant before you looks around confused and says "DID HE GET AWAY? OR DID HE SIMPLY SHRINK INTO NOTHINGNESS BEFORE US?"

You turn and run in the opposite direction, and just as before find yourself face to face with a wall of flesh. This time though, you fail to stop before hitting it, and make contact with the dry, sandy skin of a similarly dark skinned foot. Faster than you can comprehend, It instinctively moves out of the way and you see a large five-pronged shadow raised overhead. You scream in terror and dash quickly to the side as the woman's massive hand slams down onto the sand where you were just standing. "DAMN! I FELT SOMETHING SMALL RUB UP AGAINST MY TOES! HE MUST BE TRYING TO ESCAPE!

Trudging through the sand amongst a forest of darkened skin, you attempt to maneuver between the massive feet of these miniscule women, as a familiar voice booms out behind you. The woman who you were just holding in your hand, now standing as tall as a downtown skyscraper, gives out a mighty laugh and shouts "AHAHA! LOOKS LIKE WE HAVE A RUNNER! LOOK TO YOUR FEET, SISTERS... YOU MAY FIND A BUG OF A MAN UNDER YOUR HEELS!"

Now that the women are all looking down, you know your next action has to be a smart one. Do you dare to run, or instead do you try to hide from them? Either way, you can tell this situation is only going to get worse before it gets better...
151323333333.title: Under the Tribal Women's Feet

choices: You get her attention and she hides you from her friend
You get her attention, and she showed you to her friend
You try to, but only to get stepped on
1513233333333.content:
As much as you want to go and run to the giant jungle, you don’t even move for a second. If you wanted to, you would be screwed in a second. It was so far away and you would get caught. What other options do you have? Looking around up to them, they were so big and the dust was coming down. Climbing them and hiding there would not be an option.

One long time, you think about it and decide to bury yourself in the sand. Getting down and moving some around. Only for another problem to arise.

Normally, it was grains of sand. Their size it was pebbles of sand. At yours, it was rocks of sand. So you had more trouble moving them out of the way.

Throwing heavy rocks over you and covered you.

Finally it was over, as you were hidden ant the dust was gone. Holding your breath, you could hear all of them talk.

“Hey, where is he?”

“Where’s that man beast! He’s got to be here!”

“Check your feet sisters! I know he’s here.” She said, the one you were holding. Guess she was the one that hated you the most. You understand though, given your size that you are so small compared to her and you were carrying. Fantasy revenge right there.

Regardless, you stayed there and heard massive footfalls around you. They were all looking for you, but you were not moving. You would rather get stepped on them running and being found.

Which funnily is how it goes.

One of the giantess woman was searching for you, and stepped down onto the place you were hiding!

You were not ready for this, as you could not see it. Not even when it hit you for a long while as you get destroyed. Her foot powered over you as you feel yourself go out in a second. It was like a piano dropping on you, and you could not hope to stay conscious.

-

When you woke up, your body ached and hurt. You feel pain surge through your body as you had to lift yourself up. Lifting yourself up as you get the rocks over you, until you remember the giantess situation and jumped back down!

hiding and being afraid, wondering if they were still searching for you. None of them were though, as you heard no one.

Raising you looked around at the beach that you8 once towered over. They were all gone. It must of been later in the day or something, cause no one was on the beach.

Breathing a sigh of relief about it, a smile on your face as you were very happy about it. You somehow survived, your buried idea not only worked, but worked we-

“Ow!” you cut yourself off, gripping your back. That was maybe not the best plan, but you survived.

“Now what? What can you really do at the moment. Small, on an island you’ve never been as public enemy number one.

Which is more accurate than you thought.

You hear footsteps and get down, hiding under the rocks of sand even more as you see more giant woman come into view. Two of them if you were being exact. One had long blonde wild unkept hair, and was wearing old fashion garb. If you were being hones it was more like a bikini rather than the other.

The other woman had darker skin, and black hair which looks like to be combed. It wasn’t long hair, but it was down to her neck. She wore the same outfit.

Both of the girls looked so giant, and you were a little scared. The blonde was holding a spear, so that worried you some more.

Is she going to be hunting for fish? That seems really stupid, they would be big compared to her, even the guppies. On the other side, her size would make sure she would get plenty of food from even the smallest of fish.

“Thanks for coming Aisha, can’t carry my catches by myself.” The blonde said with a smile.

“It’s okay Toka. I’m not going in though, I still remember last time I went in and a crab almost got me.”

“Please, I shrunk and stepped on that crab. I had it handled.”

“Didn’t feel handled, I can tell you that.” Aisha laughed and joked. They seem to be good friends.

“Speaking of shrinking, did you hear. The warriors shrunk a giant man on the beach recently.” Toka the blonde said, as you interest went up.

“Yeah I heard about that. What was a man doing here?”

“I dunno, but they shrunk that bastard down. Wish I could see it.” Toka said as you were not liking her. “I love it when big things get shrunk down to nothing, it’s always so great.”

“Great?”

“Think about it. They are so big, and now they are nothing. Same thing would be going for the man. You know... they said they didn’t catch him. He might be scurrying around the ground under us.”

“To be honest, I hope. I mean, it’s the first man to be here in so long! I kind of hope to meet him, and well, who knows. Maybe the warriors were wrong.”

“Oh you have such a weird thing with them. Remembering when that giant monitor attacked the village. They shrunk it down and you insisted! You insisted on keeping it.”

“Yeah well... I just think if we are bigger, we shouldn’t be mean.” Aisha said as Toka rolled her eyes.

“Whatever, I’m gonna go get some fish.” And with that, she walked away as you knew what you were going to do.

Aisha is the girl you want. not only does she seem nice, she has a very caring attitude. Not to mention her friend was walking to the ocean at the moment, and she was by herself.

Getting the rocks out, you carry your hurt body over and closer to the giant girl.
1513233333333.title: Hiding From The Tiny Woman

choices: A science laboratory?
A goth-y clothing store?
Someplace else
