15133.title: A little different

choices: A hamster cage?
An Ant Farm?!
A MICROSCOPE SLIDE?!!
151331.content:
Your vision starts falling back into place, and you hear these words ringing around in your head. "Are you feeling anything yet?" Eventually you can see clearly and standing before you are two young, bespectacled, well endowed women in white lab coats. The one on the left with the nametag "E. DeWinn" is taller and skinnier, with long blonde hair down to her waist. The girl on your right with the nametag "N. Serra" is shorter and heavier, with short brown hair. Both of them seem to be staring at you intently, waiting for some sort of response. But you still have no idea where you are so you just ask what comes naturally. "What... are you talking about? Who are you?" Both of them sigh and the taller girl says "Did you hear that, Nella?" The other nods and writes down a note into her phone. "Sure did, Eliza. Looks like the new compound can lead to some short term memory loss. We'll have to scan it for future tests." Eliza readjusts her glasses and says "Well, let's see if the rest of the procedure has any negative effects." You are still confused and say "Procedure? What procedure?" Nella pats you on the shoulder and says "Here's the deal, because you don't remember. You signed up for our three week study on mass degeneration and matter reduction." You start to get frustrated and say kind of snappily "English, please?" And that's when you realize that the shirt you're wearing suddenly feels a size too large. As do your pants.

With a raise of an eyebrow, this catches Eliza's attention as she says "Nella, I hope you're taking notes again." Nella types away at her phone and says "Finally, we may have a success on our hands!" You are still trying to understand exactly what's going on when Eliza leans in towards you and you become aware that she's now taller than you. "In layman's terms, the compound you took is going to miniaturize you. We'll be monitoring you for the whole process, we just don't know when it will stop." As you stand there amazed, your clothes get larger and larger around you, as do the two scientists staring at you with enormous grins. Their voices get louder as you continue to shrink. "I BELIEVE THIS IS GOING EXACTLY ACCORDING TO OUR HYPOTHESIS, NELLA." "WELL, SO FAR I DON'T SEE ANY ADVERSE AFFECTS. BUT WE DON'T WANT TO LOSE HIM IN HIS SHIRT. PICK HIM UP AND PUT HIM ON THE TABLE." You're only about a foot tall now, standing in the neck-hole of your shirt, and you feel paralyzed from the experience. Not so much that you are unable to move due to the chemistry, but rather that your mind is unwilling to work on anything else until it figures out exactly what's happening as you get smaller and smaller. The blonde crouches down over you and reaches out with a hand shielded by a blue latex glove. You feel her fingers slip easily under your arms and lift your now naked body off of the ground and up to her chest level.

Eliza's hand continues to grow slightly around you as it places you gently onto a metal table on the side of the girls. They crowd around you again, their presence never losing it's impact on your diminishing body. Eliza gets onto her knees to look at you closer, and cracks a smile when your eyes meet. Her warm breath washes over you as she speaks, "HE'S SO TINY ALREADY, BUT HE'S STILL SHRINKING. HOW MUCH LONGER WILL THE PROCESS TAKE?" Nella gets down on Eliza's level and now you've got four massive eyes enhanced by thick eyeglasses gazing down upon you. Nella seems to be taking a lot more precautions to hide her excitement, and says with a very stearn voice "WELL, HE'S ONLY ABOUT 8 INCHES TALL AT THE MOMENT. HE'LL CONTINUE TO SHRINK UNTIL HE'S SMALL ENOUGH UNTIL HE CAN FIT COMFORTABLY INTO THAT." She points behind you with a massive index finger, and you follow the intended direction behind you. You turn around to find what she is talking about and are stunned at what's waiting for you when you finally get small enough...
151331.title: Shrunk... FOR SCIENCE!

choices: She scoops you up to play with you!
She lifts up her shoe and tries to stomp on you!
She doesn't like you like this, and transforms you into something different
151332.content:
The white light fades, and in an almost echoed state, you hear a female voice ask you "Hey, are you gonna buy anything or just stand there?" You open your eyes to see a blurry vision before you: A fairly cute looking goth girl who is less than pleased to see you. The girl looks to be about 19 or 20, is very skinny and has very pale skin. She has long black hair, and a few piercings around her lips and nose. Her arms are crossed over her black half-shirt, barely blocking your view of her decent sized breasts. You can barely focus on that, however as you're still struggling to adapt to being transported here against your will. You are stumbling a bit and trying to keep yourself from being too nauseous. "Please, I... I don't know... where am I?" Instead of helping you, the girl just rolls her eyes and says "Fucking drunks. Every weekend. Look, if you're not going to buy anything, you're not welcome here. So take your wino ass out of my store before something bad happens." You look around for a second, noticing that you're face to face with a seemingly never-ending wall of black t-shirts, chain wallets, and all sorts of dark clothing. This place looks like a Hot Topic or something, and you've been transported right into the middle of it. You can see where the raven-haired beauty is a bit concerned, as she thinks you're just some drunk guy who stumbled in and is looking to cause trouble. You hold your arms up in protest and say "Please, I just... i need a minute to think... I don't know how I got here..." But she isn't having any of it, and grabs you hard by the arm and twists it, saying "I said leave right now! Or you're going to get hurt" You are so out of it, you barely even realize it's happening, but almost out of instinct, you throw your arm up and send the girl flying backwards, screaming "Don't fucking touch me!" You almost immediately snap back to reality in time to see the girl knocked over a clothing display. She lets out an aggrivated scream and stands up on her own, screaming "That's it! I warned you!" You try to apologize, but you get an awful feeling brewing deep inside your gut. You feel sick as you drop to your knees and see a strange black aura surrounding your hand and arm as you hold it in front of your face. You look up for a second and see the girl looking deeply into your eyes with a wicked look as she holds up her hand aggressively. Her hair is flowing freely behind her, almost as if it's being held up by some unknown force, and when she twists her hand slightly, you feel the pain in your stomach getting stronger. She walks right up next to you and says in a booming voice "YOU LIKE TOSSING WOMEN AROUND? I'M GOING TO ENJOY WATCHING YOU SHRIVEL AND SHRINK."

You feel her black magic surrounding you as you feel it taking hold on you. You wonder how it is that everyone you manage to accidentally upset turns out to be an all-powerful practitioner of the dark arts, but you're too terified to think about it too much. You look up from your panicked state to find that you're eyes only come up to her breasts and you're sinking to the ground at an alarming rate! "THAT'S RIGHT, WORM. SHRINK FOR ME. FEEL MY MAGIC INVADE YOUR BODY AS YOU GET SMALLER AND SMALLER." You can't do anything against this ever-growing woman except recoil in pain and wait for the shrinking to stop. When you finally do, you look straight ahead to see her gigantic black boots tapping against the hardwood floor, each movement sending a frightful shockwave through your little body. You slowly trace her long legs up to her face, which is almost obstructed by her massive breasts and crossed arms, but she leans forward to get a better look at you, casting a shadow overhead as she does so. With an uncaring smirk, she bends her knees a bit and whispers "JUST WHERE YOU BELONG. LESS THAN THREE INCHES TALL, COWERING BENEATH ME. GET USED TO THAT VIEW, SHRIMP... BECAUSE I'M NEVER MAKING YOU BIG AGAIN." You try to run away in an opposite direction, but in one swift motion she stomps her foot in front of you, blocking your path. The impact of the massive foot crashing down in your way is enough to throw you several feet and you land hard on your back, looking up at the giant goth girl who's got you right where she wants you. "ARE YOU FUCKING KIDDING ME? YOU CAN'T ESCAPE ME, I'M TOO BIG! YOU'RE NOT GETTING AWAY FROM ME THAT EASILY, YOU FUCKING RAT." You are right where she wants you, frightened and tiny underneath her magnificent, powerful body. What will she do to you?
151332.title: Shrunk by the Goth's Magic

choices: She steps on you... killing you?
She steps on you... but you survive somehow
She loses her balance and misses... giving you a chance to escape!
1513322.content:
You get on your hands and knees, pleading the giant goth girl not to kill you, but your cries fall on deaf ears as she stands back up to her full height and smirks saying "THAT'S RIGHT. BEG. JUST LIKE ALL THE REST." Your life flashes before your eyes as the girl's massive black boot raises up off of the ground and positions itself directly over you. Acting on instinct alone, you saw the giant foot descend upon your location, and you took a running start to the side of the shoe. Jumping out of the way, you feel the impact shake through your body as she steps down HARD. You immediately get up and run some more, knowing that you only have a few seconds to recover as the goth girl notices she's missed her target.

"UGH! YOU LITTLE PEST! JUST TAKE YOUR PUNISHMENT WITH DIGNITY AND DIE UNDER MY BOOT!" You manage to squirm your little body up behind a rack of clothes, taking a quick breather behind the stainless steel leg. When you finally regain your composure, you take a peek behind you and see that the rack you're hiding behind is just a few feet away from the entrance to her store. If you can manage to sneak past her, you may be able to make it out into the open where there's at least an OPPORTUNITY for you to be spotted by somebody else and taken to safety... or trampled in seconds by shoppers. Either way, it's the better option than waiting to be stepped on by the creepy witch looking to kill you where you stand. You are about to throw caution to the wind and make a run for it, when you notice the air around you begin to get more... humid than normal. And an overpowering stench of sweat and leather is distracting you from your goal. And that's when it hits you that you're not alone as you turn and face the largest pair of bare feet you've ever seen.


The girl's big toe was almost half as large as you were, and the other nine of them were wiggling in anticipation as you stared on in horror. You panned up her gigantic legs to see that she was standing with her arms crossed, obviously amused by your shock as she chuckled deeply. "HEHE... I WAS WONDERING HOW LONG IT WOULD TAKE YOU TO NOTICE ME." You fall onto your bottom and scoot backwards, desperately trying to get some distance between you and the pale-skinned goddess that stands before you. She didn't move any closer to you, instead merely tapping her foot, creating a powerful slapping noise as her sweaty soles hit the linoleum floor. You were almost mesmerised by the girl's powerful feet, each toenail glistening in dark black polish. "DO MY FEET SMELL? SORRY BUT I FIGURED I'D RATHER NOT SCUFF UP MY NEW SHOES WITH YOUR GUTS. BESIDES... I THINK I'LL LOVE FEELING YOUR LITTLE LIFE END BETWEEN MY BARE TOES!" Your face goes almost as pale as the giantess's skin as you see the humongous foot raise up into the air, aiming directly for your puny body. You hold your arms up in vain as the huge sole comes crashing down on top of you!
1513322.title: She's Going to Step On You!

15133221.content:
Everything seems to happen in slow motion as her foot begins to head back down towards the ground right above you. You are frozen in place, yet as you look up you are able to see every wrinkle and callous on her sole. As it gets closer, the humid stink of her foot increases, smelling of cheese and leather. It is almost unbearable. Yet fear keep you pinned to the ground. Realizing you weren't running, her foot slows down as she takes her time with it. You feel the soft skin of her arch hit your head and push you down onto the ground. Her sole is now your entire world as the balls of her feet begin to press down on you. The pressure is intense. The last thing you hear before blacking out is her laughter.

The goth girl lifted her foot, seeing a red streak slathered over her foot. She smirked, and put her shoe on without bothering to wipe it off, and walked away, letting some of your remains get walked on on the floor, while the rest soaked into her insole, mixing with her foot sweat.

Then you look and notice your mouth has turned into a pair of mandibles. You look to see you have four arms and let out a shriek because your arms look like insect likes. Then you turn and see a thorax and abdomen and realize that you have been turned into an ant and let out a high pitched scream.

You look up and see Madame Rosella hundreds of times bigger than you looking down and letting out a thunderous laugh that sounds like an earthquake to you. "OH," she says. "YOU HAVE DONE IT RUDE BOY. YOUR NIGHTMARE IS ONLY BEGINNING WITH YOUR NEW LIFE AS A PITIFUL LITTLE ANT."

The titans just keeps laughing and then decides to...
1553.title: You're an Ant

choices: ...survive by staying between her toes, which you quickly latch onto.
...are squashed beneath her sole, yet intact... Are you invincible...?
15531.content:
Madame Rosella towers over, taller than any building you've ever seen, still laughing with such volume and mirth that it feels like your carapace is shaking. You can barely fathom your strange transformation before a devilish glint appears in her eyes, and you see the giantess raising her leg. Upwards it goes, shapely and statuesque, before halting above you, casting a distinct shadow over you. Staring upwards, her bare foot hovers overhead, each wrinkle and each crevice on her sole writhing as she twitches with anticipation.

"A LITTLE BUG LIKE YOU... BELONGS UNDERFOOT!"

In a state of primal panic, you frantically scurry on your legs. As an ant, you are surprisingly fast and agile, and you move as quickly as you can, just as you see the shadow growing larger... With a sudden thunderous clap and a rush of gale-force air, her foot slams down where you were just a second ago. You feel yourself tumbling across the expansive floor, your legs writhing in a flurry, before landing uncermoniously. You look over, realizing just how massive her foot is now, and how difficult it would be to avoid her again...

"HMPH. SIT STILL, PEST!"

Her other foot raises up. The cycle of frustrated stomps and narrow escapes continues, each footfall feeling just a little closer than the last, and you can already feel yourself getting fatigued and dazed. Cursing under her breath and getting more frantic with her footsteps, Madame Rosella sends her enormous sole crashing down towards you, and you...
15531.title: Stepping on Ants

choices: With a smirk, she reaches down and peels you off the sole of her foot
With a sneer, she stomps you again and leaves you squashed against her sole
155312.content:
A shadow overcomes you that is far too massive for you to escape. You turn your insect head up and all you can see is Madame Rosella's enormous foot speeding toward you. You catch a glimpse, between toes wiggling with anticipation for your demise, of a delighted grin on her face right before the gargantuan foot crushes your body.You hear and feel a sickening crunch throughout your whole being as you flatten. Your whole world becomes darkness as you're engulfed by the gypsy's sole.

Suddenly you feel different. You expected to feel dead, whatever that should feel like. Yet things somehow feel more normal than before Madame Rosella stomped on you. Immediately after this change, you're overwhelmed with other sensations. The indescribable surrealness of being paper-flat. The overpowering, yet intoxicating smell of the foot flesh that surrounds you. The distinct lack of excruciating pain you would have expected to feel after getting squashed underfoot.

You remain in darkness for a moment, though the vibrations you can feel through the sole of the gypsy's foot that can only be her gleefully wiggling toes tell you she must be savoring how thoroughly she just crushed you.

Then, the whole world moves and carries you along with it. The floor that you were just smashed against flies away from you as you realize Madame Rosella must be lifting her foot, with you stuck flat against it, to inspect her work. She doesn't find your remains on the floor, and then deduces the only place you could be. The floor disappears from view as the soft stinky world you're attached to rotates until your entire sky becomes Madame Rosella's, admittedly beautiful, face. At first she looks surprised, but then after a moment her head rolls back and your ears are assaulted with thunderous laughter.

"LOOKS LIKE I OVER DID IT," she cackles, "I SQUASHED YOU SO HARD THAT IT BROKE THE SPELL!"

That must have been the change you felt before! You couldn't turn your head to look at yourself, but now that you thought about it, it felt like you had all your human parts back. The only difference being that you were the size of an ant, and were spread flat across the smelly foot of an attractive gypsy woman.

"NOW LET'S SEE... YOU'RE NOT AN ANT ANYMORE, BUT YOU'RE AN ANT-SIZED MAN. AND..."

Suddenly everything becomes a blur! You can barely register that you're seeing the ground again before the monstrous foot that's holding you captive is stomping you back into it. You're trapped in darkness again. your head spinning, but only for a moment. Before you can collect yourself or even process what's happening, the colossal gypsy's face comes back into view.

"YOU APPEAR TO BE FAR, FAR MORE DURABLE THAN I INTENDED. OH, THIS IS INTERESTING," Madame Rosella muses, dragging out every syllable. A devilish grin spreads across her face. "I THINK I'M REALLY GOING TO ENJOY THIS..."

Place a half and go to sleep

info.brief_description: You anger a beautiful gypsy woman... So she changes your life in a BIG way (size changing)
info.description:
(Originally a chapter in my story "Shrunken By Your Nerdy Friend", but i felt it would work stronger as it's own story.)

You are walking through a carnival with your girlfriend, when you come across a tent for the fortune teller: Madame Rosella. The short gypsy woman is insulted by your comments towards her, and decides to make you feel small... in one way or another. You are shocked to find out that she has some unusual powers... among them are the power to shrink anything down to the size of a grain of sand, and the power to grow herself several miles tall! You should have watched your tongue, because before you know it you're going to find yourself under the gypsy woman's big toe!

This is mostly a size-changing story focused on either the gypsy growing huge or making another woman grow instead, or shrinking you to tiny size. There are however options for femdom and mind control deviations as you see fit. Just keep the toilet stuff to a minimum and the rest is up to you. Have fun! GP's for good additions!
